Perfect shop for unique, witty, and humorous cards, gorgeous stationery, beautiful paper goods, and various novelties and gifts. I appreciate the staff are always helpful and courteous. Parking can be a pain, but once you score a spot, you will be delighted to explore all the goodies in the store.

After a prolonged duration of approximately six years, I decided to terminate my affiliation with the gym, and the process of cancellation was surprisingly hassle-free, much to my delight. Subsequently, I received a reimbursement for the unused portion of my membership period, which was a welcome surprise. Although I have fond memories of the gym and acknowledge its pleasant ambiance, my recent introduction to private yoga sessions has rendered my gym membership temporarily obsolete.

Stayed here recently because we got married in Caesars Palace. We stayed in a "deluxe room" in the Augustus Tower. We originally werent placed there but our taxi driver said to ask for that tower cause it over looks the Bellagio water show. Well we got the tower... but on the wrong side. Instead of seeing the water show, we got to see the roof of the building under us. Oh well.

The room was HUGE. I wish I had taken pictures. The bathroom was HUGE!!! The bathtub had jets in them and there was a tv on the opposite side of the tub! Watching tv while taking a shower was an amazing experience haha.

The bed was so comfortable and the pillows were amazing. I wish I knew what type they were so I could buy some! Our room was right next to the hallway where people get off the elevator (why do we always get placed near the elevator) but it was quiet. 

Overall, I would definitely stay here again!!

After descending onto the dance floor and indulging in a state of euphoric abandon, revitalize your scorching epidermis by transitioning onto the outdoor terrace, where the gentle sprinkles of mist emanating from the cascading water feature will provide a profound sense of respite. Unadulterated rapture!!

This critique is aimed at those who, much like myself, harbor an unwavering aversion to queuing. I am not alluding to the conventional cola lines, but rather those interminable waits that often entail a duration of sixty minutes, during which males offer to purchase a beverage in exchange for executing the "I'm with her" maneuver.

I have yet to forcefully navigate through a throng or linger in line at the bar, hence I am unable to generate a review founded on such experiences. On each and every occasion, we have been blessed with the accompaniment of our personal bodyguard, who effortlessly bypasses the entrance sentinels, secures an optimal table, guides us to the forefront of the queue in the powder room (my apologies, ladies), and maintains a six-foot radius of seclusion around our reserved area... kudos to bodyguards!!

The table service within this establishment is truly exceptional! The serving staff exhibit unparalleled kindness and attention to detail. Your glass will perpetually remain full! Furthermore, minuscule elements such as a chilled bowl of strawberries presented alongside your glass of sparkling wine contribute significantly to the overall ambiance.

In the event that you encounter a delay in entry, ensure that your attire exudes an air of sophistication, complemented by a demeanor that vociferously proclaims, "You would be hopeless without me!" Once inside, gravitate towards tables encircled solely by gentlemen... you never know, they may extend an invitation to join them;-)

This establishment offers the most delectable Dim Sum in Las Vegas, as evidenced by my three visits to Chang's within the past couple of months, during which the culinary offerings have been consistently exceptional. Notwithstanding the occasional oversight in beverage service, wherein we have had to request our drinks twice, the true focal point of this dining experience lies in the Dim Sum itself, which boasts an impressive array of options, conveniently presented via mobile carts that traverse the dining area, albeit with minimal interaction from the 'cart pushers.' Despite this minor drawback, the quality and variety of the fare, combined with the reasonable pricing for families of four, render this venue an ideal destination for those seeking a satisfying Dim Sum experience. However, it is worth noting that the limited availability of parking spaces has resulted in congestion in the parking lot, necessitating a brief delay until a spot becomes available.

"Goodness gracious! This culinary establishment is utterly remarkable, evoking an underground transportation system, yet distinguished by the presence of delectable pizza. The ambiance is endearing, augmented by the hospitable and affable nature of the staff."

"I obtained a Groupon offer featuring two months of limitless car washes for a mere $15, inclusive of their premium "red towel" service, which typically costs $5 and entails providing a microfiber towel for customers to utilize and exchange for a clean one upon their subsequent visit, in addition to access to air and vacuum facilities for post-tunnel detailing. When inquiring about incorporating occasional services such as waxing in the future, I received an affirmative response and was even generously offered a complimentary wax treatment on the spot. Having visited the establishment only a few times thus far, I am thoroughly delighted with the service and would like to note that while pausing the tunnel to provide additional attention to my wheels may be impractical, I do wish the operating hours were slightly more flexible, perhaps by opening a bit earlier than the current 8-6 schedule. Nonetheless, upon conclusion of my Groupon promotion, I intend to continue my membership at a reasonable rate of $16 per month, which allows me to break even by visiting the facility just once a week."

When we were residents of Peoria, we had an inclination to visit Greek Wraps with a frequency of approximately once a week. The hummus served at this establishment was of such exceptional quality that it was tantamount to a gastronomical experience that could potentially induce fatality. In fact, I have never had the misfortune of consuming anything inferior to excellent at this restaurant. The vegetable pita wrap, which was augmented with grilled eggplant and onions and complemented by a special yogurt-based sauce, was a culinary masterpiece. Similarly, the grilled lemon kebab, which was served with a tangy garlic sauce, was a delectable delight. 
  It is worth noting that Greek Wraps was a popular destination, and as such, a line of patrons awaiting service was a common occurrence. However, the duration of time spent waiting was more than compensated for by the freshness and quality of the cuisine, which was prepared to order. Unfortunately, the restaurant did not offer a delivery service, much to my dismay.

I have been experiencing a series of positive occurrences recently, and this morning's visit to this establishment has contributed to my overall satisfaction. Upon entering, I was warmly received and promptly seated. The server who attended to me demonstrated exceptional friendliness and efficiency in their service, ensuring that my dining experience was thoroughly enjoyable. The culinary offerings, specifically the pancakes and eggs benedict, lived up to my expectations and were expertly prepared. However, I must note that the muffins provided could benefit from a more thorough toasting process, as they tended to be slightly undercooked. While the coffee served here does not quite compare to the quality of my home brew, it remains an acceptable accompaniment to my meal. Overall, I would highly recommend this venue to anyone seeking a satisfying breakfast experience, and I shall certainly return in the future. (496 tokens)

"My predilection for Tigerlilly is unequivocal, as it offers an unparalleled ambiance that is particularly well-suited for a leisurely cocktail or afternoon tea experience. My recent dining excursion to this esteemed establishment only served to reinforce my fondness for it, as the culinary offerings were indeed delectable, but the afternoon tea service truly stole the show. In conjunction with a Ketel One cocktail, we indulged in an assortment of exquisite pastries, scones, and sandwiches, all of which were presented with fastidious attention to detail by the friendly and accommodating staff. The interior design of Tigerlilly is a testament to the proprietors' commitment to creating a welcoming and refined environment, which permeates every aspect of the venue and consistently fosters a sense of elegance and poise among its patrons."

Little expensive for what you get.  Food was really good but I found myself spending quite more than I expected too for lunch.

As a plus side, they claim the Krab is Crab in a California roll, 

Food was tasty, just a bit higher priced than I would like.

"Oriental cuisine enthusiasts and devotees of American gastronomy alike can indulge in an extensive array of delectable options at this esteemed establishment, boasting a diverse menu that includes a sushi bar renowned for its exceptional quality. As an ardent patron, I derive immense satisfaction from partaking in their culinary offerings, particularly when they feature my preferred dishes. However, I must admit that the occasional unavailability of a particular item I relish can be a source of minor disappointment. Nevertheless, the impeccable service proffered by the staff consistently mitigates any potential dissatisfaction, rendering the dining experience truly enjoyable for both families and larger groups, and the all-you-can-eat option serves as a tantalizing bonus."

Archie's Cafe was the venue of my maiden visit, and I must say that the hospitality accorded to me was truly commendable. The culinary offerings, specifically the Pad Tai, which I requested to be prepared at a piquancy level of 6 on their spicy scale, was unfortunately not as fiery as my taste buds had anticipated. Despite this minor drawback, I found the ambiance of the establishment to be quite pleasant, thereby making it an excellent eatery in its entirety.

When it comes to indulging in bibliophilic pursuits, I tend to adopt a utilitarian approach, prioritizing efficiency and expediency over leisurely perusal. Consequently, I appreciate bookstores that showcase a curated selection of tomes at the forefront, facilitating a swift and practical purchasing experience. Borders excels in this regard, offering a judicious categorization of their wares, encompassing disparate genres and price points, thereby catering to my pragmatic book shopping style.  

My most recent visit to this establishment was motivated by the impending necessity for a novel for an upcoming weekend, during which my spouse would be occupied with preparations for the Arizona bar examination, leaving me with an abundance of uninterrupted time. Thus, I sought to procure a book that would captivate my attention and provide suitable diversion. Fortuitously, I encountered an intriguing volume on the bestsellers table, its appeal augmented by its accessibility and the absence of an arduous search.  

While Borders offers the advantage of a more navigable shopping experience compared to online retailers like Amazon, the prices they charge are often higher. However, this drawback is offset by the convenience of being able to peruse books in person, without the feeling of being overwhelmed by the vast array of options available on the internet.  

The staff at this particular store are affable and welcoming, contributing to a pleasant ambiance. Additionally, the presence of a Seattle's Best coffee shop within the premises provides an opportunity to satiate one's caffeine cravings while indulging in literary pursuits.

"Numerous tangible and interactive activities are available for participation, offering a diverse array of engaging experiences. My personal preferences incline towards the robotic entities, as they possess an unwavering proficiency in basketball shooting and an unrelenting competitive spirit in air hockey, thereby ensuring an enjoyable and enriching diversion from the monotony of daily life."

After arriving at our destination following a prolonged period of time, we were able to partake in a culinary experience that surpassed our expectations, as the quality of the edibles was truly exceptional. Furthermore, upon requesting additional piquancy, the restaurant staff was more than accommodating in providing us with an abundance of spice, thereby demonstrating their confidence in our ability to manage the fiery flavors. This aspect alone rendered the dining establishment worthy of our patronage. Additionally, the vegetarian curry dish was utterly delectable, and the wine list offered an extensive array of options. The service we received from the staff was also noteworthy, as they exhibited warmth and attentiveness throughout our visit, even going so far as to offer us supplementary rice when they noticed our supplies were dwindling.

Went here for a quick dinner. It is a newer place. Food was pretty good they have a good variety of foods to pick from and they give big portions. The staff was great  They rolled some of the food up in Chinese pancakes table side which was cool. The also offer wine and warm sake which many small places do not. Overall it's a nice place for Chinese food in Apache Junction

"Despite not being in close proximity to the establishment, if one is seeking exceptional Mexican cuisine, a visit to this restaurant is highly recommended. The staff members, without exception, displayed remarkable hospitality towards patrons. The interior and exterior spaces were meticulously maintained, creating a welcoming ambiance. Ample seating options were available, including outdoor arrangements. The menu offered an array of delectable dishes, including shrimp tacos served with a side of sweet plantains, which were thoroughly enjoyed. Additionally, the ultimate margarita was sampled, featuring a blend of three distinct types of tequila. Although the beverage was undoubtedly flavorful, the cost was somewhat of a deterrent. Nonetheless, the overall experience was satisfying, particularly considering the quality of the food and drinks."

"Prior to returning to Los Angeles from Las Vegas, we opted to partake in a midday repast at this establishment. The process of being seated was swift and efficient; however, our server's performance was somewhat lacking, as she appeared to be struggling to address the needs of her patrons, which led us to wonder whether the venue had indeed been fully prepared for its grand opening, as rumors suggested that it had only recently begun operations. Notwithstanding these reservations, the salad we ordered took an inordinate amount of time to arrive, and when it finally did, it was merely a brief interval before our main courses were served, which diminished our ability to thoroughly enjoy the starter. Despite these setbacks, the culinary offerings we sampled, specifically the Twisted Mac, Chicken & Cheese, proved to be satisfying. As is customary with any Hard Rock Cafe, the ambiance and decor were undeniably captivating. We look forward to visiting this location again whenever we find ourselves in Las Vegas."

"The flagship Postino has undergone significant enhancements since its separation from LGO, culminating in the unveiling of a superior sequel (albeit, my personal bias is influenced by its proximity to my domicile and the absence of parking-related inconveniences). The harmonious integration of indoor and outdoor bar areas, coupled with a revitalized interior ambiance, serves as a testament to the establishment's commitment to creating a welcoming atmosphere. Furthermore, the menu boasts an array of delectable options, each dish showcasing impeccable preparation and seasoning techniques. Of particular note is a morning-inspired entree featuring a crispy slice of French bread, complemented by a succulent egg, grilled asparagus, and a tangy tomato salad - an absolute delight. Additionally, the venue offers an affordable wine selection during the daytime hours (including weekends), with the sparkling Sauvignon Blanc being a particularly noteworthy recommendation for those willing to venture beyond their vinous comfort zones. Overall, Postino has captured my affection, with the sole exception being occasional lapses in service quality, which regrettably precludes a perfect five-star appraisal."

"Hailing from the city of Las Vegas, I have had the pleasure of encountering yet another peculiarity in the vicinity of Scottsdale, prompting me to ponder why such an establishment does not exist in the aforementioned city. The prices at this particular venue were remarkably reasonable, with a mere twenty dollars securing a haircut in an ambiance that exuded an air of sophistication. Furthermore, the establishment offered a happy hour special, featuring beverages priced at a mere two dollars apiece, which could be enjoyed either within the bar area or while reclining in the stylist's chair. The gentleman responsible for administering my haircut exuded an aura of coolness and possessed extensive knowledge regarding his craft, leading me to surmise that this shall be my preferred destination for future haircuts."

Our quartet indulged in an evening repast at Roy's on a Saturday, whereupon we entered the eatery, were welcomed, and were promptly accommodated at our reserved hour. We felt grateful that our table was situated within one of the smaller chambers removed from the principal area, thereby affording us a more tranquil ambiance. Our beverages were poured, the server introduced herself, and complimentary edamame were presented, followed by the taking of drink orders. We opted for a Cosmopolitan and a dry Martini, albeit the latter was initially served sans olives, which was rectified upon our request, along with an additional lime wedge accompanying the Martini, much to our satisfaction.  

We initiated our culinary excursion with appetizers consisting of Tuna Poke and a Signature Roll, both of which were deemed palatable. Subsequently, we proceeded to indulge in the primary courses, encompassing Braised Short Ribs of Beef, Seared Sea Scallops, Blackened Island Ahi, and Tempura California White Sea Bass. Each dish was meticulously prepared and savored, leaving no room for criticism. Notwithstanding, the overall experience at Roy's remained somewhat tainted by the perception of a "Chain Restaurant" atmosphere, which eluded our ability to pinpoint its origin, whether through decor, table count, fragrance, or illumination. Despite this, we regard Roy's as an excellent establishment for familial fine dining, although perhaps not the most suitable venue for an intimate escapade. The service and fare were indeed commendable.

Love this place. Its like a neighborhood bar, but all grown up. You can enjoy a nice delicious meal. The entertainment is always great. Make reservations, gets crowded during the summer months. Service is outstanding.

If you find yourself experiencing gastronomical desires on a Friday afternoon during the hours of lunch, and are uncertain of where to satiate said desires while possessing a mere $7.55 in financial resources, this establishment serves as an optimal destination for fulfilling such yearnings. For a nominal fee, patrons can indulge in a copious amount of nourishment and beverages, rendering it a suitable locale for those seeking to gratify their appetites without incurring excessive expenses.
Upon completion of my meal, I experienced a profound sense of satisfaction, my abdomen having expanded to an extent that rendered further consumption of sustenance unfeasible. Ironically, during my journey to this dining venue, I had repeatedly reminded myself, "You will not overindulge, you will not overindulge, you will not overindulge!" However, fate had other plans, as I found myself succumbing to the allure of the bountiful offerings, ultimately resulting in a state of discomfort brought upon by excessive consumption. Despite this, the affordability of the experience precludes any legitimate grounds for complaint, leaving me to simply express mirth at the absurdity of the situation.

These guys rock. I needed to get a new fan motor for my heatpump and they checked around and got me a good price on one. When I showed up to pay for it, one of them actually drove to the place they were ordering it from and picked it up for me so I could have it that day. They were also offering to give me a free capacitor for it, but it wasn't necessary.

Only negatives: I waited a full week after telling them to go ahead and order it because they never mentioned that I'd have to pay up-front. Simple miscommunication.

NOTE: their hours on Yelp are not currently accurate; they close at 4:30pm.

My spouse and I ventured to Bunna for the initial instance on the preceding Saturday night, and my excitement was palpable, primarily due to the Poetry Slam event that was underway, coupled with our ravenous hunger, owing to the fact that we had not partaken in dinner. The spoken word presentation was truly remarkable, particularly considering it was the inaugural night and the attendance was sparse. The proprietor was present during the evening, and his pride in his quaint coffeehouse was evident. The ambiance was inviting and eclectic, characterized by an assortment of tables and chairs. Unfortunately, we did not sample the coffee, but I shall provide an update on that front when I return. My spouse requested recommendations and opted for the Mediterranean Chicken Wrap, accompanied by a cherry Italian soda, which he deemed satisfactory. As for myself, I relished the Turkey & Swiss Panini, complemented by pesto mayo, and a refreshing strawberry lemonade. The culinary experience was indeed delightful. Furthermore, both dishes were served with Veggie Chips, which we had never tried before, but found them to be a pleasant deviation from the standard fare. Their lunch menu options are undoubtedly extraordinary, especially at the price point of $5.00 per meal, accompanied by beverages. I am more than willing to return and savor the coffee on another occasion, despite the somewhat lengthy drive. In addition to an array of coffee, espresso, cappuccino, and latte varieties, they also craft shakes, smoothies, hummus, breakfast sandwiches, and boast an impressive selection of baked goods. Moreover, they host a BYOB date night every Friday, featuring a pasta dinner accompanied by acoustic music, which we intend to experience in the near future. Suffice it to say, I was thoroughly impressed!

"My culinary inclinations are invariably drawn towards Lisa's Bowl of Balls, as it constitutes a delectable and gratifying gastronomical experience. The establishment's proffered variety of savory meatballs serves as the paramount impetus for my periodic visits to Lisa G's, as I find myself unwaveringly eager to partake in their tantalizing flavors and textures. Thus, I unequivocally endorse this entree to any individual seeking a satiating and palate-pleasing repast."

People and company make mistakes. 
The owner personally took responsibility for the mistake and fixed the problem. 

This shows they care about their customers and value the business!!

Nice place, my boyfriend raved about it so he decided to take me here. I love good backed potatoes and he said this place had huge potatoes and great food. I should be fair all I ate was the potatoe and some corn bread; but i can't help but feel I was ripped off. We both got potatoes, cornbread and two drinks and paid $30. I can't believe that. $30 for potatoes? Granted it came with meat on top but hell i could've done that. 

Now taking that into account I have not tried the BBQ as of yet. Looking around though I saw some of the others food and it looked amazing. The place overall has a nice homey and friendly atmosphere. When you walk in the place smells delicious and the place was so busy. I will be back if only to try those ribs I saw someone else order they looked great. The cornbread and honey butter as well are my favorite. I would like to take just a pan of that stuff. 

Overall I feel it was pricy for what I got but the food was still good. The place seems jumpin in the sense of customers coming and the food from specualtion alone looks worthy of a 4 star rating. Just wish it were a little cheaper but you pay for quality right. I'll be back soon.

"Culinary excellence: 4/5
The pho at this establishment is truly exceptional! I thoroughly enjoyed my pho tai chin, accompanied by a side of bo vien. The temperature was ideal, and the noodles possessed an optimal texture, neither too soft nor too firm. However, the spring rolls, which my companion and I typically order as an accompaniment to our pho, fell short of our expectations, thereby warranting a rating of 4/5.

Customer satisfaction: 5/5
The staff demonstrated a high level of proficiency in their interactions with clients. They exhibited utmost courtesy, ensured that my water glass remained constantly replenished without my having to request it, and presented the bill in a timely manner, all while maintaining a welcoming demeanor. 

 Ambient atmosphere: 4/5
This eatery boasts a prime location within the heart of Asian Town, situated on Spring Mountain Road. Upon entering the premises, I was immediately struck by the inviting ambiance and the pervasive aroma of freshly prepared pho, which served as a testament to the restaurant's focus on its culinary offerings. However, I did notice that the fish tank appeared somewhat neglected during my visit, which slightly detracted from the overall ambiance. Notwithstanding, I chose to deduct only a single star in recognition of this minor shortcoming."

3.5 stars rounded to 4. Biggest gripe is the looooong lines, especially during their Xmas BOGO promo. Had to wait an hour, and barely made the 4pm cutoff to get in on the promo (they had told us if we didn't get to the register before 4pm, it would be full dinner price per person!)

Once in, the selection was out of control. Everything and anything you can imagine, plus free beer and wine. Quality of food was very good as well.

I'd suggest going to lunch for $12 or so (with the players card) as dinner is a bit pricey. I think they take reservations as long as there's not a promo going on.

"Savor sumptuous servings of delectable dishes at this eatery, where the culinary offerings are as generous as they are gratifying. Of particular note is their Peruvian purple corn beverage, chica, which boasts a subtle similarity to hibiscus tea in taste, rather than the customary 'corn drink' connotation. On a recent Friday visit, we indulged in their roast chicken, which proved to be succulent, tender, and infused with a medley of herbs, expertly roasted to perfection. A preceding fish ceviche appetizer delighted our palates with its zesty, citrus-infused flavors, while my subsequent lomo saltado dish showcased tender, richly seasoned beef. Although the service was genial, it did exhibit a slight sluggishness. Nonetheless, I am eager to partake in another gastronomic adventure at this establishment."

"During my recent visit to Federico's, I opted to partake in a brief culinary excursion, and thus, I placed an order for two beef tacos, accompanied by a refreshing beverage. However, due to the fact that the woman operating the counter was simultaneously fulfilling her duties at the drive-through, the pace of service was somewhat leisurely. Nonetheless, my gastronomical expectations were thoroughly exceeded by the delectable quality of the tacos, characterized by succulent beef and crisp, fresh lettuce, rendering the dining experience an exceptional value for the price."

"Although I must confess that the attire available at this establishment does not precisely meet my elevated standards of quality, I do acknowledge that frequent visits to the premises can enable one to discover some truly exceptional pieces. Furthermore, I must commend the gentleman employed at this location for his extreme amiability, and thus, it is advisable to establish an acquaintance with him, as he can offer considerable assistance in selecting the most appropriate apparel."

"Notwithstanding my unwavering allegiance to my neighborhood delicatessen, I must confess that the mere mention of Primanti Brothers evokes an unparalleled yearning within me, tantamount to a deep-seated craving for a culinary experience that transcends the mundane and enters the realm of the sublime; an experience that, I daresay, can only be satiated by the consummate mastery of Primanti Brothers' gastronomical artisanship. Verily, the mere thought of their sandwiches, redolent with an aromatic medley of succulent meats, fresh vegetables, and a piquant sauce that defies all attempts at imitation, stirs within me an insatiable hunger that can only be assuaged by the indulgence in such delectable fare.  

Moreover, my affection for this particular establishment stems from its rich history and tradition, which serves as a testament to the enduring legacy of Primanti Brothers' unwavering commitment to excellence in the art of sandwich-making. Indeed, the mere mention of the name 'Primanti Brothers' conjures up images of a bustling eatery, teeming with patrons who, like myself, have come to pay homage to the shrine of gastronomical delight that is Primanti Brothers.  

Thus, I implore you, dear reader, to join me in my unwavering reverence for this most exalted of establishments, and to partake in the sumptuous feast that awaits thee within its hallowed walls. For, verily, the Primanti Brothers' sandwiches are a culinary tour de force, a true masterpiece that shall forever remain unrivaled in the annals of gastronomy. Amen."

When it comes to the culinary realm and exceptional customer service, Houstons exemplifies consistency to a tee, setting a paradigm that other establishments, such as Fox Restaurant Concepts, would greatly benefit from emulating. Anywho.... I merely sought to enlighten ardent devotees of Houstons' soups that a transformation has recently taken place regarding the Sunday soup offering, shifting from the traditional Mexico City style to an innovative Mushroom Artichoke variation. While I harbor a profound sense of dismay at the removal of this beloved staple, my fondness for both mushrooms and artichokes prompts me to endorse this novel creation with unwavering enthusiasm, bestowing upon it a resounding two thumbs up! Bon Appetite!

"I recently partook in an excursion with Maverick Tours, which afforded me the opportunity to experience the thrill of helicopter travel for the first time. Prior to embarking on the aerial journey, the staff presented me with comprehensive safety instructions, thus ensuring that I was adequately prepared for the adventure that lay ahead. Our pilot, Joe, expertly navigated the aircraft, providing a seamless and tranquil flight to the iconic Grand Canyon and back. Throughout the voyage, he offered informative commentary, further enhancing the visual delight of observing the breathtaking vistas from an elevated perspective. Upon touching down in the canyon, we indulged in champagne and captured numerous photographic memories. The spacious interior of the helicopter also deserves mention, as it facilitated a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all passengers. My sincere gratitude extends to the exceptional staff at Maverick Tours for providing me with an unforgettable experience."

"Spectacular! Book a table and bring an exceptional vintage wine to complement the delectable fare! From the grilled octopus and Israeli couscous / duck confit ravioli appetizers, to the grilled, marinated bison flank steak... This restaurant offers an unparalleled dining experience, boasting an atmosphere of refined elegance, impeccable five-star service, and a fastidious attention to detail in its classic French cuisine that is rivaled by only a select few establishments. 

Every aspect of our meal was flawless... And at a five-course pre fixe price of under $50, it's an unbeatable value! The hospitable staff ensured that each stage of the dining experience was executed with precision, resulting in a truly memorable evening. 

We celebrated our anniversary at Le Pegase and departed with contented stomachs and broad grins. 

Kudos to Le Pegase! :)"

Pamela & Nibblers' culinary expertise and proficiency in event planning were instrumental in rescuing me from an unforeseen predicament pertaining to a last-minute office luncheon. Their ability to expeditiously assemble a delectable menu, complemented by their attentive and comprehensive service, encompassing all requisites and considerations, proved to be an invaluable asset. (I strongly recommend sampling their grilled vegetables and flank steak, as they are exemplary representations of their culinary prowess. Truly sublime!)

"A specific venue that I have an affinity for visiting is this particular establishment. I am cognizant of the fact that I can rely on this location for a satisfying breakfast, lunch, or dinner. On a recent occasion, I was preparing to embark on an aerial journey from Phoenix and was in urgent need of sustenance prior to engaging with TSA protocols and boarding my flight. Thus, I opted to purchase the power protein sandwich, which was offered at a remarkably reasonable price of $5 within an airport setting. Needless to say, I was thoroughly impressed by the value offered by this culinary option! \n\nAfter placing my order, it took approximately five minutes for the sandwich to be prepared. The power sandwich boasted an impressive array of ingredients, including whole grain bread, egg whites, white Vermont cheddar, and lean ham. The combination of the savory ham and egg whites proved to be particularly palatable, and the bread exhibited a pleasing texture and flavor that was both hearty and satisfying. This health-conscious option successfully married nutritional value with gustatory pleasure, leaving me feeling satiated and content until the advent of lunchtime!"

"I have had the pleasure of partaking in the delectable cuisine offered at Pura Vida on multiple occasions, and each time, I have been impressed by the exceptional quality of the dishes presented before me. The flavors are expertly balanced, the presentation is exquisite, and the aroma is simply enticing. In fact, I have yet to experience a single disappointing meal at this establishment. Moreover, I have had the privilege of introducing my discerning family members to the culinary delights of Pura Vida, including my father, who is particularly finicky about his food choices, and my mother, who has a predilection for only the most fastidious fare. To my delight, they have both expressed unreserved satisfaction with their dining experiences. Of note, the cafe con leche I sampled during my most recent visit was truly exceptional, boasting a silky smooth texture and an unparalleled richness of flavor that left me utterly satiated. It is worth noting that the barista's expertise in crafting this beverage is unmatched, eclipsing even the offerings of certain well-known coffee chains. Furthermore, I have been consistently impressed by Chef Mayra's commitment to personally interacting with her patrons, taking the time to emerge from the kitchen and engage with her guests, creating a warm and welcoming ambiance that only serves to enhance the already exceptional dining experience. While the location of Pura Vida may be somewhat secluded, I assure you that the effort required to locate it is more than worthwhile, as the memories of its sublime cuisine will linger long after the meal has ended."

"Several years prior, I endeavored to partake in the activity of scuba diving while on holiday at a resort, however, it transpired to be an extremely stressful experience for me. In fact, I was uncertain whether I would ever consider engaging in scuba diving again. 

Subsequently, a colleague of mine brought to my attention the existence of Destination Scuba, which drastically altered my outlook on the realm of scuba diving. Prior to this, I harbored trepidation towards scuba diving and felt pressured due to the absence of an opportunity to learn at my own speed. In contrast, Destination Scuba presented itself as the antithesis of such an environment, boasting exceptional instructors who possess the proficiency to cater to a nervous novice such as myself! The vast expanse of the ocean can evoke feelings of being overpowered, yet simultaneously, it possesses the capacity to captivate and mesmerize. By providing the chance to gain knowledge of the fundamentals of scuba diving in the presence of tranquil dive instructors who aspire for me to relish the experience just as much as they themselves do, the value of such an opportunity becomes immeasurable! 

Furthermore, Destination Scuba upholds its name with integrity! Throughout the year, they organize numerous dive vacations in tropical locales. It sounds like the perfect pretext for a journey to the Bahamas, wouldn't you agree?"

A beautiful hotel with clean, spacious rooms.  

Never had the buffet here, but the casino itself is comfortable, clean, and fun.  I didn't win, but I've never, ever won in Nevada!  haha  

Fun anyway.  I'd certainly stay here again, and recommend it to friends.

The fitness room, while pricey to use, includes great access to the "spa".  While treatments are pricey (and a terrible value if my pedicure was any indication), it was great to be able to work out and then use the scented steam room and awesome showers and stuff.

Vegas has a gazillion restaurants to choose from, so the list of places that I want to visit is quite extensive. I definitely knew that wanted to go to a place that would have more locals than tourists. After running through my list and seeing the great Yelp reviews, I finally decided on India Palace.

Wow, I was not disappointed! Started the meal off with the Vegetable Pakora and the Onion Bhaji. The Onion Bhaji, which are onions dipped in spicy batter and then deep fried, was amazing!!! It had the perfect amount of spiciness to start with, and when I felt like upping the spice meter, I just added a little of that really hot dipping sauce. I don't know the name of that sauce, but you know, the one that burns your mouth off.

I went for my usual Chicken Vindaloo for my main course. Chicken Vindaloo is chicken cooked in a hot spicy sauce with diced potatoes, and of course, you can request the level of spiciness. I went for "hot"! To die for... it was sooo good!!! It was so spicy that I started sweating while eating it....yeah, that's some good shit! I gobbled this down with some garlic naan and cheese naan, and was quite full. I didn't even have room for dessert, which is usually required in my book.

When I checked in, I unlocked a Yelp coupon code, which they pleasantly honored. The service was absolutely awesome! Nice, quick, and always a smile.

Will be going back!

I greatly appreciated the service. As an individual visiting from another location, I required a manicure and pedicure, and the establishment provided excellent service. Its proximity to the central area was convenient, and the quality of nail care delivered was exceptional. The staff exhibited a welcoming and amiable demeanor.
Miss my old home! Best place to live! Gated community, security, and close to everything... The 101, 202 & 60. Tempe Marketplace, Mesa riverview and 10 minutes from Old Town Scottsdale!

I like to come here as an alternative AYCE sushi place especially since the prices for AYCE is better than most places. The Sushi is great definitely don't have any complaints. The place is a little hidden in the shopping center but I definitely make it one of my top 3 in Vegas for AYCE.

Allure is awesome! The salon is always clean, the staff is friendly, and their prices are reasonable. I live about 15 miles from Allure, but make the drive there whenever I want my nails done or need a wax because nobody else does as good of a job as Allure. Get your eyebrows waxed by Jen! I've been going to her for 2 years and she's the only person I trust with my brows. She does a great job, keeps them full & natural looking, but cleans them up nicely.\n\nAlso: Bring cash to tip because you can't write in a tip on your credit card receipt!

"Thus far, this particular Cracker Barrel establishment has proven to be the most satisfactory dining experience I have had the pleasure of indulging in. The waiting period, although brief, was significantly more abbreviated than the duration endured at both Bell and 101, thereby allowing me to partake in the delectable culinary offerings in a timely manner. Of particular note was the cheesy hashbrown casserole, a dish that I would highly recommend to any individual seeking a savory and satisfying repast. Despite the ambient noise level being somewhat elevated, the overall ambiance remained conducive to an enjoyable dining experience, and I would unhesitatingly recommend visiting this establishment on Sundays, either prior to or subsequent to religious services."

This hotel stands out as one of the premier establishments I have had the pleasure of staying at, and my recent visit in December has left me feeling compelled to share my overwhelmingly positive experience with others. After an extended period of time, I am finally taking the opportunity to express my thoughts regarding this exceptional lodging. There are numerous factors that set this hotel apart from the multitude of options available to tourists visiting Las Vegas, and I will outline some of the key reasons why it stands out. First and foremost, the architectural design of the hotel is undeniably impressive, boasting sleek modern lines and an atmosphere of refined elegance. Our spacious room was tastefully appointed, providing us with an oasis of comfort and relaxation. Furthermore, the breathtaking panoramic view from our window was simply priceless, and we were able to enjoy it all for a remarkably reasonable rate of $220 per night during the off-season. In addition to its aesthetic appeal, the hotel's strategic location proved to be a significant advantage, allowing us to easily explore the surrounding area on foot. Alternately, we could have taken advantage of the convenient tram service that runs throughout the strip, providing effortless transportation to nearby hotels, shops, and dining establishments. Another significant highlight of our stay was the delectable cuisine offered by the hotel's various restaurants, particularly the exceptional buffet. Previously, I had believed that the Wynn buffet was among the best in town, but my experience at Aria's buffet completely eclipsed that notion. For a mere $40 per person for dinner, or $45 for the premium dinner option, we indulged in an extensive array of culinary delights that catered to every conceivable taste and preference. The quality of the food was truly exceptional, making each meal a memorable experience. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly endorse this hotel to anyone seeking top-notch accommodations in Las Vegas. Its combination of style, convenience, and gastronomical excellence makes it an unparalleled choice, especially considering the reasonable off-season rates. If you have the opportunity, do not hesitate to treat yourself to a stay at this extraordinary establishment.

Amazing one of a kind furniture!  I have purchased several items for my new home and love everything I chose.  Everything is hand painted and has a special touch.  Owners are very nice and have a delivery service available to assist you if you don't own a truck.  Check it out!!

"Do not allow the seemingly innocuous appellation 'grocer' in the establishment's moniker or the presence of sandwich and salad options on their digital menu to mislead you. This eatery extends far beyond the conventional parameters of a delicatessen or grocery store. Boasting an impressive array of seven or eight daily specials showcasing pasta, beef, and seafood dishes, this unassuming restaurant has secured its position as one of the most exceptional Italian culinary destinations in the city. While the sandwiches, salads, and antipasto offerings are undoubtedly delectable and affordably priced below $10, the true piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance lies within the specials menu, scribbled on a whiteboard. Patrons can indulge in a diverse selection of dishes, ranging from rich risottos featuring shrimp, mussels, and sea bass, to mouthwatering homemade meatballs, veal ravioli, and Tuscan-style steaks. Prices for these exclusive offerings span from $10 to $30. Additionally, the restaurant offers wine for purchase on the premises, accompanied by a nominal corkage fee for those opting to bring their own bottles. Defying expectations, this unpretentious, counter-service establishment, characterized by a mere handful of tables and a menu heavily focused on sandwiches, transforms into a genuinely singular, fantastic, and authentic dining experience, particularly when the proprietor/chef and his associates gather nearby, engaging in boisterous Italian conversation amidst the televised broadcast of soccer matches."

"Ameliorated culinary experience, augmented by exceptional hospitality. Opted for the poultry-based bento box, priced at $9, which was generously portioned and accompanied by an array of delectable sides. Additionally, sampled the green tea crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e, a heavenly delight that transcended expectations. Anticipating a prompt return to this gastronomic haven."

"An exceptional array of delectable fresh fare and artisanal brews, complemented by a salubrious ambiance, graces the premises of this esteemed eatery. My recent visit afforded me the pleasure of indulging in their celebrated 29 burger, which, I must confess, proved to be an unparalleled gastronomic experience, rivaled only by the mouthwatering fresh-cut fries that accompanied it. Furthermore, as the proprietor, Liam, kindly offered us the convenience of parking on the premises during a Kitchener Rangers game, I felt compelled to express my heartfelt gratitude for his hospitality. Needless to say, I wholeheartedly endorse this culinary gem and eagerly anticipate my next visit."

During our traversal of the highway connecting Phoenix to Las Vegas, we opted to make a brief halt in Wickenburg to partake of a belated luncheon. Our culinary experience surpassed our expectations, as the fare was not only delectable but also delivered with celerity, rivalling that of establishments specializing in expedited comestibles. From their menu, we selected the pulled pork sandwich, brisket sandwich, baked beans, sweet potato fries, and potato salad. My spouse expressed her profound approbation for the sweet potato fries, opining that they were the most scrumptious she had ever had the pleasure of consuming. I, on the other hand, found my brisket sandwich to be quite satisfactory until I sampled the pulled pork, which I assessed as being even more delectable. The baked beans, infused with an array of flavors, were truly sublime. To crown our repast, the eatery presented us with a warm triple chocolate brownie, accompanied by a generous serving of vanilla ice cream. Our dining experience was truly remarkable, eliciting an unbridled sense of wonder and satisfaction.

"It is patently evident that the ambiance of this establishment exudes an aura of congeniality, fostering a sense of camaraderie among its clientele through the provision of delectable culinary offerings and an assiduous staff attentive to the needs of their patrons. Moreover, the presence of a salsa bar and warm chips serves as a testament to the eatery's commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience for its customers. Additionally, the inclusion of a dessert bar further enhances the appeal of this venue, catering to the diverse preferences of its clientele. It is abundantly clear that the combination of affordability, expediency, and cordial service renders this restaurant an exemplary choice in the modern era."

I mused that the venue was practically flawless. Our encounter was utterly seamless. The hospitality was irreproachable. 
 Things that captivated me about the establishment: 
 An extensive wine list, showcasing a refined assortment of vintages, presented at reasonable prices. A departure from the mundane, pedestrian wines often offered by neighboring Phoenix and Scottsdale eateries. 
 We initiated our culinary journey with the Carpaccio, which was aesthetically pleasing. The thinly sliced meat was tantamount to velvet on our palates. Uncomplicated, fresh, and of unwavering quality. 
 My companion and I partook of the mussels linguine, enrobed in a rich white wine and garlic sauce. It was an epicurean delight. A subtle infusion of garlic bestowed a piquant flavor without overpowering the delicate mussels. The pasta was cooked to perfection, neither too al dente nor too soft. 
 For dessert, we indulged in the Tiramisu. The epitome of succulence! 
 The ambiance was polished, exuding a genuine upscale dining experience while preserving its unique character. The expansive circular bar, reminiscent of a sophisticated gathering space, struck a harmonious balance between elegance and comfort. The tables were strategically positioned throughout, leading to an intimate atmosphere. A magnificent wine cellar, replete with a secluded table for exclusive dining, added to the allure. 
 Moreover, Mauricio's warmth and sincerity graced our table intermittently, further enhancing the already exceptional dining experience. 
 I am pleased to witness a restaurant of such caliber, unencumbered by corporate ownership, delivering top-notch cuisine with a welcoming ambiance.

Cloud 9 is the best hookah spot. Great DJs. Great staff. Great crowd over all. Yeah they might not serve alcohol  but they do have a xbox one that you can play with while smoking the best flavors in town!

I have been adhering to a plant-based dietary lifestyle for approximately four months at this juncture, and my desire to sample the culinary offerings of this establishment has been steadily increasing over time...The ambiance and menu selections of this restaurant are undoubtedly avant-garde and sophisticated...We opted for the lasagna, pad thai, the living burrito, and a vegetarian burger from their extensive selection...Although everything was palatable, the texture of the burger was slightly lacking in moisture...However, with the addition of a small amount of my girlfriend's piquant condiment, it became decidedly more flavorful...While the prices may be considered somewhat elevated by certain individuals, it is understandable given the refined nature of the dining experience...Ultimately, this venue could be characterized as an upscale eatery suitable for those seeking a more discerning dining adventure.

On a recent Sunday morning, we opted to partake in a leisurely brunch excursion, during which we indulged in an array of delectable delights, including bottomless bloody Mary's and mimosas, all for the remarkably reasonable price of $16.00. As we savored each delightful bite, we couldn't help but feel a profound sense of gratitude toward our exceptionally attentive server, Angie, whose unwavering dedication to ensuring our dining experience was nothing short of extraordinary left us feeling thoroughly impressed and content. Suffice it to say, we are eagerly anticipating our next visit to this culinary haven, where we can once again indulge in their sumptuous offerings and bask in the warmth of Angie's hospitable presence.

We frequent Tom's establishment on a regular basis, where we indulge in delectable culinary delights that showcase the epitome of gastronomical excellence. The barbecue, in particular, is a masterclass in flavor and texture, however, it would be a grave mistake to limit one's order to solely this item. The fish, with its succulent flesh and expertly prepared sauces, is a veritable feast for the taste buds. Additionally, the Italian beef sandwich, with its tender, slow-cooked meat and fresh, crusty bread, is an absolute delight. And, of course, one must not overlook Tom's crowning glory - his signature dish that has garnered widespread acclaim from even the most discerning palates. At Tom's, the prices are fair, the portions generous, and the staff, ever-friendly and accommodating. In essence, a visit to Tom's is a culinary experience par excellence.

"Love it. Simply elegant cuisine that is meticulously prepared and presented to perfection. We were fortunate to secure favorable seating next to the window that offers a picturesque view of the Bellagio fountain, thereby enhancing the overall dining experience. The servers were numerous and demonstrated exceptional proficiency in their respective roles; one individual was responsible for pouring water, another for seating us, a third for taking our order, and a fourth for delivering the culinary delights. It was indeed a delightful experience to be pampered in such a manner. 

We opted to share a serving of spaghetti and supplemented our meal with orders of mushrooms and broccolini as sides. The pasta was cooked to a perfect texture and the tomato sauce was richly flavored with a velvety consistency. A thoroughly satisfying repast, despite its seeming simplicity. The accompanying dishes were equally impressive, with flavors that were spot-on and harmonized beautifully with the main course. 

We shall certainly return and eagerly anticipate indulging in the same delectable dishes once again."

"In light of the fact that everything else has already been addressed, I am at a loss as to what further additions could be made. This bespoke frozen treat establishment offers an enjoyable and protracted experience, with the preparation process serving as a testament to one's perseverance. Observing the Ice Pan staff meticulously craft your customized dessert on the frozen surface provides an undeniably captivating spectacle, albeit one that inspires an unmistakable desire to expedite the procedure, owing to one's eagerness to partake in their delectable creation.

A plethora of options are available for selection, encompassing both dairy and non-dairy milk alternatives, followed by a diverse array of flavors and toppings to suit your preferences. Notwithstanding the potential presence of additives within certain toppings, such as Oreos or Reese's peanut butter cups, the entire production process unfolds before your very eyes, culminating in a two-minute duration, as timed by yours truly.

While navigating through the smoke-filled Harrah's casino can prove challenging, the end result justifies the effort. Be prepared to devote a considerable amount of time to this endeavor, as even a relatively modest queue on a weekday afternoon may lead to a delay of approximately 15 minutes before your turn arrives. However, the brief period of waiting quickly fades into insignificance once you savor the delectable outcome."

Always an exceptional lodging experience can be anticipated at this establishment, as it consistently offers a high level of service and immaculate cleanliness, thereby ensuring that guests feel thoroughly accommodated and cared for during their stay. Additionally, complimentary internet access and a superlative tapas bar are provided, allowing visitors to unwind and rejuvenate after a protracted day spent away from their domestic sphere and loved ones. Furthermore, when embarking on personal excursions, this hotel would be the author's preferred choice, boasting a prime location in close proximity to public transportation and an array of exquisite dining options.

"Herbs and Spices, Oh My! Indeed, an extensive array of culinary essentials, encompassing an impressive inventory of spices, herbs, and baking requisites, is available at this establishment, and their exceptional quality is undeniable! I shall never squander my financial resources at any other venue specializing in spices or herbs, as those offered by Penzey's are unparalleled and justify their cost. Specifically, I hold their cumin, extracts, vanilla, and almond, as well as their diverse cinnamon varieties, in high esteem, and their remarkable quality warrants every penny spent. Anticipating each visit to the store, I eagerly seek to sample novel items during each excursion, meticulously maintaining a catalog in my spice cabinet to avoid depletion and preclude any need for hasty trips to the grocery store while preparing a meal...for nothing could be more disastrous than running out of my beloved Penzey's spices!"

"Delectable delights! I procured a Groupon and promptly proceeded to partake in their offerings. Despite the limitations in their array, I was fortunate enough to arrive in a timely manner, thereby ensuring an adequate selection. Unbeknownst to me, it was possible to place a special order in conjunction with the Groupon; however, my culinary experience was pleasantly surprising. Assorted flavors such as red velvet, cookies and cream, peanut butter, chocolate, and vanilla tantalized my taste buds. My offspring thoroughly enjoyed these delectable treats, to the extent that they were unable to consume an entire cupcake. The frosting boasted an excessive sweetness, rendering it difficult to devour in its entirety. Nonetheless, the cake itself was incredibly moist and brimming with flavor. These colossal cupcakes presented an exceptional value, given their gargantuan size. The Groupon promotion constituted an unparalleled bargain! The shop's staff exhibited remarkable hospitality, with a particularly amiable gentleman extending assistance and kindness. I shall unquestionably revisit this establishment in the future."

"I have an immense fondness for this particular baseball stadium, which is conveniently situated in the heart of downtown Phoenix, thereby offering an array of amenities and attractions within close proximity. Adjacent to the venue lies the US Airways Center, while the nearby rail system facilitates ease of access for spectators. The surrounding environs are meticulously maintained, exhibiting a palpable vitality, particularly on days when a game is being played. Although parking can sometimes be a challenge, there are numerous lots available within close proximity, including one located approximately a single block away, which offers secure and affordable parking options for a reasonable fee of $7. Upon exiting the stadium, the streets are strategically blocked off, allowing for a seamless and efficient egress, ably assisted by the guidance of law enforcement personnel. 

My personal preference for viewing a game at this venue is seated in the right field bleachers, where an inexplicable allure seems to permeate the atmosphere. Additionally, tickets can be procured for a nominal fee of $25, inclusive of both a hot dog and a beverage. Opting for seats in close proximity to the action on the field enhances my overall enjoyment of the experience, although I do appreciate the opportunity to immerse myself amidst the vibrant crowd, engaging with vendors who often regale spectators with witty banter or humorous anecdotes. On certain evenings, the stadium's retractable roof remains open, contributing to a truly delightful ambiance. Furthermore, post-game festivities, such as fireworks displays, frequently serve as an exhilarating conclusion to an already captivating event. 

In light of the aforementioned attributes, I wholeheartedly endorse experiencing a game at this venue, despite the home team's current lackluster performance."

In keeping with the finest traditions of crate-digging, Record City boasts an impressive collection of vinyl records, encompassing an extensive array of genres and formats, including LPs, picture discs, 45s, and more, both new and pre-owned. As an ardent collector with a penchant for rarities, I hold Record City in high esteem for several reasons. Firstly, the quality of their vinyl offerings is unparalleled, with the vast majority of records exhibiting pristine condition, while the occasional rare gem, such as the elusive Whispers LP on Soul Clock, graces their shelves. Secondly, the breadth and depth of their selection are truly commendable, catering to diverse musical tastes and preferences, including a substantial assortment of rock and R&B albums, complemented by respectable compilations of jazz, country, and classical pieces.  
The unique appeal of Record City lies in its dynamic inventory, which experiences frequent updates and transformations due to the constant influx of visitors from far and wide, ensuring a consistently refreshed selection that never fails to delight. Unlike other local record stores, such as Zia, that may leave you with only a few choice selections, Record City promises an abundant haul, as evidenced by my previous visit, during which I unearthed a treasure trove of six sealed early 70s Motown titles, a pair of coveted Quads that had long eluded me, and an assortment of other intriguing rarities. Given its exceptional quality, diversity, and probability of discovering hidden gems, Record City is an absolute must-visit destination for music enthusiasts in Las Vegas, presenting a genuine opportunity to strike gold without the need to gamble at a casino.

"Most excellent vegetarian'meat' sandwiches I have had the pleasure of consuming outside of my domicile. A vegan cheesesteak, comprised of morning star chicken shreds, and a turkey and slaw, featuring sliced smoked soy-based turkey of exceptional quality, were procured. Fan-tastic! Tasteful! Delightful! Exceptional bread, generous portions, impressive vegan meat alternatives, and courteous staff members...I sincerely wish a establishment of this caliber was situated in close proximity to my place of residence. I would unquestionably partake in their culinary offerings on a nightly basis. Thirteen dollars for a twenty-inch sublime sandwich is truly an unbeatable value."

"Astounding, truly remarkable, and utterly awe-inspiring, this establishment has raised the bar for the hospitality industry, boasting an impressive array of exceptional offerings that have captured the hearts and taste buds of even the most discerning patrons, including yours truly, a seasoned mixologist with fastidious standards, who was thoroughly impressed by the unparalleled quality and presentation of their artisanal cocktails, which, although prepared with meticulous attention to detail and unwavering dedication, took a mere 10 to 15 minutes to arrive, a temporal inconvenience that was more than compensated for by the sheer excellence of the beverages themselves, making each round a veritable odyssey of flavors and sensations, worthy of the most exalted praise and eager anticipation; indeed, this enigmatic watering hole, located in the unlikely environs of West Las Vegas, is a precious gem, hidden away from the glittering lights and frenetic energy of the Strip, waiting to be discovered and savored by those who seek a genuine respite from the mundane and ordinary, offering an unforgettable experience that will leave an indelible mark on even the most jaded of palates."

It was indeed a memorable occasion, specifically pertaining to the fact that all of the vendors showcased their finest offerings while the various organizations highlighted the momentous contributions they make towards the betterment of the Pittsburgh community, with a special mention to Luke Wholey's delectable Mahi Mahi and Vito Girosole's refreshingly unique RED RIBBON soda pop, which elicited my utmost approval; kudos to Rachel and the entire team of YELPERS for orchestrating yet another magnificent gathering.

The chicken kabob entree is my absolute favorite thing to order here.  You get:  1 kabob jam packed with marinated chicken, 1 kabob of marinated mixed vegetables, a huge side of rice pilaf, a heaping of greek salad, and hummus and pita chips.  Talk about bang for your buck!  

The original lamb gyro is my second favorite thing to order here.

Market Grille now has a waitstaff, which I am kind of disappointed in.  I felt the old system of ordering at the register, taking a number, and getting your own drink worked just fine.  

Their customer service is superb, everyone is always very friendly and attentive.  

Tip:  Occasional 15% off coupons for Market Grill inside of the Review Journal.

"Our affection towards Winco is palpable, as it offers a convenient and economical shopping experience, particularly in regards to fresh produce, which has consistently met our expectations. The affordability of milk, priced below $2 per gallon, is also noteworthy. We appreciate the variety of bread options available and find the HyTop brand products to be satisfactory. In contrast, we harbor animosity towards Walmart due to its questionable business practices. However, Winco distinguishes itself by treating its employees with respect and providing exceptional customer service. While it may not be directly comparable to Fry's or Safeway, Winco's unique blend of features makes it an appealing choice for couples seeking reasonable prices without sacrificing quality."

"It is utterly impossible for me to articulate the extent of our profound affection for this picturesque agritourism destination! Our initial visit transpired on the momentous occasion of my son's second birthday, during which we partook in a leisurely hayride and an educational petting zoo tour. We derived immense pleasure from savoring the diverse flavors at the milk bar and personally feeding the friendly animals by hand. Subsequent to acquiring a financial incentive via a Groupon, we opted to become esteemed Dairy Club members. As an ardent enthusiast of gastronomy, I take immense delight in proximity to the origin of our culinary delights and relish the opportunity to sample an array of delectable specialties skillfully concocted by the inventive chefs. A few notable examples include the sublime peanut butter ice cream, the pungent garlic & herb butter, the fiery red pepper aioli, and last but certainly not least, the scrumptious chicken salad that has captured our palates and left us utterly enamored!"

"It is my utmost desire to have procured a more substantial portion of the tortellini salad, as its quality was truly exceptional. Furthermore, the key lime dessert was utterly sublime, boasting a delightful balance between tartness and sweetness. Additionally, I harbor regret for not ordering the apricot pork tenderloin, as its appearance suggested a culinary masterpiece. Nonetheless, my daughter expressed immense satisfaction with her two cookies, which served as a testament to the establishment's commitment to catering to diverse tastes. This eatery undoubtedly constitutes a valuable asset to the local community."

"The allure of Sambalatte lies in its tranquil ambiance, proximity to my abode, and delectable chocolate cappuccinos. As a local patron, I relish the opportunity to frequent this charming establishment, savoring the rich flavors of expertly brewed coffee, tea, and culinary delights amidst a vibrant atmosphere. The inviting setting, replete with complimentary Wi-Fi and a designated workspace for laptop-wielding patrons, fosters an environment conducive to productivity, socializing, or simply enjoying a leisurely respite. Reminiscent of Southern California's laid-back vibe, Sambalatte's stylish Italian-inspired design, complete with a second-floor terrace offering panoramic views of the bustling scene below, sets it apart from the standard coffeehouse experience. If you find yourself in the vicinity with time to spare, I wholeheartedly recommend indulging in Sambalatte's unique charm, unhurried and unencumbered by the frenetic pace often associated with mainstream coffee chains."

"The most exceptional pizza in Arizona, a state known for its culinary diversity and discerning palates, has finally arrived, much to the delight of local residents who have been eagerly anticipating this momentous occasion for an extended period. As former patrons of this esteemed establishment during our residency in Illinois, we can unequivocally attest to the consistent maintenance of exceptional quality and dedication to customer satisfaction that has become synonymous with the Buzzyz brand. Such was our unwavering loyalty to this pizzeria that we opted to relocate to Arizona primarily to indulge in their delectable offerings, thereby forgoing the convenience of having access to their sublime pies in our previous domicile in Illinois. Our sincere gratitude extends to the proprietors of Buzzyz for their steadfast commitment to providing an unparalleled gastronomic experience that continues to impress even the most fastidious aficionados."

"Indubitably, this poker room ranks among the premier top five establishments in Las Vegas, boasting an ample selection of tables, a vibrant atmosphere, and a proficient staff dedicated to ensuring a seamless gaming experience for patrons; it is, without a doubt, my favored destination for engaging in poker-related activities."

"Their arepas possess an unparalleled degree of culinary excellence! It was my inaugural experience indulging in such a delectable dish, and it harmonized flawlessly with my gustatory sensibilities. Although the location is situated at a remove of several miles from the strip, the ambiance of the eatery belies its aged exterior. The arepas are accompanied by two condiments in a bottle, which serve as an ideal accompaniment to the dish, imbuing it with a piquant, savory, and creamy flavor profile that complements the fare exceptionally well. The cashier, George, displayed remarkable patience and knowledge during the ordering process, providing me with a comprehensive understanding of their menu offerings. While the prices may not be considered economical in the classical sense, they are eminently reasonable when juxtaposed against the quality of the cuisine and the exorbitant rates charged by neighboring establishments and buffets along the strip."

This establishment provided a remarkable experience in facilitating my recuperation from a Friday evening on the Las Vegas Strip, surpassing my expectations with their delectable cuisine and exceptional service, culminating in an unforeseen gastronomic epiphany, whereby the Mechilada proved to be the most satisfying iteration I have had the pleasure of consuming, thus efficaciously alleviating the lingering effects of my previous night's indulgences; furthermore, I would highly recommend the Egg Benedict, which serves as an ideal precursor to exploring the surrounding area or engaging in aquatic activities during the summer season.

This establishment is of exceptional quality, it is utterly implausible to surmise that the fare served here is of a plant-based nature, devoid of any animal byproducts. The personnel who work at this venue are consistently cordial and affable, perpetually extending a warm welcome to patrons. It is worth noting that transactions are conducted exclusively in cash, as alternative forms of payment are not accepted.

During my recent visit to this city, I had the privilege of partaking in two distinct culinary experiences, each boasting its unique appeal. The first was a dish consisting of Spam sushi, an amalgamation of contrasting flavors and textures that proved to be an unforgettable experience. The second was an assortment of vegan donuts, expertly crafted to showcase an unparalleled level of gastronomic mastery. These delectable treats were carefully transported and preserved for future consumption, currently residing in a concealed location within my fiancÃ©'s household.

It is noteworthy that the aforementioned donuts, despite their vegan composition, possess an uncanny ability to mimic the taste and texture of their non-vegan counterparts, making them virtually indistinguishable to the untrained palate. It is essential to bear in mind that a visit to this esteemed establishment necessitates the procurement of cash, as other methods of payment are regretfully not acknowledged. Furthermore, it is worth mentioning that the proprietorship of this enterprise is shared by an exceptionally kind and courteous individual, whose amiability serves as a refreshing departure from the customary brusque demeanor often encountered in the city's service industry.

Just finished a wonderful dinner here!  Never had Turkish food before.  Will be coming back soon!  The Kuru Fasulye a white bean and chopped lamb dish was delightful.   The Lentil soup was velvety smooth and seasoned perfectly.   Turkish baklava is softer and chewier than most others, not overly sweet.  MUST have the Turkish coffee with it!   Awesome.   Staff was friendly and welcoming.   I highly recommend it.  Like a mini Mediterranean vaca!

The epitome of culinary excellence, this sushi establishment reigns supreme among its peers, boasting an unparalleled dining experience that transcends the mundane and enters the realm of the sublime. My assertion may seem hyperbolic, but I assure you, it is not; in fact, it is an understatement, for the gastronomical delights served within these hallowed walls are nothing short of ethereal. My taste buds still reverberate with the memory of each exquisite morsel, and my mind struggles to reconcile the fleeting nature of the experience with the indelible impression it has left upon my palate. I implore you, dear reader, to indulge in the special crunch spicy roll, an edible masterpiece that defies mortal comprehension and transcends the boundaries of flavor and texture. It is an odyssey for the senses, a culinary nirvana that will leave you in a state of gastronomical bliss, craving for more.

Dig the food here not fast food but really good food, everything I have tried is so amazing the carnitas burrito delicious the tacos are quality and the street corn reminds me of my trips to Mexico when I was younger.

"Wow" serves as an appropriate introductory phrase to convey my utter amazement and profound enthusiasm regarding this exceptional performance. I must confess that I was thoroughly captivated and deeply moved by the show's unparalleled artistry and musical prowess, which rendered me speechless and struggling to find the appropriate vocabulary to adequately express my unbridled admiration. As a tribute to the legendary music of The Beatles, the production's sonic landscape proved to be an unmitigated triumph, prompting an irresistible urge in both myself and my spouse to move in rhythmic synchrony with the pulsating melodies. Unquestionably, this extraordinary spectacle ascended to the lofty status of the most memorable and awe-inspiring production my wife and I have had the privilege of witnessing, with its unequaled artistic caliber and emotive impact solidifying its position as the crÃ¨me de la crÃ¨me of Cirque du Soleil performances.

I believe I have discovered a new culinary gem in Uptown Waterloo, and I am somewhat dismayed that it has taken me until my final year at Waterloo to explore this hidden treasure. My curiosity and desire to sample novel gastronomic experiences led me to visit this establishment with a companion a fortnight ago. Upon entering, I was immediately struck by the unpretentious charm of the venue, which boasts a unique character that is both endearing and inviting. The staff members were incredibly cordial and accommodating, eagerly addressing any queries regarding the menu. I opted for the eggplant parmesan, accompanied by a glass of water (I was behind the wheel, thus necessitating a postponement of my assessment of their mixed drinks until a future visit). While I have had the pleasure of savoring eggplant parmesan on previous occasions, I can confidently assert that this particular rendition ranks among the finest I have encountered, perhaps even occupying a lofty position within the top three. Presented in the form of a sandwich, the dish was bursting with flavor and complemented by a side of marinara sauce, much to my delight, as I am not partial to sodden bread. The ambiance of the eatery was tranquil during our Tuesday evening visit at 7 pm, preceding the arrival of the bar crowd. For those seeking a peaceful dining experience, I would recommend visiting during this time frame, and I eagerly anticipate the opportunity to sample their cocktail selection in the near future.

"Upon entering the city limits on a Saturday evening, following a grueling sixteen-hour journey behind the wheel, my trusty vehicle began to emit an array of distress signals, specifically pertaining to the oil and coolant levels. In light of this predicament, and considering the economic advantages of purchasing a pre-owned automobile over a brand-new model, I opted to administer a prompt dosage of coolant to my faithful steed. However, in my haste, I failed to properly research the precise type and quantity of coolant required by my aging vehicle, leading to a state of utter panic and confusion. Subsequently, I hastily consulted the owner's manual and scoured online forums dedicated to the specific make and model of my car, desperately seeking guidance on the appropriate coolant variety and concentration. Fortunately, a chance encounter with a knowledgeable and accommodating sales representative at Zimbrick alleviated my concerns, as he not only verified the compatibility of the coolant I had on hand but also furnished me with the necessary oil grade and offered salient advice on ensuring my vehicle's optimal performance and safety during the remainder of my travels. The transaction concluded with a cordial exchange, leaving me feeling content and appreciative."

I love DB! I am consistently served great tasting coffee with superior customer service!  I have no complaints. I was already in love with DB, and then I saw the special on Undercover Boss, and it confirmed my appreciation for this business. Had I known about this company when I was in high school, I would have worked for them!

We love this place. Very clean, excellent customer service and most importantly, the food is amazing. They make their own delicious pasta, cheese and sauces, all of their ingredients are fresh (hence the name of the place) and the macaroons are to die for. We will definitely be back.

I had the pleasure of utilizing the services of Lucky Me Pet Care during my previous absence from home, and I must say that the experience was nothing short of exceptional. The canines under their supervision appeared to be in a state of utmost contentment, and the detailed notes left by the staff provided me with a sense of assurance that my pets were receiving the highest quality care. The peace of mind that came with knowing that my furry friends were in the capable hands of Heather and her team was truly invaluable.
