It's a ten: great prices, fresh ingredients, and awesome service. I'm thrilled that I found this gem in South Charlotte! :)

I possess familial ties in Las Vegas, and it is imperative that we pay a visit to this location during our sojourn, specifically at the midpoint of our stay and immediately prior to our departure. The culinary item known as carne asada fries is of exceptional quality, and the shrimp burrito is similarly impressive.

"Indubitably, my culinary inclinations gravitate towards Beef Stand, whereupon I relish their delectable cheese fries and savory meatball sub. Although their Italian beef and hot dogs are palatable, my gastronomical satisfaction is principally satiated by the aforementioned duo. Notwithstanding, my sole criticism pertains to the structural integrity of the meatball sub, which tends to disintegrate into an amalgamation of two humongous meatballs, accompanied by a modicum of bread and sauce. Perhaps, this anomaly contributes to the overall appeal? Regardless, it precipitates a predicament for me, as I frequently depart the establishment with a conspicuous crimson stain embellishing my attire, thereby rendering my sartorial choices somewhat restricted."

Our lodging faced the shopping venue of Bellagio, which presented an unmitigated ordeal. I am convinced that upon my demise, the celestial realm will manifest itself in a manner akin to this (Chanel, Prada, Louis, Dior, Tiffany's), such that it shall serve as a constant reminder of the transcendent nature of luxury. When my acquaintance intimated that she was contemplating the acquisition of a Prada bag, my countenance assumed a hue of envy so profound that it bordered on the precipice of mortality.

Thus, we ventured forth into the establishment, whereupon we encountered a sales associate by the name of Charles Punzal, whose demeanor was nothing short of angelic. His patience and dedication to our needs were tantamount to a veritable blessing, as he assiduously presented us with an array of color options in saffiano leather totes, thereby facilitating our decision-making process to a most appreciable extent. Ultimately, we departed the premises with a stunning, black purse that exuded an aura of timeless elegance.

I would unhesitatingly endorse a visit to this emporium, and, in particular, solicit the assistance of Charles, should one harbor an inclination towards investing in an article of luxury that shall confer upon its proprietor a state of unadulterated bliss.

Home away from home. Great selection of Cigars, wrist watches and shaving products. Great place to hang out and have a smoke and watch sports on 6 large tv screens. No membership fees and you can also store you collection in the back room free of charge. Highly recommend Cigar King.

Under the meticulous care of Dr. Glassman, patients can anticipate receiving empathetic and comprehensive medical attention, as he manifests an unwavering commitment to ensuring their well-being and comfort. Through his unhurried approach, he fosters an environment where individuals feel valued and respected, dedicating sufficient time to address their concerns and elucidate complex medical concepts in a manner that is readily digestible for laypeople. Furthermore, Dr. Glassman's team exhibits a similar level of dedication and warmth, as they greet patients with sincere cordiality and strive to create a welcoming atmosphere, thereby enhancing the overall quality of the medical experience. Based on these factors, it is highly recommended that individuals seeking exceptional healthcare services consider Dr. Glassman as their primary care physician.

This establishment offers an exceptional dining experience, which I have had the pleasure of indulging in on multiple occasions for business luncheons. The pizzas are generously portioned, sufficient for a single individual or easily shareable with a side salad, which is also quite substantial. The menu items exude freshness in both appearance and taste, and I particularly appreciate the option to customize my pizza with an unlimited number of toppings without incurring additional charges. Although the queue may temporarily extend during peak hours, similar to a Chipotle, the pizza preparation time remains remarkably efficient, completed within a mere three minutes thanks to the utilization of a high-powered 550-degree oven. Furthermore, I have yet to encounter any difficulties securing a table, even when the line is lengthy. In my opinion, this pizza surpasses the quality of 90% of the pizzas I have sampled elsewhere, making it well-deserving of a perfect five-star rating. My only desire is for this superb eatery to establish a location closer to my residence.

This establishment has irrevocably tarnished my perception of all other Chinese restaurants, rendering them inferior by comparison. My culinary exploration at this venue has been exhaustive, encompassing every item on the menu that I could articulate and even a few that I couldn't.

The indispensable dish that reigns supreme at this restaurant is the tofu flower complemented by a spicy Szechuan sauce, served with either pork or chicken submerged in a rich broth constituted of dried, fried whole chilies. Although the portion size has diminished slightly, it remains a generous serving that warrants every last morsel of discomfort you may endure the following day. You'll likely develop a fondness for the sensation. I suggest requesting a side dish of steamed broccoli (not listed on the menu) to harmonize with the entree.

Additional exceptional options include the seafood sizzling rice, cumin beef, Szechuan peppercorn-infused dishes, green beans and pork, and the shallot beef. Each dish boasts an unparalleled level of quality. However, it's imperative to recognize that when the menu emphasizes cumin (or any other spice/flavor), it's a guarantee of its potency.

Rating Scale:
1 Star: Avoid the town in which this place is located altogether.
2 Star: Proceed with caution.
3 Star: Willing to dine here again or consume in a pinch.
4 Star: Frequent patronage, given financial and caloric feasibility.
5 Star: Comfortable introducing fellow gourmands to this establishment.

"Bun Bo Hue, an unparalleled culinary delight, serves as the quintessential representation of a savory experience that transcends the boundaries of gastronomical satisfaction. It is indeed a rarity to encounter a restaurant that successfully showcases such a profound harmony of flavors, thus making this establishment a veritable gem in the realm of epicurean indulgence. My unequivocal endorsement of this eatery stems from my unwavering conviction that it offers an unrivaled gustatory adventure, one that will unquestionably entice my return."

I am utterly perplexed by the solitary star rating displayed herein, as my personal experience at Espada's Bike Shop was diametrically opposed to such an unflattering assessment. As a novice cyclist and triathlete seeking to enhance my understanding of bicycle maintenance, I was cognizant of the fact that my gears were functioning in a less than optimal manner, and my suspicions fell squarely on the derailleur. However, my limited knowledge rendered me incapable of effecting the necessary repairs on my own, thus necessitating the assistance of a professional possessing a more comprehensive understanding of the intricacies involved. Harboring apprehensions regarding the potential for exploitation due to my amateurish status and the fact that my bicycle was a second-hand Trek, I pursued reviews of reputable establishments catering to the needs of cyclists within my vicinity. Serendipity led me to Espada's, boasting an impressive array of favorable testimonials on Yelp, conveniently situated in the heart of NoDa. Despite the occasional difficulty in securing parking, akin to other locations in the area, I readily discovered the shop, housing both an art gallery and jewelry store in addition to the bike shop itself. Upon entering, I noted that the ambiance was a harmonious blend of artistry and cycling paraphernalia, with Steve, the proprietor, displaying a reserved demeanor yet proffering insightful responses to my queries without hesitation. My bike underwent a thorough examination forthwith, and I availed myself of the opportunity to peruse the surrounding artwork as I awaited the completion of the repairs. Refraining from condescension or any attempt to upsell unwarranted items, Steve's approach was consummate professionalism personified. Thus, I wholeheartedly endorse espousing your support for this locally owned bike shop, and capitalizing on the chance to appreciate the artistic embellishments while your steed is being attended to.

Where do I initiate the narration of my extraordinary encounter? It is imperative that I commence with the creative and resourceful mixologist, Daniel, who was orchestrating the beverage establishment during June's absence. My goodness! The assortment of potions that he skillfully concocted, particularly the top-secret recipe that I am unable to disclose, were utterly breathtaking and left me in absolute awe! Throughout the entire duration of our visit, Daniel demonstrated exceptional proficiency in his art, seamlessly blending an array of flavors and ingredients to create an unparalleled drinking experience. The ambiance was further enhanced by the talented pianist, Spidoni, whose melodious performances captivated our attention and contributed to the overall enjoyment of our evening. In light of the limited seating capacity, it is advisable to arrive promptly to ensure an optimal experience. My husband and I felt extremely fortunate to have had Daniel's undivided attention for the majority of our visit, creating an atmosphere that was both intimate and exclusive. Without a doubt, this excursion ranks among the most memorable and impressive adventures I have had the pleasure of experiencing, and I eagerly anticipate the opportunity to revisit this exceptional establishment in the near future.

"The culmination of a prolonged period of exhaustion can be effectively alleviated by partaking in a delectable dish comprising macaroni and cheese, accompanied by a sophisticated beverage such as a martini, within an establishment featuring a musical ambiance that does not disappoint."

As a local, it would be utterly nonsensical for me to visit Planet Hollywood for a sandwich, so my 5-star rating should not be misinterpreted as an assertion that I would regularly frequent their establishment; rather, it is based on a comparative analysis of convenience and price relative to the typical offerings found within a Las Vegas casino. At a mere $6, it would be challenging to locate a superior sandwich on the Vegas strip, although it is by no means the most exceptional sandwich I have had the pleasure of consuming. Nevertheless, Earl of Sandwich offers a satisfying culinary experience, characterized by warm bread, delectable meat, and reasonably prompt service. Additionally, the location's proximity to the Sports Book presents an advantage, enabling patrons to conveniently enjoy a sandwich while watching a game. 

I concur with Misti's observation regarding the absence of options pertaining to bread, toppings, and sauces, which includes the conspicuous lack of oil and vinegar, a fundamental component in sandwich shops. The sandwich itself is not excessively filling, which can be perceived as either beneficial or detrimental, contingent upon one's perspective. If planning to attend a performance such as Peepshow, a light meal from Earl may be advisable to avoid discomfort during the show. My personal preference is the Full Montagu (I believe), consisting of turkey and roast beef, which has consistently met my expectations, and I have yet to encounter any errors in my orders.

Cornerstone, a colossal ecclesiastical edifice, aptly earns the appellation of a "Mega Church" due to its imposing magnitude. However, the intriguing aspect lies in how its vastness facilitates the creation of a tailored experience for each individual. Despite the possibility of attending Sunday services weekly for a year without encountering the same person twice, the church offers a diverse array of classes, small churches, support groups, and other assemblies that cater to various preferences and stages of life. Those seeking a more intimate community can find their niche, while others desiring the anonymity of a large congregation can also do so, all amidst a warm and welcoming atmosphere.  
Cornerstone boasts a multitude of amenities, including a coffee shop and bookstore, abundant volunteer opportunities, gender-specific ministries, retreats, mission trips, exceptional worship leaders, and sermons that delve deep into biblical teachings while relating them to contemporary life. Additionally, the church provides meticulously designed programs for children, staffed by background-checked, well-trained personnel who enthusiastically impart the week's biblical lesson to your little ones. Even infants just weeks old are welcome, while older children enjoy engaging activities during the services. To explore this dynamic spiritual hub, attend a service, and visit the information booths for further guidance.

"This marked our maiden visit to this esteemed culinary establishment, and we relished a truly remarkable dining experience, courtesy of the warm hospitality of our chef and server, who manifested an unwavering commitment to ensuring our satisfaction. The fare was indeed exceptional, boasting an array of delectable options such as fried rice, chicken, New York steak, filet mignon, shrimp, and lobster. Particularly noteworthy were the filet mignon and shrimp offerings, which proved to be the most sumptuous and flavorful that I have had the pleasure of indulging in... unquestionably a must-try for gastronomes seeking an epicurean adventure. It is worth mentioning that our youthful offspring, aged seven, was similarly enamored with the culinary delights presented before him, evincing an unbridled enthusiasm that bordered on fervor, and imploring us to return at the earliest convenience. Rest assured, we shall indeed revisit this gastronomic haven in the near future."

"The ambiance of this terminal has undergone a considerable transformation, becoming significantly more pleasant and hospitable compared to its previous state, although still falling short of perfection. The local populace exudes warmth and friendliness, fostering a sense of comfort and security. A diverse array of commercial establishments and culinary options are available, affording me the opportunity to indulge in some retail therapy during the interval preceding my flight, thereby enhancing my overall experience."
Really beautiful place. Must go see - herb garden - TOUCH N FEEL was really good. Otherwise really big place and definitely can cater to an event. Thai Garden was also good.

"My affection for Merc Bar is unwavering, as it exudes an air of sophistication and elegance, boasting plush seating and an exceptional team of mixologists who craft innovative cocktails that deliver a potent punch, thereby justifying the slightly elevated prices. Moreover, this establishment flaunts a dual presence, with a sibling venue in New York City, and fosters a convivial ambiance that encourages patrons to engage in joyful table dancing, further enhancing its appeal."

Last year, Allan Wolper conducted an in-depth interview with Natalie Bauman, a prominent figure in the rare book industry and owner of Bauman Rare Books, which was featured on the website of WBGO, a renowned public radio station. To access the interview, please follow this link and navigate to the lower portion of the webpage, where it can be found among other archived interviews conducted by Mr. Wolper: http://www.wbgo.org/news/ondemand/wolperArchives.php.

I have no idea why this place has 3.5 stars... I thought the place was absolutely amazing!  I get it that these are some expensive burgers... but they are also very VERY delicious! This IS Vegas, and for Vegas I thought the price was pretty reasonable.

I had the Tenderloin Rossini under the Tiny Buns section.  They were two mini burgers of BEEF MEDALLION WITH FOIE GRAS, WILD MUSHROOM, ARUGULA AND TRUFFLE MAYO.  It was so good... It was a perfect portion too!

Other burgers that I recommend are the Rising Sun and Duck Duck Goose.

It's casual, its comfortable, and definitely a perfect place to go to if you want to avoid bougie and expensive restaurants on the strip.  I thought the service was great... I'm sure other people had different experience with the service depending on what server they got, but ours was very nice :)

"Several years ago, my sibling recounted an anecdote regarding a group of affluent individuals from New York who sought to indulge in a culinary experience provided by a local delicatessen while luxuriating in their poolside cabana. These gastronomes yearned for a taste of genuine New York-style delicacies and Italian cuisine amidst the glamour of Las Vegas. We thus embarked upon an exploratory venture to sample the fare offered by this esteemed establishment. It is with great pride that I attest that, even after half a decade has elapsed, this eatery remains a steadfast favorite of mine within the city's culinary landscape. This enduring affection extends beyond the delectable victuals themselves, as the proprietors, Julia and her kin, epitomize hospitality. Regardless of the duration of one's absence â?be it a day, a week, or several months â?they take great pleasure in engaging in conversation, inquiring about one's well-being, and radiating warmth with their endearing smiles. Such a welcoming ambiance permeates the menu, featuring freshly prepared sauces daily, authentic New York-style pizza pies, succulent garlic knots, and those mouthwatering arancini. My initial visits to Cugino's preceded the widespread availability of these savory rice balls, necessitating a request or advance ordering. Now, I unwaveringly opt for the larger variety, replete with a flavorful filling. Patrons partaking in a meal on the premises should entreat the staff to warm the arancini, graciously blanketed in sauce and melted cheese for an unparalleled gustatory indulgence. From a straightforward dish of spaghetti to the linguini showcasing clams, every offering maintains an impressive level of quality, arriving steaming hot and freshness personified."

"The supreme quality of the pizza served at this establishment is unparalleled within the vicinity of Summerlin, boasting an abundance of fresh toppings and a delectable flavor profile that transcends the mundane and mediocre offerings of its competitors. While the cost may be slightly elevated, the culinary experience it provides renders it a worthwhile investment for those seeking a truly satisfying gastronomical indulgence."
Partying all night in Vegas would not be complete without a night at Drais! Hot hot crowd. Coool people. Easy to get in. Not easy to leave.

"Although my dining experience at this establishment was generally satisfactory, there was a certain je ne sais quoi lacking in the ambiance that prevented it from attaining absolute perfection; however, the culinary offerings were undoubtedly intriguing and distinctive, and the hospitality we received from James, our server, was truly exceptional, elevating our visit to an even more memorable level. Despite some reservations regarding the ambiance, I would unhesitatingly endorse this restaurant based on the strength of its gastronomic delights and outstanding customer service."

Loved my experience at Nevada Nails! Diem did a great job on my nails and was so nice and personable. Definitely made a mani/pedi even more enjoyable. I loved how many colors they had to choose from - lots of regular polish colors and hundreds of gel colors, including Rockstar. They have a special right now for a gel mani/reg pedi for $45, which is a great price. I can't wait to go back and be pampered again!

It is my utmost pleasure to express my profound gratitude towards such an extraordinary group of individuals, whose remarkable attributes, including their unwavering independence and unparalleled capacity for teamwork, have left me in absolute awe. The exceptional manner in which they have seamlessly blended their autonomous nature with an unwavering commitment to collaborative effort has been nothing short of astonishing. Furthermore, I must say that the cutting-edge box and innovative programming that we had the privilege of experiencing were truly captivating and thought-provoking. My sincere appreciation extends to Joe, who played an instrumental role in orchestrating this extraordinary experience.

"Indulged in the delectable Fried Chicken, meticulously cooked to achieve an optimal degree of culinary excellence, characterized by an irresistible combination of succulent juiciness, golden-brown crispness, and an unparalleled intensity of flavor; the hospitable crew, proficient in their art, ensured a seamless dining experience, marked by prompt and attentive service, tailored to satisfy the discerning palates of patrons, thereby eliciting an unwavering endorsement, enthusiastically encouraging prospective gastronomes to partake in the epicurean indulgence, should the opportunity arise."

"Indubitably, it is an indisputable fact that this establishment provides an unparalleled level of customer satisfaction, boasting a consistent quality of beverages that is simply unmatched. As a regular patron, I can unequivocally attest that the exceptional caliber of service rendered by Cory and Lexi during the morning hours is truly impressive, their proficiency and dedication to their craft being a testament to the high standards upheld by this enterprise. Moreover, the attention to detail exhibited by these diligent individuals is nothing short of remarkable, as they have demonstrated an uncanny ability to recall my preferred beverage with unwavering accuracy, even going so far as to have it prepared and awaiting my arrival at the window. Such extraordinary efforts have not gone unnoticed, and I must express my heartfelt gratitude for the sheer convenience and pleasure afforded by their exceptional service. It is indeed fortunate that this business has chosen to establish itself in Phoenix, as it has undoubtedly enriched the local community by providing a veritable oasis for those seeking a superior coffee experience."

Yum! I was visiting Montreal and my friend suggested this place. Delicious burgers, sandwiches, fries, salads and beers! Mmm. Everything is reasonably priced. I had the Bac'n'Cheese burger with half fries and half salad and it was sinfully delectable!\n\nDefinitely good bang for your buck! Hit this place up if you're in the area!

After perusing the plethora of unfavorable remarks regarding their clientele assistance, I was hesitant to enter their establishment this afternoon; however, having frequented their London and Swiss locations, my affection for the brand remained unwavering. To my surprise, all my trepidations proved unwarranted, as the young women assisting me were meticulously accommodating, particularly the individual stationed in the changing area, who devoted nearly two hours of her time to ensuring a seamless experience for me. The entire staff demonstrated exceptional efficiency in locating the appropriate sizes, resulting in an overall satisfying visit.
best apple experience ever! Super quick and easy. I had a broken screen and was given a brand new phone under warranty. Byrd is the best, very friendly and knowledgable !!

"Although Dreyer's ice cream is ubiquitous and readily accessible, its gustatory qualities seem to be enhanced when positioned between two freshly baked cookies, thereby creating a culinary experience that transcends mere convenience. Furthermore, the ability to choose between two distinct cookie flavors, such as double chocolate chip and red velvet, further elevates the enjoyment of this delectable treat. In my case, I opted for the peanut butter cup ice cream variety, which was strategically situated between the two aforementioned cookies, thus creating a harmonious balance of flavors and textures. As I leisurely consumed this delightful sandwich while strolling past the nearby hobo drawing photos, I couldn't help but appreciate the friendly demeanor of the staff member who had assisted me, as well as the exceptional value of this indulgence, which was a mere $2."

I discovered George's through my restaurant.com coupon.  My girlfriend and I ordered two original Gyros.  I had the fries and she had the salad.  We also ordered the fried mushrooms and jalopeno poppers.  The fried appetizers came out first.  And they were perfect!  We have had fried mushrooms in the past that were dripping in grease or still frozen in the middle.  These were absolutely done to perfection.  They were crispy and seasoned without leaving you feeling greasy.  The gyros and fries were also well done.  The portions were generous for the price.  This is my new Gyro spot for sure.

My better half had perused that the bar at the Capital Grille possessed an impressive menu, and subsequent to investigating the surveys, it seemed, by all accounts, to be a decent decision. We went to the eatery and were welcomed by an exceptionally attentive hostess who quickly started to situate us. We asked whether we could sit in the bar and she said indeed and seated us in the bar. 
  The bar was uninhabited, as the eatery had quite recently opened, yet there was a mixologist there getting ready for the day. She welcomed us warmly and brought us the menus. She then clarified the different things on the menu that we inquired about and took our requests. As she was withdrawing, my significant other made a remark to me about my birthday, yet I didn't have the foggiest idea that the mixologist had heard the comment. 
  The mixologist then brought us our wine and hors d'oeuvres, which were amazing. We attempted the Ahi Tuna Sashimi, which was mind-blowing. Afterward, we had the Capital Grille Burger and truffle fries, which were likewise amazing. For dessert, we had the flourless chocolate cake, and indeed, it was amazing, particularly with a glass of port. 
  After an extraordinary feast, the check was conveyed to us, and at that point, the mixologist said that it was my birthday and that they perceived this and gave our hors d'oeuvres and the dessert at no expense; what a fantastic thing to hear. 
  We had an extraordinary time, extraordinary nourishment, extraordinary wine, and remarkable administration. We will return.

"Wayne, oh, Wayne-your culinary team's proficiency and dedication to providing an exceptional dining experience at Greasewood for our bar mitzvah Shabbat dinner were truly remarkable. The delectable fare and convivial ambiance you orchestrated not only met but exceeded our expectations. Of equal importance was the meticulous attention given to accommodating our multiple severe food allergies, which engendered a sense of security and peace of mind for our guests. Your unwavering commitment to ensuring their well-being was genuinely appreciated. The evening's success cannot be overstated; it was utterly flawless. We are deeply indebted to you and your staff for their tireless efforts and unparalleled hospitality. It is our fervent hope that this unique eatery, a veritable treasure trove of gastronomical delights, will continue to thrive and remain a vital part of Scottsdale's culinary landscape."

Thank you, Nikko, for the most delectable sushi we have savored in recent times! The exceptional valet parking service accorded us a sense of exclusivity, which was further enhanced by the convivial ambiance of the establishment. Upon being seated at the sushi bar, we relished a delightful sampler platter, comprising an assortment of sashimi, nigiri sushi, and a tantalizing slightly spicy tuna roll. For two ravenous individuals, the Sushi/Sashimi Omakase presented remarkable value at approximately $36. Additionally, we shared Age Dashi Tofu with Shrimp, which was served scorching hot, immersed in an extraordinarily rich and savory dashi broth, nearly rivaling the intensity of beef. The house sake was also quite palatable.

The atmosphere at this venue is truly captivating, making it an ideal setting for a sophisticated evening out. The modern and stylish decor creates an environment that is both elegant and welcoming, allowing even casually attired patrons like ourselves to feel comfortable. The sushi bar exudes vitality and merriment, while the spotless and well-organized prep line showcases the culinary team's dedication to precision and cleanliness. Freshness of the fish is of utmost importance, and the skilled chefs adhere to the highest standards in their preparation. Kudos to the ownership and management for their commitment to excellence.

On Fridays and Saturdays, the ambiance transforms around 7:30 or 8 pm, as the lighting alters and the DJ initiates their mix, creating an energetic and lively atmosphere. While the music can become quite vibrant, it only adds to the festive spirit of Nikko, which boasts some of the finest energy in Charlotte. Overall, this dining establishment ranks among the city's premier choices.

"ASTOUNDING!!!!! Succinctly put, there's no necessity to indulge you with an elaborate narrative. Instead, a cursory examination of the YouTube video showcasing the culinary network will furnish you with a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter."

"I have had the pleasure of visiting this establishment on multiple occasions, and each time, I have been thoroughly impressed. Despite its modest appearance, this restaurant truly excels in the aspects that matter most. The quality of the ingredients utilized in their culinary creations is exceptionally high, resulting in an unparalleled freshness and flavor that is sure to delight even the most discerning palate. Additionally, the prices are remarkably reasonable, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a satisfying dining experience without breaking the bank. I would highly recommend that you sample one of the'specialty' items from their menu for each member of your party and request that they be served consecutively, allowing you to partake in a delightful sharing experience. This approach enables you to indulge in a greater variety of dishes, savor an array of flavors, and enjoy a convivial meal with your companions. Furthermore, I suggest starting your culinary journey with a few bites of their delectable papaya salad and crispy spring rolls to whet your appetite before embarking on the main event. In conclusion, this eatery holds a special place in my heart, and I wholeheartedly endorse it to anyone seeking a truly memorable dining adventure."

"My spouse and I thoroughly enjoy dining at this establishment.  The hospitality we receive during each visit is consistently exceptional, and every culinary creation we have sampled thus far has been utterly delectable.  In particular, I find the shrimp and grits and the shrimp poboy to be of notable excellence.  In fact, the latter dish rivals those I savored during my residency in New Orleans.  My partner takes great pleasure in consuming the occasional special of scallops, which is invariably prepared to perfection.  Moreover, our six-year-old progeny finds the ambiance and fare provided by this eatery to be particularly appealing, and on a recent visit, she displayed an unwavering enthusiasm for engaging with the hostess, ultimately establishing a rapport akin to that of close acquaintances.  Furthermore, the chef demonstrated an equally warm and welcoming demeanor when interacting with our inquisitive and affable offspring.  It is evident that the staff at large takes great pride in their work, as they exhibit a fervent dedication to ensuring a satisfying experience for all patrons, including those of a tender age."

Such a wonderful exhibit! I came here with high hopes and they were far exceeded. The entire exhibit is so well put together. Touching a \"real\" iceberg to feel how cold it is. They have the perfect mix of Science and History in here, the way the museum leads you from one point to the next is so surreal. You have an entirely new understanding when you leave. The ending board where you see if you lived or died is especially interesting!

"It is imperative that I extend gratitude towards my spouse in this particular instance. Due to our recent acquisition of improved insurance coverage, I suggested to my husband that it would be judicious to transition to a different dental care provider. He was in dire need of a thorough cleaning prior to the culmination of the current year, thus I encouraged him to seek out a suitable practitioner with a sense of urgency. This was approximately one week ago. I must admit that I was rather impressed by my husband's proficiency in locating an adept dental office, as well as his success in securing an appointment for me on the very same day. The front office staff demonstrated a remarkable level of efficiency and friendliness during our interaction, while my hygienist, Deann, exhibited a commendable degree of professionalism and cordiality. Furthermore, the doctor who performed the routine examination assured me that in the event of an unexpected emergency, he would be the individual responding to the call, thereby eliminating the need to contend with an answering service. This aspect is truly remarkable, although I sincerely hope that I will not be compelled to avail myself of such services in the future."

"I was in pursuit of an exceptional familial spring break activity, and my quest culminated successfully with the discovery of an optimal experience. My clan and I, being novice equestrians, did not seek an arduous, all-encompassing adventure; rather, we desired a brief yet memorable excursion. The 1.5-hour ride proved to be the ideal duration, offering us the opportunity to appreciate the picturesque landscape, magnificent steeds, and hospitable staff without feeling overwhelmed or exhausted. Our guide, Dave, demonstrated remarkable proficiency in illuminating regional historical landmarks, flora, and other points of interest, while exhibiting commendable patience and understanding in his interactions with my juvenile offspring, aged 9 and 12 respectively."
Best start to my days and always a favorite amongst visiting family and friends. Can't beat the cupcakes or breakfast! Also a great place to drink coffee, relax, hangout or study.

I was cognizant of the fact that I was not experiencing an altered state of consciousness when I witnessed a slender, dancing banana at the social gathering I attended last night, as I was in a state of sobriety, and it was also Halloween. However, in the midst of a post-Halloween funk and Sunday blues combination, I began to ponder if perhaps I had been surreptitiously administered a psychoactive substance last night, when Mr. Incredible, who was also present at the gathering, greeted me at Pink Spot. To maintain his anonymity, I shall refrain from disclosing his identity, but the culinary creation he prepared for me, consisting of a sandwich with a bread roll made from wheat flour, containing a mixture of tomato, egg, bacon, avocado, sprouts, and American cheese, accompanied by a beverage made from espresso and cocoa powder, and enriched with free Wi-Fi, proved to be a veritable panacea for my despondent state. I shall confer a rating of five stars upon this establishment, as they have achieved something that transcends considerations of gustatory pleasure, cost, and ambiance, namely, they have served up a copious portion of bonhomie. Moreover, it would not be inappropriate to augment their star count slightly, in light of the unfortunate review bestowed upon them by Megan D, who appears to be a peripatetic critic, traversing Phoenix and meting out dissatisfactory assessments with abandon. Wait... return to that felicitous place, Dugaldo. Felicitous place. Pink Spot.

"My gastronomical experience at this esteemed establishment was thoroughly enjoyable, as I had the pleasure of consuming their delectable lamb dumplings, which were replete with an array of flavors that tantalized my taste buds and left me in a state of culinary satisfaction. Furthermore, the hospitality displayed by the staff was of the highest quality, as they exhibited a warm and welcoming demeanor that made me feel valued and appreciated. Additionally, the traditional Chinese seaweed served as a salad was a delightful accompaniment to the main course, and its unique texture and flavor profile further enhanced the overall dining experience. Suffice it to say, I shall return to this venue in the future, primarily to partake in the delicious salad that has left an indelible mark on my palate."

"Discussion regarding assortment and superior quality is warranted when referencing this exceptional establishment specializing in smoking paraphernalia! The vast array of choices available at this smoke shop is truly impressive, with an emphasis on showcasing a diverse range of products that cater to discerning patrons seeking premium items. Additionally, the venue features an art gallery, further enhancing the overall experience for visitors. While more affordable options are available for those on a limited budget, the primary focus lies in offering high-end pieces that double as masterful works of art. Furthermore, the store offers caps for graffiti artists and a refrigerator stocked with delectable Arizona beverages for customers to enjoy."

We ate here on a Friday night and were able to get right in. The food was quick and fantastic! I wanted to take three more orders to go. If I had the room in my hotel mini fridge I would have. Noodles were cooked perfectly. The pot stickers were made from scratch which is hard to find sometimes. The fried wontons were filled with something other then cream cheese which was a really nice change. The sake was one of the best we've ever had. Would recommend this place to everyone.

I have been coming here for 6 years and have always had an amazing experience.  The bartenders are always friendly - and in the dinning room, Jen is an absolute amazing person to have serve you.   Also, way cheaper for quality drinks right next to the strip.

"Upon receiving a recommendation from Lindsay, my trusted source for culinary explorations, I had the pleasure of experiencing an exceptional dining escapade at this captivating steakhouse. As we entered the eatery, we were immediately enveloped in an ambiance reminiscent of the sophisticated and glamorous era depicted in the hit television series 'Mad Men,' further heightening our anticipation for the delectable fare awaiting us. The gastronomical offerings did not disappoint; in fact, they surpassed our expectations with their unparalleled quality and presentation. Specifically, the tender and juicy steak, complemented by the rich flavors of the bean chili/soup, left an indelible mark on our palates. Additionally, the earthy, savory mushrooms served as an exquisite accompaniment to the main course, contributing to the overall excellence of the meal. Our dining experience was further enhanced by the warmth and attentiveness of the staff, with Patti, our server, playing a pivotal role in ensuring that every aspect of our visit was tailored to perfection. Her proficiency, cordiality, and effervescent personality not only elevated our dining experience but also fostered a sense of belonging, making us feel like valued patrons rather than mere customers. My gratitude extends to all the staff members who contributed to creating such a memorable evening."

"Upon entering this establishment, we were met with an unforeseen revelation, stemming from a referral by an acquaintance, which subsequently surpassed our expectations. This venue boasts a contemporary, stylish ambiance that harmoniously complements its delectable Thai-inspired cuisine, which, while not entirely customary, undoubtedly constitutes a resounding success. We eagerly anticipate our next visit."

Usually when I expect something to be amazing it sucks. This place was actually as good as I thought it would be. I ordered the famous chicken and waffles :) good stuff...between my sis and I we barely finished it. The place is good.. def worth a try and I def would go again when I'm in Vegas.

"Love it. 
Great Place, nice Location. 
 Maybe a happy Hour Would be Great. ;-) 
 Manager i forgot his Name greeted us promptly and seated us immediately, exhibiting exceptional hospitality. He thoroughly explained the menu, offering helpful recommendations. 
 Out waiter Ron or Ross??? I believe Ross was our waiter, and he provided diligent and attentive service. 
 Food: We opted for the delectable pizza and savory mushrooms. The culinary experience was sublime. 
 Salat was Great Too. 
 Sizes are generous and ideal for sharing. 
 We eagerly anticipate our next visit."

"I arrived at this esteemed establishment in the company of multiple individuals and we proceeded to order an array of beverages, including mixed drinks and shots, accompanied by an assortment of delectable steaks, encompassing various cuts and sizes, as well as a selection of sides. The steak, I must say, was utterly exquisite, its tenderness and flavor tantamount to nothing short of culinary perfection. My dining companion and I shared a 16-ounce New York strip, and our palates were thoroughly satiated, even after consuming every last morsel of the succulent medium-rare meat. We also sampled some of the other patrons' filets, which, to our delight, proved to be equally as delectable. While the sides, including creamed spinach, potatoes, asparagus, and macaroni and cheese, were certainly satisfying, it is undeniable that the main attraction was, without a doubt, the exceptional quality of the meat. Furthermore, the service we received was both cordial and efficient, our server possessing a pair of well-toned arms, and the cocktails were robust and expertly crafted. Although the prices charged for the pleasure of dining at this upscale venue are indeed substantial, one cannot help but acknowledge that the experience warrants such a tariff, given the superior quality of the cuisine and the overall ambiance of the establishment."

I have been patronizing Don & Charlies for an extensive period of time, and I must say that the culinary offerings and hospitality have been remarkably consistent, which is truly impressive. The creamy coleslaw, liver, Seattle Salmon, and particularly the pork ribs have all been delectable options that never fail to satisfy my gastronomical cravings. Moreover, the memorabilia adorning the walls serves as an exceptional enhancement to the overall dining experience, reminiscent of a Major League sports venue.

"I have had the pleasure of partaking in the epicurean delights offered by Rosemary's on numerous occasions, specifically for lunch (now exclusively available on Fridays) and dinner, over the past four years. Their culinary offerings have consistently impressed me, with each dish showcasing a harmonious balance of flavors, textures, and presentation. The establishment's commitment to providing exceptional service and value is evident in every aspect of the dining experience. Of particular note is their thoughtful selection of wine and beer pairings, which complement each course perfectly. Additionally, the spacious bar and lounge area offers an inviting atmosphere, where patrons can indulge in a variety of tantalizing "small plates" or opt for items from the main menu. My personal preferences include the delectable BBQ shrimp and salmon tartar appetizers, as well as the mouthwatering seasonal soups. For entrees, I highly recommend the succulent scallops, crispy skin bass, and tender steaks. Furthermore, Rosemary's offers a tempting promotion on Sunday evenings, featuring half-priced bottles of wine. Throughout the year, they also host various beer and wine dinners, providing an opportunity for connoisseurs to sample an array of exquisite vintages and craft brews."

"I recently had the privilege of participating in NCT's level 1 Improv Workshop, and I must say that it was an unparalleled experience that far surpassed my expectations.  During my maiden class, I found myself feeling somewhat ill at ease, as I struggled to reconcile my inherent apprehension with the unfamiliar surroundings and the expectation to engage in spontaneous creative expression.  However, as the session progressed, I began to feel increasingly emboldened, and by the culmination of the class, I had undergone a remarkable transformation, emerging as a confident and self-assured individual, capable of executing complex scenarios with consummate ease.  The workshop places a paramount emphasis on the fundamental tenets of Improv, including active listening, the judicious employment of the "yes, and" principle, the cultivation of meaningful relationships, emotional responsiveness, and a steadfast commitment to reality.  Throughout the course, Dorian, our erudite and perceptive instructor, provided us with astute guidance and trenchant feedback, which served to enhance our burgeoning skills and facilitate our artistic growth.  Moreover, my fellow students were an unmitigated delight, each possessing a unique brand of humor that contributed to an atmosphere of unbridled hilarity and camaraderie.  In conclusion, I would enthusiastically recommend NCT's level 1 Improv Workshop to anyone seeking to develop their improvisational abilities, as it has had a profound impact on my personal and professional life, enabling me to become a more effective communicator, collaborator, and problem solver."

I read the reviews and couldn't believe we hadn't tried The Deli with it being so close to home.

This place has it all. Great service and a new take on fresh local food plus a little cocktail lounge on the weekends when there is a long wait for a table.

The hummus with warm freshly made crackers is a must order. I ordered the half sandwich and chicken and corn chowder it was so good, but I couldn't finish it because it was so filling, but not in a heavy greasy way - just very satisfied with a delicious meal. We had to try their homemade ice cream and it did not disappoint either. The Peanut Butter ice cream was YUMMY! Everything that we ordered surpassed our expectations.

If you haven't tried this place - stop what you are doing and go check it out!!!!

"Visit Sweet Republic during the current week and express your endorsement of 'Bake for Hope' verbally, specifically stating, 'I support Bake for Hope,' and the establishment will generously contribute a percentage of their earnings to Bake for Hope, a philanthropic organization committed to increasing consciousness of breast cancer and directing the profits from numerous bake sales across the country to local chapters of Susan G Komen for the Cure. On the upcoming Saturday, Bake for Hope will be present at the venue, offering for purchase their delectable handcrafted cupcakes, brownies, and cookies, constituting an ideal combination when paired with ice cream."

Steve's proficiency in communication and his fastidious approach to customer service are truly remarkable. My experience with him was nothing short of exceptional, as he successfully rectified a dent that both the dealership and Dent Pros deemed irreparable. Not only did Steve demonstrate an unwavering commitment to excellence in his work, but he also distinguished himself through his meticulous attention to detail and his ability to set realistic expectations for his clients. His transparent pricing structure further reinforced my confidence in his services, and I would unequivocally recommend him to anyone seeking top-notch paintless dent repair. In the unlikely event that I encounter another dent in the future, Steve's establishment will undoubtedly be my first and only choice.

"It is my utmost pleasure to provide a succinct yet effusive endorsement of Piper's Pub, an establishment that has captured my heart and palate with its unparalleled culinary prowess and commitment to providing an exceptional drinking experience. In essence, this enchanting Scottish tavern has ascended to the pinnacle of excellence among Pittsburgh's plethora of dining and imbibing establishments, rendering it an obligatory pilgrimage for aficionados of fine fare and libations.

The gastronomical odyssey that awaits patrons at Piper's Pub is nothing short of extraordinary. The kitchen's masterful execution of traditional British delicacies, such as Scotch eggs and fish and chips, is complemented by inventive twists on classic dishes like the open-faced roast beef sandwich, all of which are elevated to new heights by the inclusion of fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Moreover, the proprietors' fastidious attention to detail is reflected in the meticulous preparation of each dish, ensuring that even the most discerning diner will find themselves in gastronomic nirvana.

The beverage selection at Piper's Pub is equally impressive, boasting an extensive array of imported and domestic brews that cater to diverse tastes and preferences. The owners' unwavering dedication to quality is exemplified by their commitment to maintaining spotless tap lines, thereby guaranteeing that every pour is as flavorful and refreshing as the last. For those who worship at the altar of scotch whiskey, Piper's Pub offers a veritable mecca, with a comprehensive list that showcases some of the rarest and most exquisite bottlings from the distilleries of Scotland.

However, Piper's Pub's appeal extends far beyond the realm of gastronomy and mixology. This venerable establishment has become a sanctuary for devotees of the beautiful game, providing a welcoming environment where enthusiasts can gather, don their team's colors, and revel in the excitement of live football matches, complete with satellite feeds and an electric atmosphere that rivals the fervor of any stadium.

In conclusion, Piper's Pub merits unequivocal praise and recognition for its unwavering commitment to excellence across all aspects of its operation. It is an oasis that transcends the mundane and ordinary, offering a truly immersive experience that will leave patrons in a state of unadulterated bliss. In my opinion, this gem of a pub warrants a rating of five stars, without a shadow of a doubt."

Most know Rosati's for pizza and take out, but they have so much more including an eat in dinning room.  There pizza is great, but you also need to try the ribs and fries, chicago hot dogs, and pastas.  They have dinning room specials every night that are an incredible deal!

"What a profound disparity superior customer service can effectuate! 

Upon embarking upon my second visit, I opted to bring my daughter along. Prior to venturing forth, I placed a telephone call to ensure that accommodations were available for us. The individual who responded to my query was quite cordial, thereby evincing an immediate enhancement in demeanor! 

Upon arriving at the establishment, we were promptly acknowledged with hospitality and extended a choice between two unoccupied tables. Although the venue was brimming with patrons, our server was readily available, while a colleague of hers expeditiously attended to our beverage requests. Our server, in particular, was nothing short of magnificent. Truly, a consummate professional! 

The culinary offerings were utterly scrumptious. My daughter, being a teenager, often presents a challenge in terms of satisfying her gastronomical inclinations. Happily, the menu proved to be suitably diverse, as she relished The Cabernet Burger, accompanied by what she described as 'perfect' french fries. Personally, I savored the most delectable Meatloaf Sandwich. Our server astutely suggested a French lemonade for my daughter, owing to my reluctance to consume wine and her distaste for dark sodas. This beverage proved to be immensely popular! 

The overall experience was utter perfection, much like the fries, leaving us both eagerly anticipating our next visit."

"It is highly unlikely that I will ever consider acquiring a cake from any other establishment, as I have been thoroughly spoiled by the exceptional quality and service provided by this particular bakery. My experience was nothing short of regal, as the staff treated me with utmost respect and attention, while the ambiance of the shop itself was aesthetically pleasing. Furthermore, the cakes I purchased were truly divine, with their exquisite flavors and artistic presentation. Not only did they taste superb, but the meticulous care taken in their packaging and appearance was truly impressive. The level of customer service I received was unparalleled, surpassing even the highest standards I had encountered in my previous residence. Additionally, the prices charged for these delectable creations were surprisingly reasonable, considering their exceptional quality. In conclusion, I am absolutely enamored with this bakery, and it has secured a loyal patron in me."

Phone in your orders because they're cooking your food to order.

My last year of undergrad, I called in so many times the guy knew my voice (when I changed my phone number, he still recognized me).

I could eat a half dark meal every day.

I recently had the pleasure of discovering this quaint establishment on December 31st, 2014, which marked the culmination of the year. Upon partaking in their delectable crepes, I must confess that they were indeed the most scrumptious specimens I have had the privilege of consuming. Kudos to the culinary expertise of the chef! In addition, their coffee was a perfect complement to the meal, providing a delightful beverage that not only satisfied my taste buds but also invigorated my senses. The hospitality of the wait staff was also worthy of mention, as they exhibited a commendable level of friendliness and courtesy. A particular highlight was the complimentary petite dessert and appetizer bestowed upon me by the affable server. Although there may be a brief delay in receiving your order, I suggest that you take advantage of the opportunity to unwind and savor the ambiance of the venue.

"Having resided in Edinburgh for a five-year duration, I had yet to experience the culinary offerings of Palmyra, until the aforementioned void was ameliorated by a recent visit with a companion in the evening hours. Arriving at 10 pm, we discovered that the majority of establishments in the vicinity were closed, much to our chagrin. Upon perusing the menu, I opted for a diminutive falafel, priced at Â£3.50, however, courtesy of my academic credentials, I was extended a 10% discount, resulting in a total cost of Â£3.15 for the delectable treat. The falafel appeared to be of a fresh, non-frozen variety, while the hummus was conspicuously homemade, and the Lebanese-style wraps were reminiscent of those encountered during my travels to the Middle East. The wrap was copiously filled with an assortment of salad, falafel, and hummus, subsequently toasted, and neatly wrapped in both tin foil and a napkin for our convenience. The ambiance within the establishment was somewhat lackluster, owing to the dim lighting commonly associated with kebab shops, thus, we elected to transport the edibles to our place of residence. The taste was truly satisfying; fresh, filling, and delicious, with a generous portion size that left me unable to consummate the entirety of my wrap. I shall unquestionably return to Palmyra when seeking a reasonably priced, delectable, and satiating repast, and would recommend others to follow suit, although suggesting the expediency of takeaway."

OMG Yelpers - thanks so much for your recommendations - we were in Vegas for the weekend and didn't want to eat on the Strip. We drove out to this place for dinner because of all of the Yelp reviews and it was fantastic. Everything was delicious and authentic (and spicy!) and the service was great too. We cannot wait to come back - yay!

"I recently had the opportunity to experience an indulgent sojourn at the opulent Encore resort, and I must say that the accommodations were nothing short of breathtakingly magnificent. The sheer elegance and luxuriousness of the rooms left me utterly speechless, as they far surpassed my expectations and set a new benchmark for excellence in hospitality. Compared to the other high-end hotels I have had the privilege of staying at on the Las Vegas Strip, Encore's offerings were in a league of their own, boasting expansive spaces, lavish furnishings, and meticulous attention to detail that exuded an air of sophistication and refinement. The generously proportioned bathrooms were a marvel in themselves, with sleek fixtures and fittings that added to the overall sense of pampering and indulgence. Furthermore, the strategic placement of the rooms afforded us a stunning view of the picturesque pools, which served as a visual treat that complemented the already impressive array of amenities. Of particular note was the thoughtful design of the room layout, which featured a distinct separation between the bedroom and living areas, thereby providing an added layer of privacy and functionality. It was also evident that the casino's interior design was carefully curated to cater to the preferences of Asian clientele, as evidenced by the prominent incorporation of symbolic elements such as dragons, lucky dogs, and butterflies, all of which were tastefully integrated into the rich, golden hues that permeated the space. In conclusion, my experience at Encore was nothing short of exceptional, and I would unhesitatingly award it a perfect score of 20 stars, were it possible to do so."

My siblings and I collectively decided to visit Las Vegas to commemorate the milestone birthday of our youngest sibling, which marked her transition into adulthood. Prior to our culinary excursion, we had arranged plans to dine at an alternative establishment, however, we ultimately opted to indulge in the gastronomic offerings of Lavo, much to my delight. The dining experience proved to be one of the most memorable and satisfying meals I have had the pleasure of consuming. Each member of our party selected a distinct dish, including kobe-stuffed arancini, clams, sea bass, penne alla vodka, and tiramisu for dessert. The quality and presentation of each dish were exceptional, and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves within the atmospheric confines of the adjacent nightclub. I would unhesitatingly return to this esteemed establishment in the future.

"A remarkable dental practitioner and exceptional support staff. The dental aid is proficient in facilitating a comprehensive understanding of your oral healthcare protection. She possesses the expertise to effectively collaborate with your dental insurance provider to maximize reimbursements. I sought the services of this dentist due to an unforeseen dental emergency. The arrangement of a consultation was seamless, and the attention received was expedited. There were no extensive delays. I was mistakenly informed by a different dental specialist that I did not have coverage for dental implant procedures when, in fact, I possessed seventy percent coverage under my active insurance policy. KUDOS! Additionally, the execution of my dental implant treatment was performed with great skill and precision."

"Hail, good sir! I must express my utmost satisfaction with your culinary establishment. My companion and I recently had the pleasure of partaking in your delectable offerings, and I must say, we were both thoroughly impressed. The baba ganoush, in particular, was a revelation - its rich, creamy texture and subtle tang of flavor left me in a state of gastronomic nirvana. I must confess, I have never been particularly fond of hummus, but the version served at your esteemed establishment has converted me into a devout aficionado. The generous portion of pita bread accompanying the dish was an added bonus, and I must commend your staff for their unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. Furthermore, I was delighted to discover that the croquette dishes bore a striking resemblance to the burritos I once enjoyed, albeit with a far healthier twist. In conclusion, I must express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional dining experience afforded to us by your restaurant. Rest assured, we shall return forthwith, clad in attire emblazoned with the legend 'Baba Ganoush Forever'."

"Exquisite, independently operated retail establishment specializing in unique, high-end apparel and accessories from select, exclusive designers; staffed by knowledgeable, friendly sales associates who provide exceptional customer service, creating a charming, intimate shopping ambiance that fosters an organic sense of community among patrons, thereby rendering it a must-visit destination for fashion enthusiasts seeking a distinctive, personalized retail experience."

"Indubitably, this Yelp selection has proven to be an optimal choice, as my culinary experiences at this establishment have been nothing short of extraordinary! The hospitable staff has demonstrated a remarkable ability to recognize and remember patrons, ensuring a personalized dining experience. The Happy Hour menu, albeit limited in scope, boasts incredibly reasonable prices and an impressive array of sake options, with the Lychee Cold Sake being a particular standout. Moreover, the quality of the food during non-Happy Hour meals has been consistently exceptional, as exemplified by the complimentary Cajun Albacore we received, which left us utterly astounded. Consequently, we have resolved to entrust the chef with curating our dining experience during future visits, given the unparalleled taste and presentation of the dishes thus far. Soho, your restaurant has undoubtedly gained two ardent patrons for life!"

"A sunny afternoon saw Brett, accompanied by his kin, enter my abode of employment, a Home Depot store, with the intention of procuring a tool for rental purposes. My familiarity with his visage stemmed from my devoted viewership of his television program, thereby rendering me capable of recognizing him instantaneously. As fate would have it, I was assigned to assist him, an occurrence that transpired due to his turn being next in line. His demeanor was one of amiability and cordiality, which made for a pleasant interaction. In addition, I extended my assistance to him by escorting him to his vehicle, as the tool he had rented was rather weighty and challenging to lift. During our conversation, he extended an invitation for me to visit his establishment for a comprehensive tour. Needless to say, I accepted his offer without hesitation. A few days later, I ventured to his shop, whereupon an employee stationed at the front desk led me to his office. Upon entering, I was greeted by Brett himself, who demonstrated his integrity by acknowledging me and honoring his promise of a tour. I had the privilege of meeting several members of his team, all of whom exhibited kindness and warmth. Furthermore, I was granted access to behold some exotic aquatic specimens, as well as the rear region of the premises where the tanks are fabricated. To my delight, I also had the opportunity to encounter a few of their avian companions. In conclusion, my experience was a gratifying one, and I extend my appreciation to ATM for facilitating this encounter."
Compared to the palazzo, this (Caesars) store is much bigger in terms of their display cases so my gf got to try on and see what's in season.

"Savor the delectable flavors of our premium beef rib and baby back pork ribs, and relish in the charming ambiance of our establishment, all while enjoying competitive pricing. While the Outlaw Burger may not have met your elevated expectations, we assure you that our ribs are truly exceptional."

Yes indeed! This is by far the most authentic Mexican food I have ever tasted in the US. Born in  Chicago but raised in Mexico, this is why my taste buds are very familiar with Mexican cuisine. I ate the Mole Verde and it was fantastic. Besides the great food and margaritas, the place is just amazingly stunning! They have this gorgeous art work that is a wooden piece of Mexico history... I cant find words to explain so please feel free to check the youtube link below you will not have regrets it!  \n\n http://youtu.be/of2E6GAXStg

Famous Dave's ribs are the best in town and I've tried a lot of different barbecue houses. Their wedge potatoes are incredibly delicious and the corn bread muffins are awesome. The service is friendly and the place is clean with an open roomy atmosphere. This is one of my favorite restaurants and I recommend it to anyone who likes barbecue.

"It is my utmost conviction that the personnel responsible for canine coiffure within these premises are truly exceptional in their vocation, as evidenced by the unwavering dedication and meticulous attention to detail they consistently display in their work. Moreover, the proprietor and staff members have always exhibited an unparalleled level of concern and commitment towards ensuring the well-being of their clientele, which has led me to become a steadfast patron of this establishment over an extended period of time."

Since our relocation to our current abode several years ago, this establishment has served as our preferred and sole destination for acquiring donuts. Despite the advent of a novel and illustrious donut shop in our vicinity, Rainbow Donuts retains its superiority. Following a couple of visits to the recently established enterprise, we have come to appreciate the conspicuous discrepancy in quality between the two. The staff at Rainbow Donuts consistently exhibit warmth and cordiality, while the culinary offerings are invariably delectable and diverse, encompassing an extensive array of flavors that cater to the discerning palates of their clientele. We unreservedly endorse this venue to those seeking a satisfying donut experience.

Britney Clark was fantastic with her services! We met her and gave her all the information necessary to serve our party.

We handed her an OOP along with a picture of the person needed to be served, and she was able and successful at serving her within 5 minutes!

Money well spent, thank you Britney!

aw man, this is a far, sketchy walk from the quad at 2:30am but worth it!
i kept going back up for more and more spicy adobada tacos- they were so freaking good.  i thought that the asada meat was a little dry but delightful nonetheless.

this is not gastronomie, it's street food at it's finest and probably the most authentic taco experience i've ever had.

I love this place!  You can always find something great eat.  I recently went for a friends birthday.  I would recommend their outdoor dining area.  It's a pretty decent size and you will have to wait if you don't make reservations even during the week for lunch.  We had my favorite appetizer, the bacon wrapped dates.  I love the arugula salad that comes under the dates.  They also give you bread and olive oil pesto dip.  That's a meal in itself.  We ordered the chicken chopped salad which was delicious!  We told the waiter that all four of us were going to share so he brought it out already divided in four bowls.  We also had the margarita flat bread and the sweet potato cannelloni that was to die for!  We also ordered the cheeseburger that was cut into four as well.  The server also brought out a chocolate cake with ice cream for our friends birthday.  We experienced great customer service!  We will be back soon.  Probably for happy hour since it's a good one!

"Indubitably, one of the most delectable culinary experiences I have had the pleasure of indulging in. My gastronomical journey commenced with the Wellington, a savory fusion of tenderloin beef, mushrooms, and puff pastry, accompanied by an array of tantalizing sides, including the chorizo-stuffed lobster tail, a delicacy that elevated the humble crustacean to new heights of flavor and texture. Furthermore, the onion soup, a rich and velvety elixir, and the green salad, a fresh and vibrant medley of leafy greens, served as the perfect accompaniments to the main event. Lastly, the rib eye, a juicy and tender cut of beef, cooked to perfection, brought the meal to a satisfying conclusion. The service, attentive and knowledgeable, complemented the exquisite cuisine, creating a dining experience that was, without a doubt, worth every penny. For those who may find the prices to be a tad prohibitive, I assure you that the quality and presentation of each dish, not to mention the ambiance of the establishment itself, make it an unquestionable value. I shall, without hesitation, return to this gastronomical haven on my next visit to Las Vegas."

Loved finding this unique and tasty restaurant off the strip for our vacation! The food was a  pleasant twist on the authentic flavors. Since my husband has taken trips to Spain this was a real comfort food trip for him. \n\nBe sure to try different tapas and share them in the standard Spanish tradition. We also enjoyed the Paella. A must for Vegas.

"My spouse and I were indulging in an excursion with our two youngest progeny when we chanced upon this culinary establishment. We opted to investigate its offerings further. What a serendipitous discovery indeed! I customized my own bowl, selecting the tofu option while specifying a carb-free variation, augmented by twice the amount of vegetables. Furthermore, I requested the green curry sauce. The tofu served was certified organic and non-GMO, and the entirety of my order was vegetarian in nature. The resultant dish was nothing short of sublime; fresh produce, impeccably grilled tofu, and a sauce that struck the perfect balance between piquancy and flavor. 
My better half elected to sample the spicy tuna roll, accompanied by the cucumber salad. His satisfaction with the culinary experience was palpable. Our son, aged twenty-two months, opted for the children's teriyaki chicken, accompanied by noodles. As per the standard operating procedure, he was presented with the choice between a cookie, mandarin oranges, or a beverage. He selected the latter. Our infant daughter, however, declined to partake in the gastronomical indulgence. 
The venue offers both sit-down and takeout options, with orders placed at a counter and subsequently delivered to the patron. The service was brisk and efficient, while the tariffs were reasonable. For approximately twenty dollars, we collectively enjoyed a wholesome, delectable repast. In a society where fast food has become ubiquitous, Tokyo Joe's presents a welcome respite. Whether one's dietary inclinations lean toward carnivorous, pescatarian, or vegetarian preferences, this eatery caters to them admirably. I shall unquestionably revisit this culinary haven."
I'm going to give this place 5 stars only because I feel bad I kinda threw up on their floor... \n\nI'm really sorry, Jimmy. I was really trashed!!

"This phenomenon exemplifies the embodiment of the genesis of Las Vegas's essence, whereupon an exceptional live jazz ensemble, complemented by aesthetically pleasing female dancers possessing extraordinary choreographic proficiency, and further enhanced by a gifted vocalist, collectively deliver a captivating spectacle that warrants unequivocal recommendation for any individual seeking a unique and memorable experience within the city's multifaceted entertainment landscape."

"The quality of the service rendered by the establishment was truly remarkable, as it transcended my expectations in terms of efficiency and responsiveness. Specifically, upon contacting them at the eleventh hour with a request for an assortment of chocolate-dipped strawberries, they exhibited an unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction by successfully procuring the desired items for me."

"A remarkable Cirque production that necessitates observation, boasting acts that rank among the most perilous and awe-inspiring performances witnessed within the scope of Cirque shows in Las Vegas. The proficiency and precision displayed by the performers in executing their crafts is utterly captivating, leaving one bereft of speech due to the sheer physical prowess and agility demanded by such feats."

"Feeling somewhat unwell one day and yearning for a culinary experience that would remind me of my beloved Bay Area Asian cuisine, I embarked upon a quest to locate a dining establishment that served exceptional Pho. Utilizing my trusty iPhone, I conducted a thorough search of the local vicinity, seeking a restaurant that would satisfy my craving for this delectable Vietnamese delicacy. After diligently perusing numerous options, I decided upon a particular venue that boasted an impressive reputation for serving authentic Pho. Following a leisurely 20-minute drive from my stylish loft, I arrived at the eatery, eager to indulge in a steaming bowl of savory noodles. Upon entering the cozy establishment, I was immediately struck by the welcoming ambiance and the enticing aroma of exotic spices wafting through the air. The menu offered an array of tantalizing options, each showcasing the nuanced flavors and textures that have become synonymous with genuine Vietnamese cuisine. Opting for a diverse selection of toppings, including an assortment of succulent seafood and flavorful tofu, I eagerly anticipated the arrival of my steaming bowl of Pho. As I savored each spoonful, I was delightfully surprised by the rich, complex flavors that danced across my palate, leaving me utterly satiated yet still yearning for more. In addition to the delectable Pho, I also opted to sample the Vietnamese Shrimp Rolls, which were expertly prepared and presented with a dash of elegance. Ultimately, I departed the restaurant feeling pleasantly content, my hunger thoroughly satiated, and my spirits lifted. Moreover, I still had sufficient financial resources remaining to indulge in a spot of shoe shopping the following day, an added bonus that brought me immense satisfaction."

"Having been engaged in a diligent quest for a suitable computer repair establishment to facilitate an operating system upgrade from Windows XP to Windows 7, as well as execute a comprehensive migration of my Outlook Express files to Outlook, I was confronted with a myriad of challenges. My endeavors to enlist the assistance of numerous companies proved largely unsuccessful, as only a select few bothered to respond, and their proposed service fees were left alarmingly open-ended. In the midst of my growing frustration, a novel storefront conveniently materialized adjacent to the UPS Store wherein I maintain a rented box. Upon the enthusiastic recommendation of Joe, the proprietor of the aforementioned UPS Store, I opted to entrust my computer conundrum to the capable hands of Matt and Dave. My decision proved nothing short of serendipitous, as the duo tenaciously tackled the intricate task at hand, undeterred by its complexity. Despite the prolonged nature of the undertaking, spanning from June 13th to June 24th, they steadfastly honored their commitment, refusing to compromise on either their integrity or the agreed-upon fee. Presently, I am delighted to be composing this testimonial on my revitalized computer, brimming with gratitude for my fortuitous encounter with these exceptional technicians. I emphatically urge anyone seeking computer-related solutions to consider their services, which extend beyond PCs and laptops to encompass phones, tablets, and televisions, among other devices."

"My affection for Luv-It is unwavering; my preferred sundae is the Western, although I have endeavored to broaden my horizons by sampling some of their daily flavors. While I may be accustomed to my customary sundae, I find that it surpasses the flavors of the day served in a cone. Although I appreciate the variety they offer, I still prefer the familiarity of my beloved sundae. Occasionally, I indulge in their unique flavors, and I relish the opportunity to observe the diverse clientele while waiting in line. Despite the occasional delay, I acknowledge that progress has been made regarding their extended hours, as they now operate seven days a week, which was not always the case. Following a satisfying meal at Viva Arepeas, a visit to Luv-It for dessert is an ideal way to culminate my downtown excursion. It is indeed a delectable experience, and I must advise that bringing cash is essential, as an ATM is available in the adjacent mini mart for those who require it."

"While reveling in the joyous occasion of my son's nuptials within the confines of the town, I ventured into Vo's seeking a comprehensive pampering session encompassing a pedicure, manicure, and fill-ins for a group of five individuals on June 6th, 2014, including the bride-to-be. Our experience transcended mere satisfaction, as it proved to be an exceptional and unforgettable indulgence, attributed largely to the warm and welcoming ambiance fostered by the family-owned and operated establishment. The staff's hospitable demeanor and effervescent personalities resonated with every customer, creating an atmosphere of unadulterated joviality and merriment. My sincere gratitude extends to Vo's for their meticulous attention to detail and unwavering commitment to ensuring an enjoyable experience, which culminated in an unparalleled epoch of mirth and hilarity. We wholeheartedly cherished our time spent in your esteemed company."

We entered this establishment during a Yelp-hosted gathering with the intention of crafting a brief assessment of our experience. Julia, an individual who has achieved considerable success in the realm of chocolate confectionery, graced us with her presence and imparted a captivating account of her journey in the industry. Her demeanor was characterized by effervescence and enthusiasm, which greatly enhanced our enjoyment of the occasion. As we partook in the festivities, we had the privilege of sampling three of her sumptuous creations, specifically a passion fruit cake, a red velvet cake, and a chocolate mousse, all of which harmonized beautifully with an exceptional chocolate martini. It is suffice to say that these indulgences left us in a state of unadulterated delight, and we unhesitatingly anticipate the prospect of revisiting this venue in the future.

"Gastronomical indulgence and exceptional hospitality were the hallmarks of our dining experience at this esteemed establishment, as we savored their delectable pumpkin curry, a culinary masterpiece that showcased the chef's artistry and expertise in the kitchen. The menu offered an innovative heat scale, ranging from a modest 1 to a formidable 5, and we opted for the latter, bravely venturing into uncharted territories of fiery flavors. While the intensity of the spices was undoubtedly a bold departure from the usual Thai cuisine, it was tempered by the subtle sweetness of the green tea ice cream, a delightful dessert that capped off a truly satisfying repast. We look forward to revisiting this gastronomic gem, eager to sample more of their creative and mouthwatering offerings."

It was proximate to the termination of the diurnal period and I was capable of vacating my occupational duties somewhat prematurely, thus permitting me to place a telephone call to D'Lisa. She possessed the capability to schedule an appointment for me in a remarkably brief time frame, despite the fact that it was an eleventh-hour request and the hour was advanced considerably. Upon my arrival, she had prepared herself for my visit and extended an offer of a refreshing beverage.
