It is worth mentioning that the patties themselves were succulent and brimming with flavor. 

The extensive selection of sides offered us an opportunity to sample a variety of delights. Both of us decided on the combination side dish consisting of tater tots and sweet potato tots. While the conventional tater tots satisfied our expectations, the sweet potato tots were transformed into a heavenly treat with the accompaniment of a rich butter and brown sugar syrup for dipping. Such an innovative offering left us both in awe. 

Given the exceptional quality of the cuisine, atmosphere, and hospitality, it is unsurprising that our dining experience at Kickstand was nothing short of gratifying. We look forward to our next visit, when the craving for an exquisite burger strikes again.

I am super happy with the service I received.  I called and spoke with Jerry - he came out the same day and gave me an  estimate - which was very fair.  They scheduled my tree trimming for the next day!  Alex was great.  He introduced himself right from the start and made sure we were on the same page.  He and his crew did a great job!  They even cleaned everything up and left it looking nicer than before they came.  I highly recommend them!!!  And I will use them again!

"Culinary excellence abounds at this establishment, where delectable victuals tantalize the taste buds and leave patrons utterly satiated. A team of competent and affable servers attend to guests' needs with alacrity, ensuring that each dining experience is nothing short of exceptional. Generous helpings of expertly prepared fare, presented at an unbeatable price point, guarantee that hunger will be vanquished, leaving room for delightful excess. This veritable treasure trove of gastronomic delights is sure to impress even the most discerning palates, compelling repeat visits from those who partake in its bounty. Unhesitatingly, one would enthusiastically endorse this venue to acquaintances, eager to share the pleasure of such a find."

"My odyssey of dental encounters has been checkered, to say the least, but my recent visit to Modern Dental Care marked a paradigm shift in my perception of optimal oral healthcare. The staff exuded an unparalleled level of cordiality and expertise, guiding me through each stage of the process with alacrity and unwavering attention to detail. Dr. Mark Edington's craftsmanship was nothing short of exceptional, his dexterity and precision eliciting a sense of confidence and reassurance that left me feeling utterly delighted and satiated. The ambiance of the clinic itself was inviting and comforting, fostering an atmosphere of serenity that served to alleviate any apprehensions or anxieties I may have harbored. In light of this transformative experience, I would unequivocally endorse Modern Dental Care to anyone seeking top-tier dental services, whether it be for an acute emergency, routine maintenance, or simply a meticulous cleaning. Your decision to entrust them with your oral wellbeing will undoubtedly be met with unbridled satisfaction and contentment."

"On yet another occasion, my expectations were not left unfulfilled at Saint Sushi, as the culinary offerings and hospitality of the staff persistently upheld their tradition of excellence, thereby eliciting my unwavering satisfaction and loyalty; I shall eagerly anticipate and relish the prospect of my subsequent visit, during which I shall undoubtedly partake in the delectable delights that this esteemed establishment has become renowned for, and graciously acknowledge the warm reception accorded to me by the affable personnel, whose unwavering commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience has earned my utmost appreciation and commendation; until such time, I remain, Your Caribbean Majesty."

"Fantastic bagels, indeed! Such an assertion can be unequivocally substantiated by my personal experience, having sampled a variety of bagels from multiple establishments within New York City, including seven distinct bakeries. My unwavering dedication to consuming at least one bagel per week since its inception serves as a testament to the unparalleled quality of this particular bakery's offerings. It is worth mentioning that the bagel sandwiches served here harmoniously complement the inherent flavors of the bagel itself, with a notable example being a jalapeÃ±o bacon bagel paired with an assortment of ingredients such as eggs, pepperjack cheese, sausage, bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and jalapeÃ±os. While the assortment of pastries available is undoubtedly delectable, the chocolate croissant stands out as a truly exceptional item, so much so that it compels one to forgo any semblance of self-control and indulge in repeated orders, despite the caloric consequences."

"Reasonable prices for exceptional service, culminating in an aggregate cost of $26, which encompasses the entire experience, are offered by this establishment. The personnel within this salon are proficient in their craft and efficient in their work, ensuring that clients do not experience prolonged waiting periods. Engaging in conversation is an option, with topics such as sports and women being popular choices, or alternatively, one may opt to observe the televisions positioned at each chair. The climax of every haircut is marked by a precise, straight-edge shave, accompanied by either a hot or cold towel, and supplemented by a brief machine massage. The individuals who work at this establishment are kind and personable, making it a worthwhile investment to allocate a few additional dollars above the cost of visiting establishments such as Cost Cutters, et al."

"Wow, never have I thought that pub grub could be this delectable. Cornish Pasty Co. is, by definition, a hole in the wall well worth driving to from any location in the valley if you seek simple, affordable, and, quite frankly, mouthwatering cuisine. 

The menu boasts an impressive array of options, ranging from traditional, premium to signature pasties. My taste buds were left in a state of euphoria after indulging in the lamb vindaloo, the spiciness of which left me utterly besotted. 

Upon entering the establishment, it becomes apparent that there is no host or hostess present at the entrance. As such, one has the option to take a seat at the bar or, quite conveniently, hang their purse from underneath the counter. 

The service, characterized by warmth, friendliness, and efficiency, adds to the overall pleasant dining experience. A dinner for two, excluding beverages, amounts to a mere $25, making it an exceptional bargain, in my opinion."

"Upon entering the establishment for the first time, I was immediately struck by the welcoming ambiance and attentive service. As I took a seat, the server promptly approached me and inquired about my beverage preferences and whether I had already decided on my culinary selection. It became apparent that this eatery caters to a devoted clientele who frequent the premises for a rapid, delectable meal, which speaks volumes about the quality of the food and the efficiency of the staff. My order, the special of the day, was nothing short of exceptional, boasting an inventive combination of flavors and textures that left a lasting impression on my palate. The fries accompanying my dish were cooked to a golden crisp, further enhancing the overall dining experience. Needless to say, I am eager to become a regular patron of this restaurant, given its proximity to my workplace and the consistently high standards of cuisine and customer service."

"Females possess an inherent saccharinity, while tariffs are rational and unpretentious. The vertical sleeping platform is perceived as warm, thus it is imperative to synchronize your schedule accordingly, taking into account the possibility of my Caucasian complexion being a contributing factor to this perception."

Justin did a fantastic job in cleaning my carpets at Benchmark printing. Our carpets take a beating with paper dust and ink. He came in and within 2 hours they were looking brand new again. I would definately recommend Elite Floor & Furniture Cleaning.

"This accommodation ranks among the most luxurious and aesthetically pleasing lodgings I have had the pleasure of occupying in recent memory, boasting an array of amenities and appointments that exude elegance and refinement. The sleeping quarters, in particular, proved to be a veritable oasis of comfort, with a bed so sumptuous and inviting that I found myself repeatedly indulging in the temptation of the snooze function, thereby extending my period of repose well beyond the conventional bounds of a typical morning routine. While this may be construed as either a positive or negative development, depending on one's perspective, I would venture to argue that such indulgence served to enhance my overall sense of well-being and relaxation."

There are only a few stores that I can spend hours in.  There are certain stores I don't like to bring my wife with me also.  Harbor Freight Tools is that place.  I get the flyers in the mail and start my wish list.  It's like when a a kid gets the Toys R Us catalog.  

One has to approach Harbor Freight Tools a little different.  Are you a professional contractor that has multiple jobs weekly?  Well then this place probably isn't for you.  You might want to spend a few bucks more to get some better power tools. Are you the weekend warrior or the DYI home owner?  Then, this is your place.  They have a lot of great tools that won't be used all the time, but will get the job done. These tools won't break you wallet either.  I have purchased some specialty tools here that I needed for certain jobs and they were great.  I have also purchased a cordless power drill that was a piece of garbage and waste of money.  

The trick is to go see the quality of the tool and then see how often you will use it.  If you only need it a few times and it's pretty cheap, then get it!  Overall this place is awesome.  I love going here and finding some great deals.  You have to come check this place out.  Cheers!

Went her yesterday nd got some English Bangers and some English Bacon.  YUMMO, they have a great aray of meat there, Will be going back there again, to get some Lamb next time.  Prices are very reasonable.

Second trip to Downtown Tattoo - Buddy hooked us up and fixed our tats. Super guy who stands by his shop and the people he has working there. \n\nHappy to say the next time we're back in Vegas, this is the only place we will get our tattoos!

"We partook of a stone crab appetizer, our virginal encounter with such a delicacy, and while our palates did not deem it extraordinary, it was adequate.  We were enlightened by the fact that these crustaceans were frozen from the previous season, given that the season commences in October.  Our gastronomical journey continued with the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance being a 2-pound lobster, skillfully cracked by the culinary artisans, rendering it an unparalleled delight, while my spouse's halibut entrÃ©e proved equally satisfying.  Furthermore, the sautÃ©ed spinach was a culinary masterpiece, contributing to an overall gratifying and pleasurable dining escapade."

This establishment is utterly remarkable, boasting an array of delectable Italian delights that are certain to satiate even the most discerning palate, complemented by a refreshing glass of homemade limoncello that serves as the perfect accompaniment to such culinary masterpieces; thus, it is my unequivocal recommendation that you partake in the experience offered by this venue, as it is truly a singular and unparalleled delight that transcends any attempt at humor or levity.

During our most recent sojourn to Las Vegas in December, we were afforded the opportunity to partake in an evening repast at Mon Ami Gabi, situated within the Paris hotel complex. Upon being seated alfresco, we were presented with an unobstructed panorama of the majestic Bellagio fountain display, performed at fifteen-minute intervals directly opposite our vantage point. Needless to say, this dining experience boasted one of the most breathtaking views we have had the pleasure of enjoying from a culinary establishment. Moving on to the gastronomical offerings, my spouse opted for the sea scallop entrÃ©e, accompanied by a side of cafÃ© au lait, while I selected the grilled salmon, both of which proved to be tantalizingly delectable. Our palates satiated, we expressed a desire to return to this eatery in the future.

After perusing the evaluations, I decided to contact DC to determine whether any appointments were available for me to obtain my expedition window tinting services today, specifically for the front two windows; upon connecting with Joe, he informed me that although he was currently engaged in working on a vehicle, he wouldn't have to complete it until the next day, and if I arrived promptly, he would accommodate me in his schedule. Wow! I arrived at the establishment in less than ten minutes, and Joe efficiently pulled out the vehicle he was working on and replaced it with mine. Following approximately an hour and a half of diligent work on my automobile, Joe summoned me, and I was thoroughly impressed by the exceptional quality of his craftsmanship. Joe's commitment to providing excellent customer service, ensuring reliability, and delivering superior results makes him an exemplary professional in his field, and I highly recommend his services.

We indulged in an unforgettable dining experience at this establishment on the eve of the new year in 2010, accompanied by my better half. The ambiance and hospitality we encountered were truly exceptional, as the staff members were attired in traditional Japanese garb and demonstrated a genuine enthusiasm for engaging with patrons. The culinary offerings were indeed impressive, with my selection of fried oysters being delivered in their shells, numbering five or six on my plate, and boasting remarkable size and flavor. Freshness and crispy frying techniques were evident in each bite, leaving me thoroughly impressed. My spouse opted for the sashimi variety platter, which both captivated our visual senses and tantalized our taste buds with its presentation and delectability. It is challenging to articulate any criticisms of this venue, as our bill, approximating sixty dollars, encompassed two main courses, two appetizers, two soups, and salads, thereby rendering the experience not only pleasurable but also economical. This dining excursion transpired to be a charming and memorable escapade for us.

We experienced an unfortunate breakdown of our air conditioning unit at approximately 11 pm, which necessitated an urgent request for technical assistance the following morning.  Upon contacting the service provider, we were informed that a technician named Robert would arrive promptly at 8 am to address the issue.  To our relief, the repair was completed efficiently and the cost was quite reasonable.  Unfortunately, our second unit malfunctioned two days later, and despite our efforts to schedule an appointment during regular business hours, we were informed that the service provider was fully booked for the day.  However, after communicating our pressing need for assistance, the receptionist kindly offered to contact the owner, who graciously agreed to attend to the problem personally, albeit slightly later than initially anticipated.  Ultimately, the owner arrived punctually at 9 pm and effectively resolved the issue, much to our satisfaction.  Overall, we have been extremely pleased with the exceptional level of customer service and technical expertise demonstrated by both Robert and the service provider's ownership.

"Esteemed establishment offering superior quality espresso beverages, crafted with proficiency by a team of skilled baristas, inclusive of an amiable redheaded individual sporting spectacles, who exhibits exceptional customer service skills, a trait not always prevalent in every coffeehouse, particularly during the 1990s, and demonstrates remarkable adeptness in the art of creating delectable beverages. Although the ambiance is aesthetically pleasing, my personal inclination leans towards science fiction themes. Notwithstanding, I would unquestionably revisit this establishment, provided that exceptional personnel, such as the aforementioned barista, continue to be associated with it."

"The culinary offerings and the hospitality experience at this establishment are of unparalleled excellence, rendering it a veritable haven for gastronomic aficionados and connoisseurs of fine dining. The attentive and courteous demeanor of the waiting staff, coupled with the tantalizing flavors and presentation of the cuisine, create a truly unforgettable epicurean adventure that is certain to leave an indelible mark on even the most discerning palate. Moreover, the musical ambiance, which resonates with the rhythms and melodies that have accompanied me throughout my existence, serves as the proverbial icing on the cake, elevating the overall experience to a realm of unadulterated bliss. In short, this restaurant is a veritable gem, one that I shall return to with great frequency and enthusiasm."

Just came back from here today and loved it.

Location - Nice. Off Silverado Ranch and Bermuda, a lot of places near it and a good area of town.

Atmosphere - Cute. It was clean, I enjoyed the setup and the dim lighting

Food - Excellent! There were so many options on the menu it was hard to chose, they also had a vegetarian friendly menu. Huge portions, great value, and the food itself was amazing. Food is spicier than most thai places, they warn you, so make sure you don't get anything over a 3 if you only want mild spice.

Service - Our server was great. Very friendly, helpful and quick. My boyfriend was clearly struggling with his Pad Thai (which was a level 5 spice) but, we weren't going to ask for a new one or complain, but the server offered to make him a new one. It was a very kind gesture.

Will be back!

Valerie epitomized proficiency and exhibited an unwavering dedication to ensuring a seamless customer experience, providing invaluable assistance with a technical issue pertaining to a SIM card, all while refraining from imposing any unwarranted charges, thereby fostering an atmosphere of trust and loyalty that culminated in the procurement of a high-quality charging device at a remarkably reasonable price, thus solidifying the likelihood of future patronage and enthusiastic recommendations to acquaintances and loved ones.

"I procure my automobile to be cleansed at this establishment and genuinely appreciate the amenities and particularly the proficient demeanor of the secondary supervisor, Michael Jorgensen.  His politeness, fluency, and evident aspiration to advance in his career are traits that I find remarkably impressive, and I derive pleasure from our fleeting conversations."

"Ideal for ardent BBQ connoisseurs, this establishment offers an extensive array of products catering to the discerning tastes of enthusiasts seeking to elevate their grilling experiences. With a seemingly endless inventory, the store boasts an impressive collection of items, ensuring that patrons can procure precisely what they require. Should an item be unavailable, staff members are more than happy to accommodate requests and promptly obtain the desired product. Given the vast selection, it is advisable to arrive with a spacious vehicle to facilitate transportation of purchases, as the temptation to acquire an extensive assortment of goods is virtually impossible to resist. As an illustration, a substantial 2 cubic foot bag of 1/2 cut logs can be obtained for a mere $18.00, with options including almond, peach, and hickory varieties. In essence, this venue represents the pinnacle of BBQ supply shopping in Las Vegas, making it an absolute must-visit destination for anyone remotely interested in the art of grilling."

"An exceptional location, boasting a state-of-the-art facility that has undergone extensive renovations, complete with a cutting-edge fitness center, an outdoor swimming pool, expansive meeting spaces, a charming bistro, and tranquil corridors. My experience was nothing short of extraordinary; the coordination of events was seamless, and the designated areas for socializing were generously proportioned. The bistro offered an ideal setting for casual gatherings and provided an extensive selection of refreshments. The staff members were remarkably friendly, exhibiting a genuine enthusiasm for their roles, even extending to the maintenance crew, who were conspicuously jovial and kind."

"Based on the favorable reviews I had perused on Yelp, I opted to secure New Year's Eve reservations at this establishment, and my girlfriend and I both departed impressed. Although we arrived somewhat tardy for our reservations, we encountered no obstacles in being seated forthwith, as the restaurant's occupancy was merely half its capacity. Our server, Christy, displayed remarkable attentiveness throughout the evening, and her assistance in selecting beverages for my companion was particularly commendable. Following the placement of our drink orders, we initiated our culinary exploration with an appetizer comprising a trio of artisanal cheeses - a creamy brie, a sharp cheddar, and an intriguingly-named Red Dragon variety, which I found particularly enjoyable. Accompanying the cheese selection were candied pecans and a honey-based spread, both of which harmonized effectively with the assorted cheeses. The portion size of the cheese plate was satisfying without being excessive, making it an ideal introduction to our meal. For our principal courses, my companion chose the apple and brie salad complemented by grilled fowl, while I opted for the substantial plate of sea scallops. Both dishes demonstrated exceptional culinary prowess, as my companion's poultry and my marine delicacies were cooked to perfection. The sweet potato hash and celery slaw accompanying my scallops were equally delectable. We concluded our repast feeling gratified yet not uncomfortably satiated, which was greatly appreciated. The entire experience at Table 274 constituted a superb initiation to our nocturnal festivities and warrants our future patronage without hesitation."

"This culinary establishment exudes an ambiance of refined elegance, evoking a sense of sophistication that belies its unassuming exterior. The fare served within its walls is truly exceptional, with each dish showcasing a masterful blend of flavors and textures that tantalize the palate. The slow-roasted short ribs, in particular, are a revelation - tender, juicy, and suffused with a rich, savory essence that lingers long after the last bite has been savored. The ahi sashimi salad, too, is a veritable feast for the senses, its generous portion size and expertly balanced flavors making it a satisfying meal in its own right. The prices, considering the quality of the cuisine, are eminently reasonable, and the staff's polished demeanor and attentive service only serve to enhance the overall dining experience. For those who prefer their seafood with a smoky, BBQ-inspired twist, the bbq salmon is an excellent choice, its velvety texture and deep, smoky flavor imbuing each bite with a sumptuous, indulgent quality. Despite its unpretentious appearance, this restaurant is a true gem, offering a first-class dining experience at a fraction of the cost of its high-end counterparts. Even the filet mignon, a dish often associated with haute cuisine, is executed to perfection here, its tender, pink center and subtle seasoning eliciting rave reviews from even the most discerning gourmands. In short, this establishment is a veritable culinary treasure, one that promises to delight and satisfy even the most discriminating of palates."

Every time I visit this place, it just gets better. 

First, their selection keeps expanding. As a Gibson and Orange lover, I am in heaven walking into this place. Decent selection of used stuff as well (was sad to NOT see the Ibanez lawsuit les paul rip off in there this last time, but hope that means it sold!). 

By far the best atmosphere of any music shop in town. Has a very "Chicago Music Exchange" vibe, with couches and chairs set up in classy little arrangements, wood floors, and bare brick walls. It definitely has the feel of a higher end boutique shop, which is cool. Contrast that with the fact that the staff is extremely unpretentious, affable, and inviting. Everytime I've been in there, the employees have repeatedly asked if I want to play anything (which... yes, I want to play everything). Short haired blond lady, small shaved head guy, and taller brown haired guy all just seem completely approachable and like they're as happy to talk shop as I am. Love the staff there.

Overall, this is a shop that I hope sticks around. I will definitely be making the effort to abstain from the online giants in favor of supporting these guys.

"Our encounter with Dr. Soltero was utterly satisfactory, as we were somewhat apprehensive about bringing our canine companion, a 12-year-old Belgian Malinois of considerable size, to a veterinary clinic, given that her previous veterinary care had been administered by a now-retired practitioner who conducted house calls. Following a thorough examination of online reviews, we opted to schedule an appointment at Saguaro Veterinary Clinic, situated within our city limits, due to its exceptional reputation and proximity. Upon arrival, we were impressed by the meticulous attention to cleanliness evident throughout the facility, and the majority of the staff members we interacted with displayed a welcoming demeanor. Our wait time was minimal before we were received by Dr. Soltero, whose gentle spoken manner and compassionate approach towards our pet immediately put us at ease. His associate, too, demonstrated exceptional proficiency in interacting with our dog and engaging with us in a cordial manner. A comprehensive diagnostic evaluation was conducted, during which various potential causes of our dog's locomotive difficulties and their corresponding therapeutic options were deliberated upon. The associated costs were clearly articulated by Dr. Soltero, enabling us to ponder our choices judiciously. Ultimately, we decided upon a conservative treatment approach, involving the administration of an anti-inflammatory medication, and observed a marked improvement in our dog's condition in a relatively short span of time. Subsequent to this, our pet has undergone a follow-up visit, which was similarly brief, and Dr. Soltero took the time to communicate the results of blood work via a telephone call, demonstrating his personal investment in our pet's wellbeing. All things considered, our experience at Saguaro Veterinary Clinic was truly delightful, and we shall unquestionably seek their services again whenever our pets require medical attention."

I had the misfortune of damaging the display screen of my iPhone 5S during the previous weekend, but fortunately, I was able to locate a reliable repair service that was capable of restoring my device's functionality in a remarkably brief period of time, specifically 20 minutes. Moreover, their prices were unmatched by any other establishment in the local area, which made their services even more appealing. Consequently, I am compelled to express my sincere gratitude towards Wireless Phone Doctors for their exceptional workmanship and recommend their expertise to anyone who may be experiencing similar technical difficulties with their mobile devices.

"Upon culmination of September, I facilitated the rescue of a pup and subsequently initiated my patronage of this establishment subsequent to a recommendation proffered by an acquaintance. Upon entry, I remarked that the ambiance lacked the unpleasant olfactory quality that I had associated with my previous veterinary facility, which I deemed a welcome attribute. The staff manifested exceptional cordiality and concern towards both myself and my companion animals, as exemplified by their endeavor to ascertain my satisfaction via a telephonic communication following my maiden visit. Additionally, my sibling and I opted to avail ourselves of their services for our feline companion Hula, whom they assisted in recovering from a state of diminished corpulence and excessive shedding, determining that a thyroid issue was the root cause, and providing aid in regulating his medication. Furthermore, I found their pricing to be eminently reasonable. It is my conviction that you should seriously consider bringing your pets to the attention of Dr. White, as he has demonstrated proficiency in his vocation."

Stopped I for a pedicure randomly, Really fast and friendly, the guy who did my pedi was very nice even had a pleasant conversation... He told me I had healthy feet haha. No one was pushy, honestly one of my best pedicure experiences

"An exceptional ambiance and personnel complemented by proficient expertise in their merchandise, characterize Carl and Natalie's establishment. Their 'Breakfast in Bed' weekly special, reminiscent of a sweet vanilla or maple dessert flavor, epitomizes their commitment to quality. Notably, they afford customers the opportunity to select their preferred VG/PG ratio, a feature uncommon among competitors. For those in close proximity, a visit to this vape shop is certainly worthwhile."
New place but experienced owner. Amazing blue cheese burger with a side of wing hot sauce. Also have tried all the specialty drinks and you can't go wrong with any of them!

Came at 8pm on a Friday. Still had to wait an hour. It was totally totally worth it. We tried most of the tacos. The ones that blew me away were the chicken and the pork! Oh wow. Like an explosion in your mouth. Love the Mexican and BBQ fusion. It's like they were made to be together. Great ambiance, good service and BYOB! Can't ask for anything more.

"A plethora of pulchritudinous osseous structures accompanies each chocolate container during the festive period of Hawlowene, eliciting a cacophony of gleeful exclamations from the sugary treat's enthusiasts; hypothetically, if these delectable delights were endowed with the faculty of speech, they might exclaim in unison, 'Buauahahaha! Spooky, indeed!'".

They tried to kill me, and I love them for it.  

When a company posts a wing challenge usually covertly by  using terms fire, insanity,suicide or death wings I have to try it.Nearly every place using those terms in the valley are liars. If it's a chain restaurant Suicide wings =  a penguin's dangly bits. 

I am one of those idiots that frequents hot-sauce forums, sites and other places where my legal high can be obtained or discussed with those similarly afflicted so I took them up on the $15 challenge to eat 10 in 10 minutes, prize for 2 hours of speaking in tongues and humming a Johnny Cash tune?  Picture on wall and T-shirt plus not having to do it again:) The wings are caked in a habanero reduction that is more a  volume of heat eaten rather than insanely hot. Try it.It's awesome way to spend  20-30 minutes:D 

Thankfully they have more affordable, livable, Zombie wings for those times you have enough T Shirts in your wardrobe but still need that kick. Their Hellzapoppin burger is rather good too.  Nice people,been in several times and orders have been quick, hot, correct and the food is a great value for money. 5/5  purely on heat  4/5  on food..5/5 value  So 4.7 stars rounded up:)

came here with my bestie for a massage cz we got very bored in our hotel. oh man.. this place really can work it!!! it was very relaxing and i actually didnt feel like kicking someone in the face while they touched my toes LOL coming back here everytime i visit arizona ^_^

"A revitalized culinary array, exceptional hospitality, and an inviting ambiance have remained unaltered, as our dining experience recently demonstrated.  Our server, Adrienne, provided impeccable and personalized attention, while the supporting staff members exhibited remarkable proficiency in their respective roles.  The premium cuts of beef, specifically the filet and ribeye, showcased their tender and flavorful qualities, complemented by the delectable Dover sole special.  Additionally, the savory garlic green beans, enhanced by a judicious application of chili flakes, harmonized beautifully with the sauteed mushrooms.  A fresh Caesar salad and a rich glass of Cabernet Sauvignon wine further enriched our epicurean indulgence.  Based on this satisfying encounter, we eagerly anticipate future visits to this esteemed establishment."
I just completed a trade in for a new watch. I couldn't have asked for better service or better value. if you're looking for a new watch, this is the place.

"A reasonable tariff, coupled with a proprietary ownership structure and a cordial, competent staff, serves as a refreshing contrast to the ubiquitous nature of franchised establishments, thereby providing a superior option for consumers seeking a more personalized experience."

"Personnel who exude amusement and camaraderie, in conjunction with an array of delectable beverages, specifically the caramel mocha frost, create a hospitable ambiance that is unfortunately tainted by the presence of patrons who engage in the noxious habit of smoking outside, thereby compromising both the visual appeal and clean air quality of the establishment, yet despite these drawbacks, my affection for this particular site remains unwavering due to its proximity to a premier organic grocery store."

"The culinary experience offered by this establishment is truly remarkable, with the gastronomical delight of their Mac and Cheese being a prime example of their proficiency in the art of cooking. The texture of the pasta was perfectly cooked, providing a satisfying chewiness that complemented the rich, velvety sauce that enveloped each bite. Furthermore, the 1000 island burger was an absolute revelation, boasting an intricate arrangement of flavors that coalesced into a symphony of taste and aroma. It is without a doubt that this eatery possesses an exceptional ambiance, fostering a warm and welcoming environment that seamlessly complements the delectable fare they serve. Needless to say, I shall unquestionably return to partake in their gastronomical offerings on multiple occasions in the future."

Went here the other night for a client holiday party.  There was about 10 of us at the table.  The restaurant is nice, clean and comfortable.  Diners were wearing business casual.  Appeared to be a nice place to take a date or go out for a business lunch or dinner.  I was a little taken back by the paper covers on the tablecloths, but again, Italian food is messy.

The server was very knowledgeable about the menu, pasta and wine, and made some excellent recommendations.  I was appreciative of her knowledge. 

I ordered eggplant parmesan.  Other guests ordered scampi, fresh fish, and pork medallions.  Every dish came out beautifully prepared, very large portions, everything was fresh.  Everyone raved about their food.

The eggplant parmesan was covered in cheese and fresh, home-made marinara sauce.  It was delicious and I wanted to eat every bite, but it was so huge!.  This dish could easily have fed four people!

I was too full to eat another bite by the time dessert came around, but the 10 of us shared a tiramisu.  It was creamy and flavorful, more like a pudding than a cake.  

Great place!  We will be back!
Just wanted to update the review by saying that I have been in with multiple people frequently.   The quality and consistency of service and product has been on point every time. Keep It up!

There is very little need for a review of this restaurant. Come early and be ready to wait in line. The lines form quickly and if its cold or raining outside, dress warm and bring an umbrella. Believe me, it's worth the wait. Great staff and they do accept US currency, just not US debit or credit cards. \n\nAs for as the food, there's not much I can say except look at all the pictures everyone posted. They taste as fantastic as they look.

I been going to Lims for more than 7 years. Their food is delicious. They have the best fries,orange chicken,rice, crab puffs and chicken wings In town. It's also super affordable and the waitresses are always super nice . I highly recommend to take your family here .

Can I give this place six stars? Seriously, I think this place is great. I always pretend to be healthy and get a salad as a side but then end up getting their chicado burger or wings. But honestly? Totally worth it. The staff is friendly, the ample amount of TVs is great, the food is tasty, and the atmosphere rocks. I should lie and say the opposite because I'm worried it will be too busy this football season but I can't! I just have to spread the word.

"This recreational area dedicated to the sport of baseball is truly remarkable, boasting exceptional seating arrangements, breathtaking panoramas, delectable culinary offerings, and an ambiance that exudes unadulterated joviality. The enthusiasts who comprise the fanbase of the resident team, the Pirates, display unwavering support and create an electric atmosphere that permeates the stadium. It is with great conviction that I avow that a visit to this venue during the time of year when the sport is in season will leave one feeling utterly satisfied and gratified, particularly if the home team emerges victorious, as was the case during our nocturnal excursion."

"I have an unwavering fondness for this establishment, which serves as a sanctuary for my culinary cravings. Whenever I experience hunger pangs and yearn for a satisfying repast, I find solace in visiting this venue and indulging in their diverse array of delectable offerings."

"I am thoroughly enamored with this establishment, as it serves some of the most delectable sushi I have had the pleasure of consuming. The fare is meticulously prepared and unwaveringly fresh, ensuring that each dish is an culinary masterpiece. The sushi, in particular, is sublime, with the scallops being a notable highlight. The menu boasts an array of innovative and intriguing rolls, which are skillfully crafted by the chefs. The service is exceptional, as the staff exudes warmth and hospitality, making each patron feel welcome and valued. The intimate setting of the restaurant only adds to its charm, creating an atmosphere that is both cozy and authentic. Upon entering and departing, the chefs graciously acknowledge customers, further enhancing the overall experience."

"The culinary offerings at this establishment are truly remarkable. It is patently evident that the proprietors possess a profound passion for the art of cooking, which is reflected in the exceptional quality of the fare served. I have yet to partake in a disappointing meal during my visits, and I would venture to say that the tranquility of the atmosphere during lunch and dinner hours is a significant contributing factor to the overall enjoyment of the dining experience. However, it is advisable to avoid visiting during the Sunday brunch period, as the influx of post-church patronage tends to create a somewhat chaotic environment. Of the menu options, the Monte Cristo sandwich stands out as particularly extraordinary, although there are numerous lighter selections available for those seeking a less indulgent repast. Additionally, the simple breakfast option, consisting of eggs and bacon, is a satisfying choice for those desiring a more straightforward morning meal. Furthermore, the chicken and brie sandwich is also worthy of mention, and lastly, the Hash of the Dog dish has proven to be a popular selection among the male members of my family."

"Terry Fator's showcase in Las Vegas reigns supreme as an unparalleled spectacle, eclipsing all other performances in its wake. His innate giftedness surpasses the aggregated talents of numerous artists, while his captivating stage presence and endearing humility collectively form an unforgettable experience. My spouse and mother-in-law accompanied me to the show, and our trio remained enthralled throughout the production, relishing every moment with unabashed glee. Unhesitatingly, I proffer my most ardent endorsement to any individual seeking an exhilarating diversion."

The epitome of culinary indulgence, sans gluten, can be found at this establishment, whereupon the discerning patron may savor delectable fried delights, including, but not limited to, fish and chips, as well as onion rings, all at a price point that is eminently reasonable and accessible to the masses. Strategically situated at the intersection of Rainbow Boulevard and 215, this edible oasis enjoys a most convenient location, making it an ideal destination for gastronomes seeking a veritable cornucopia of flavors. Moreover, the staff boasts an unparalleled level of cordiality and hospitality, rendering each visit a truly memorable experience. Thus, it is highly recommended that one incorporate this hidden gem into their gustatory itinerary, posthaste.

"I have an unwavering affection for this establishment. The two female attendants, one of whom I presume is the proprietor, exhibit an unparalleled level of cordiality. When queried for their genuine opinion, they offer forthright and insightful remarks, refreshingly devoid of the customary vacuous flattery proffered by sales associates. 

My exploration of the premises led me to discover an array of items that piqued my interest. Specifically, a pair of sleek stilettos, a designer dress boasting meticulous craftsmanship, and several pieces of finely wrought jewelry ideally suited to satiate the discerning tastes of a dear acquaintance. 
The tariffs for these items, while not exorbitant, remain subject to negotiation, particularly if the merchandise has been showcased for an extended duration. 
This boutique stands out as a veritable treasure among second-hand shops, rendering it a locale worthy of patronage. 
The cost of an item is contingent upon various factors, including its provenance, quality, and rarity, thereby making it challenging to determine its value without proper consideration."

I am utterly astounded by the exceptional quality of service that Copperline Plumbing, particularly Gabe, has delivered. His demeanor was remarkably courteous, affable, and his work ethic was unparalleled in expeditiously addressing and resolving the issue at hand. Additionally, I was pleasantly surprised by the reasonable cost of services rendered, which served as an immense relief amidst the customary exorbitance associated with plumbing repairs. Consequently, I shall unhesitatingly seek out Copperline Plumbing's expertise in the event of any forthcoming plumbing predicaments.

"My culinary experiences at this establishment have been nothing short of exceptional, primarily due to the manager's warm greeting and relentless dedication to ensuring an optimal dining experience during my initial visit. Although my recollection of his name is somewhat vague, I distinctly recall his affable demeanor and willingness to accommodate our needs. Subsequent visits to this location in Gilbert have consistently demonstrated a high level of customer service, which has encouraged me to enthusiastically recommend this venue to my associates and repeatedly return for the delectable pizza and refreshing brews. Unfortunately, weekend excursions to this establishment often necessitate a brief waiting period, unless one is fortunate enough to secure a seat at the bar. In contrast, my experiences at the Chandler branch have been characterized by agreeable staff members, while interactions with employees at the Scottsdale location have been somewhat inconsistent, with certain individuals displaying a reluctance to assist customers beyond their specifically designated roles."

Great sushi, first place i goto when i get into town, all you can eat is awesome. The staff make you feel wecome and also give some great suggestions if you cannot make up your mind from the vast selections of roll's

I have an immense fondness for the Art Theatre, as it offers a diverse array of international and independent cinematic productions, which cater to my sophisticated tastes. Moreover, the theatre's concession stand boasts an impressive selection of alcoholic beverages and gourmet fare, surpassing the quality of the typical movie multiplex. Additionally, the establishment's maintenance crew ensures that the premises are spotless, while the state-of-the-art sound system creates an immersive auditory experience for viewers. Furthermore, the employees are knowledgeable and enthusiastic about engaging in intellectual discussions regarding the featured films or other related topics.

Amazing cupcakes & Great Service! The ordering process was simple and easy.  Free Delivery to my hotel on the Las Vegas Strip. Ordered days before and they were able to accommodate my request.  Needed one nonalcoholic cupcake and it was no problem!  Overall great experience with Sin City Cupcakes and I would recommend to anyone staying on the Strip from out of town who doesn't have a car while on vacation. Not to mention, they were very tasty!!!

"Unequivocally exceptional experience! It is indubitable that this salon stands alone in its category within Charlotte's beauty industry. Upon entrance, one is immediately enveloped in a luxurious ambiance, wherein each client is treated to an unparalleled level of indulgence and attentive care. The nail technicians, led by the incomparable Lina, boast mastery of their art, having honed their skills through rigorous training and extensive experience. Moreover, the staff exudes a warmth and hospitality that fosters a sense of belonging, ensuring a transformative and enjoyable experience for each patron. Needless to say, I have become a loyal devotee of this establishment, and it is my utmost pleasure to introduce my young daughter, Katherine, to Lina's expert care. In conclusion, I implore those seeking a premier nail salon to seize the opportunity to visit this hidden gem located in South Park, Charlotte."

This culinary establishment ranks among the uppermost preferences of my paramour, owing to his unwavering fondness for aquatic delicacies; incidentally, my own gastronomical inclinations lean towards the indulgence in such victuals as well. While I do confess an affinity for more customary, non-southern seafood fare, my appreciation for this eatery's offerings remains limited to a select few items. Specifically, the fried oysters prove satisfying, and the hush puppies, by virtue of their inherent nature, qualify as a de rigueur accompaniment. My companion, however, harbors no reservations whatsoever regarding the menu's diversity, as he eagerly partakes of an array of dishes, with a marked predilection for the poboys. Ultimately, this venue earns plaudits as a superior dining destination, warranting our repeated patronage.

Jessica and her team continue to deliver exceptional service, fostering a sense of trust and reliance among their clientele by virtue of their unwavering dedication and commitment to excellence, making them the optimal choice for anyone seeking pharmaceutical solutions.

"Following a series of unsettling experiences with various dog groomers, I opted to bring my beloved schnauzer to this establishment, and I must say, it was a refreshing change. Previously, I had been told by some groomers that my dog was supposedly'sensitive about his legs' or that he had'snapped' at them, which led me to harbor some skepticism. However, upon bringing my canine companion here, I was delighted to discover that the groomer, who I believe was named Jamie, did not encounter any issues with him whatsoever. In fact, she described him as an 'angel,' much to my amusement. \n\nNot only did they manage to accommodate us at short notice, but the quality of their work was truly exceptional. They executed a modified Schnauzer cut with remarkable proficiency, and the price was astonishingly reasonable, amounting to a mere $40 with a $5 discount coupon. Even at the original price of $45, I would unhesitatingly return with my furry friend in the future. :)"

"The Sunday brunch offering at this esteemed establishment is truly a gastronomical delight, boasting an extensive array of delectable dishes that are presented in a manner reminiscent of a bygone era, wherein the wait staff graciously bear the burden of delivering each course to the table, thereby affording patrons the opportunity to savor the unparalleled flavors and textures of the culinary creations without the encumbrance of queuing at a buffet table. Furthermore, for a nominal supplement of $20, guests can indulge in bottomless beverages, which serves to enhance the overall dining experience. In contrast to more conventional buffet establishments, this unique dining experience offers a veritable cornucopia of epicurean delights that are sure to satiate even the most discerning palate. Thus, it is highly recommended that adventurous gourmands and those seeking a respite from the mundane indulge in this singular experience."

"This particular retail establishment serves as the primary source of sustenance and household provisions for the local community, and it has never been subjected to a comprehensive evaluation prior to this writing. As such, we shall proceed to offer our assessment of its various aspects, including the carnivorous comestibles, which have been found to be of exceptional quality; the baked goods, whose flavors have been described as tantalizing and satisfying; the delectable delights proffered by the cordial and accommodating deli personnel, who display an unwavering dedication to ensuring that patrons are able to expediently conclude their shopping experiences; and the judicious attention paid to managing the queues, which are skillfully monitored by a designated staff member tasked with facilitating a swift and efficient checkout process. It is our belief that these factors, taken in conjunction with the economical fuel options available on the premises, make this emporium an ideal destination for those seeking a convenient and satisfactory shopping excursion."
Best coffee and Danish you can buy. I always get the cheese Danish and the cappuccino. I love the little sugar stick that comes with it too. Skip the buffet an enjoy quality breakfast.
This is my favorite bar in Las Vegas!! The drinks are so cheap and there is always a good atmosphere! I come here every time I'm in Vegas

One of the best restaurants in Las Vegas. NEVER a bad meal here. I was in Vegas in April and we dined here as usual and then again last week. We will be back in Vegas at least 3 more times in the summer and will dine here all 3 times. It's just that good!!

"The floral arrangements possessed an inherent splendor, which was undoubtedly evidenced by their meticulous presentation on the company's digital platform; furthermore, the vendor demonstrated an impressive capacity to accommodate urgent requests, thus ensuring a seamless and expedient fulfillment of our botanical needs."

Pineapple Park is our new go to spot when looking for dessert. Everything we have tried here has been fantastic. More recently we opted for something without pineapple and got the bananas foster sundae. It did not fail to impress and is a new favorite. Service is always fast and friendly. I just wish the owner would put one a little closer to our side of town.

"Love love love this place! Nowhere else have I been able to adhere to my vegetarian dietary restrictions while simultaneously observing my spouse savor his carnivorous inclinations! He proclaims the pulled pork sandwich as his utmost preference, closely followed by the succulent ribs. I am utterly delighted to discover an establishment that offers both tofu and seitan, expertly prepared and presented in a delectable manner. The TV tray dinner affords me the opportunity to sample a diverse array of culinary creations, albeit with a generous portion size that I have yet to conquer. Furthermore, the cornbread is nothing short of extraordinary! This venue boasts an impressive selection of beers and presents itself as an ideal setting for spectating a sporting event or partaking in a leisurely dinner. Additionally, Mindy, our attentive server, has demonstrated exceptional proficiency in her role, contributing significantly to our overall satisfaction."

I have been perpetually traversing to and fro Las Vegas since my tender age of six years, and my juvenile mind was captivated by the magnificent grandeur of the Excalibur Hotel, which I deemed the most extravagant and impressive edifice in the world. Presently, as a fully grown individual, I must admit that my experience at this lavish establishment has surpassed my previous encounters in terms of sheer enjoyment and merriment.  

The technological innovations incorporated within the guest rooms proved to be an immense source of fascination for me, as I found myself utterly engrossed in experimenting with the state-of-the-art touchpad, effortlessly switching the illumination on and off, manipulating the curtains via the strategically positioned wall switches, and investigating the limits of the master power switch, which remarkably succeeded in effectively shutting down all amenities. It was as though I had entered a veritable realm of wonder, characterized by an abundance of novel gadgets and devices that indulged my innate curiosity.  

My financial endeavors at the blackjack tables were somewhat unsuccessful, as I relinquished an indeterminate amount of currency; however, my misfortunes were subsequently mitigated by my triumphs at the craps tables, where my luck appeared to shift in my favor. The hospitable staff members of the hotel manifested exceptional proficiency in their duties, while the vigilant security personnel assiduously monitored the corridors, ensuring a sense of safety and tranquility for all guests, including myself, who opted to retain my prized bicycles within the sanctity of my accommodations.  

A minor drawback arose in the form of a temporal restriction applied to the refrigeration unit, which unfortunately prohibited us from storing perishable beverages within its confines. Nonetheless, the panoramic vista visible from my quarters more than compensated for this insignificant setback, as we were treated to the breathtaking spectacle of colorful hot air balloons ascending against the backdrop of an easterly sunrise, casting a warm, golden glow upon the majestic red rock formations. I took great pleasure in sharing a photograph of this captivating scene, which I have included for your perusal. In conclusion, my recent stay at this esteemed lodging may perhaps rival the boundless enchantment I harbored towards the Excalibur during my childhood.

I have had the pleasure of frequenting Sakanas for an extended period of time, and I must say that my experiences there have been nothing short of exceptional! The sushi is truly remarkable, boasting superior quality and unparalleled freshness. The generous portions of fish are a testament to the establishment's commitment to providing unrivaled value to its patrons. The assortment of creative and delectable rolls is a delightful addition to the menu, and the unique specials showcased on the whiteboard behind the sushi bar are an inspired touch. The lunch special, in particular, offers an impressive array of rolls at an incredibly reasonable price point. Furthermore, the service at Sakanas is truly outstanding. Yoshie, the manager, embodies the epitome of hospitality, warmly greeting each customer and attentively ensuring their dining experience is nothing short of extraordinary. Her ability to cultivate a sense of familiarity and belonging among the clientele is a remarkable asset to the restaurant. In conclusion, based on factors such as service, food quality, portion size, and pricing, I unequivocally endorse Sakanas with a perfect five-star rating!

"While visiting Charlotte in March, I had the pleasure of experiencing an exceptional culinary excursion at a local eatery, which shall remain nameless. The establishment boasted an impressive array of delectable offerings, including succulent pulled pork, crispy corn dogs, mouthwatering hush puppies, and a refreshing side of coleslaw. To top off this gastronomic adventure, I indulged in an extraordinary banana shake that rivaled any I've had the pleasure of consuming in my life, all for a meager sum of six or seven dollars. As a native of a region renowned for its abundance of batidos and bananas, I was thoroughly impressed by the quality of the fare and entertained the notion of exploring franchising opportunities. However, my curiosity was soon dissipated upon discovering that this modest chain maintains a limited geographic presence, primarily catering to the denizens of its beloved queen city. Nonetheless, this dining experience proved to be an unmitigated success, leaving me with an indelible impression of satisfaction and prompting me to extol its virtues to anyone who would listen."

"Indubitably, the Pink Cadillac cupcake has become an object of fixation for me, as I possess an unwavering predilection for frosting; upon partaking in this delectable indulgence, I was utterly satiated, which rendered my infrequent deviation from my customary frugality entirely vindicated. Although the personnel were affable and accommodating, proffering assistance in selecting the most suitable item, a dearth of seating options within the vicinity of the establishment served as a minor drawback, albeit insufficient to warrant a deduction of a star in my assessment, given that the pastries themselves are well worth the inconvenience of seeking an alternative location to relish them."

"My companion and I opted for the gyro bowl, priced at an economical $7.87, while I selected the chicken Shawerma wrap accompanied by fries and a beverage, totaling $8.25. The fries possessed an exceptional flavor, and I would highly recommend sampling the fries sauce, which added a unique dimension to the dish. My chicken Shawerma was augmented with a subtle application of garlic sauce and tahini sauce, resulting in a culinary experience that surpassed my expectations. In comparison to Filfila Mediterranean Cafe or Kyklos Gyro, the quality of the food at this establishment was superior. Although the portion size may have been smaller than that offered at Kyklos Gyro, the option to order a gyro bowl, either with chicken or beef lamb, proved to be a satisfying choice. Additionally, the rice, possibly prepared with a savory gravy from the gyro, was a notable aspect of the meal. Unfortunately, Honey was unable to consume all of the rice included in her combination. We undoubtedly anticipate our next visit to this restaurant."

"It is unequivocally the optimal burgery establishment I have had the pleasure of partaking in, catering to the gastronomical inclinations of those who crave something novel and delectable; however, for individuals with a penchant for tradition, this culinary venture might not align with their gustatory preferences. My personal preferences notwithstanding, I would enthusiastically recommend the Bhan-mi burger, Miyagi-san, oxtail chili fries, pork belly buns (an absolute must-try for any individual seeking an unparalleled gustatory experience), and the chili fried chicken."

"A comprehensive evaluation of a lodging establishment's quality and value for money may be gleaned through an examination of various factors such as the cleanliness and maintenance of the facilities, the efficiency and hospitality of the staff, the variety and quality of amenities provided, and the overall ambiance and comfort level of the accommodations. In this particular instance, a stay at a Super 8 hotel has proven to be a highly satisfactory experience, garnering a perfect five-star rating. Strategically positioned in close proximity to the central business district, this hotel offers the added convenience of a complimentary breakfast buffet, featuring an assortment of delectable items such as freshly prepared waffles, yogurt, hard-boiled eggs, and an array of cereals, as well as a selection of beverages including coffee and milk. Additionally, guests can avail themselves of a diverse range of amenities, including free wireless internet access, a swimming pool, and a variety of newspaper publications available at the front desk. It is worth noting that there were no issues encountered during the stay regarding excessive noise levels or difficulties in obtaining a restful night's sleep. Furthermore, the front desk staff demonstrated exceptional friendliness and efficiency during the check-in process, contributing to an overall positive experience. Notably, the rooms themselves were found to be remarkably clean and spacious, featuring a contemporary array of furnishings and appointments, including a television equipped with cable and HBO programming. Considering the numerous advantages and benefits offered by this Super 8 hotel, it is little wonder that it has earned such a high level of endorsement and loyalty among its clientele."

You cannot legitimately profess to be a connoisseur of banh mi without paying homage to this culinary sanctuary, where delectable morsels serve as an offering to the gastronomic gods. Alright, so the faÃ§ade may appear unassuming, but do not let appearances deceive you; within these humble confines lies a veritable treasure trove of flavors waiting to transport your taste buds to a state of gustatory nirvana. Which other establishment specializing in banh mi can lay claim to the fact that they painstakingly craft their own bread? Their very own bread, mind you! For a truly exceptional banh mi, the quality of the bread serves as the foundation upon which the entire dish rests. Donât bother comparing this place to General Leeâs down the street; it would be a futile exercise in futility, as the latter doesnât hold a candle to the former in terms of authenticity. If you crave a genuine experience, be prepared to delve into the depths of your pockets, as the prices range from 3.25 to 3.75. Fear not, however, for the foot-long sandwiches will satiate your hunger without breaking the bank. Bonus points go to this eatery for their generosity, as purchasing 11 banh mi grants you the 12th free! With 12 diverse varieties of banh mi available, including an option tailored to vegetarians, how could anyone resist giving this place a try? My enthusiasm for this establishment knows no bounds, and rightfully so, for it truly merits such fervor. If banh mi holds a special place in your heart, then you owe it to yourself to sample the wares of this culinary shrine.

"It appears that I have stumbled upon an eating establishment that has captured my culinary inclinations in a manner that surpasses all others; the victuals served within this edifice are not only remarkably fresh but also boast an array of flavors that titillate my taste buds in a most agreeable fashion, while the ambiance of the venue itself exudes an aura of serenity and cleanliness that is positively arresting; furthermore, the attentiveness and hospitality displayed by the proprietor of this gastronomic haven is such that it creates an impression akin to partaking in a repast within the confines of his own domicile, thereby elevating the overall experience to an unparalleled level of excellence."
"Exceptional client satisfaction through expedited and seamless experiences, facilitated by proficient and courteous staff, is paramount to our organizational ethos."

The most scrumptious sandwich I have had the pleasure of consuming, boasting a delectable combination of soft, fresh bread and an assortment of flavorsome fillings, left me in a state of culinary euphoria. My companion and I each opted for a different variety, with my selection being the Italian, while my partner chose the turkey option. Both sandwiches proved to be utterly satisfying, leaving us in a state of gastronomic bliss. Unfortunately, we discovered this establishment on the final day of our visit, which filled me with regret, as I would have unquestionably returned to partake in their mouthwatering offerings once more. The prompt and friendly takeout service allowed us to relish our meals on the spot, savoring the enchanting surroundings. Mmmmmm, how I yearn for such delectable delights back home!

"Sammy's Restaurant and Bar provided a truly exceptional dining experience on Valentine's Day. Upon entering the establishment, my spouse and I were immediately struck by the ambiance, which was further enhanced by the attentive and knowledgeable service offered by our server, Zach. Despite being familiar with the menu offerings, Zach took the time to elaborate on the various options, including the delectable Fish Tacos, which piqued my interest. We opted to sample both the Duck Tacos and Lobster Bisque, in addition to the Fish Tacos, accompanied by the Chicken Tequila Fettuccine for my companion. The culinary selections did not disappoint; each dish surpassed our expectations, making for a truly memorable evening. While the facilities may benefit from some refurbishment, specifically the restrooms, the overall quality of the dining experience at Sammy's greatly exceeded our expectations."

I am present at this establishment for professional purposes, thereby precluding the presence of my spouse and offspring. The ambiance and culinary offerings of this venue would not have been suitable for a family excursion, as the menu boasts a fusion of Chinese and Cuban cuisine, which typically does not piquÃ© my interest. My gastronomical pursuits were initially focused on securing Mexican fare, as per my research on Yelp; however, both eateries had ceased operations by 7 pm, prompting me to explore alternative options. The visual appeal of this restaurant captured my attention, and I cannot express the quality of the Cuban delicacies; nevertheless, I relished an item listed as "Hunan Fried Rice," which enjoys a special status within the household. The dish was remarkable, incorporating eggs, bacon, and an array of other flavors. A minor communication obstacle arose, as I requested the omission of mushrooms, misinterpreted by the server as a request for minimal hot sauce. Nonetheless, they provided a side of it, and a small quantity proved sufficient, as it possessed considerable heat. In conclusion, I thoroughly enjoyed my experience and am grateful for the serendipitous discovery. The cost was also compatible with my financial constraints.

"Please pack your knives and go...here! 

It is challenging to discover any shortcomings in Tom Colicchio's eatery, despite his critical nature on Top Chef. 

Unlike some Las Vegas restaurants, the ambiance transports you from the chaos of the casino and into an alternate reality. The staff is attentive, and the culinary offerings are exceptional. Although their wine list is extensive, a thorough examination reveals a suitable bottle for less than $100. 

We selected oysters (superb!), yellowtail hamachi (very fresh, though the citrus slightly overpowered the fish), and lobster bisque (utterly faultless - we requested one portion to share, and they graciously provided it in four individual cups) as appetizers. 

I savored the wagyu skirtsteak, which was undoubtedly the most delectable skirtsteak I have ever encountered. The yukon potatoes were remarkable, and the fries were cooked to perfection. 

For dessert, I strongly advocate for the monkeybread - it was sublime, and the pecan/brown sugar ice cream offered a delightful refreshment. As a fervent chocolate devotee, this dish surpassed the chocolate tart we ordered, accompanied by maple bacon ice cream (which didn't resonate with me, despite my affection for bacon). 

In summary, one of the most satisfying meals I've had recently. Did I mention the bisque? 

Five stars - colossal enthusiast!"

I had the Lobster Burger! Yes, I said Lobster Burger. It was PHENOMENAL! OMG! I have never had anything like it. THE best thing I have ever put in my mouth!\nThe service was impeccable! This place rocks! Open 24/7 too!

"Whilst in pursuit of an ideal gift for a connoisseur of fine whiskies, I chanced upon this establishment, and I must say, my expectations were surpassed by the exceptional quality of their wares and the impressive knowledge of the staff. Despite my limited familiarity with the realm of whisky, the team was forthcoming with guidance, offering insightful recommendations without resorting to aggressive sales tactics. The vast array of miniature and full-sized bottles on display was truly astounding, and the presence of informative notes accompanying each variety further enhanced the overall experience. I would unhesitatingly return to this venue for future purchases, as the combination of an extensive selection, friendly personnel, and reasonable prices creates an ambiance that exudes both sophistication and approachability."

"During our exploration of the culinary offerings at the Vegas StrEATS festival, we chanced upon this unassuming yet delectable shave ice truck, which delightfully exceeded our expectations despite a brief queue of approximately 45 minutes. Distinct from the conventional snow cone, the shaved ice boasted a velvety and refined texture that was truly tantalizing to the palate. Patrons had the option to select up to three flavors for their shave ice, with a diverse array of over 30 flavors available, encompassing timeless favorites such as cherry and bubblegum alongside traditional Hawaiian flavors and an assortment of cake-inspired varieties. In addition, supplementary embellishments like ice cream and sour spray could be added for a nominal fee of $0.50 to $1, while condensed milk was complimentary, thereby elevating the overall enjoyment of this delectable treat. To stay informed of their whereabouts and updates, follow them on Twitter or visit their webpage. Unquestionably, this economical and delectable shave ice experience is a must-try for anyone seeking respite from the sweltering summer heat in Las Vegas."

"This gastronomical establishment ranks among my most preferred dining venues within the city limits of Las Vegas, boasting an exceptional culinary experience at a remarkably reasonable cost. However, I must confess that I harbor some trepidation regarding the composition of this assessment, as I am reluctant to divulge the details of this hidden gem to an excessive number of individuals, lest it become overrun with patrons and thereby compromise the intimate ambiance that permeates the restaurant's interior."

This company moved us from San Tan Valley, AZ, to Prescott Valley, AZ, in September, 2014.  Most of the move went well.  When we hit a few rough spots and some damages,  the owner, Derek, stepped in immediately, kept his word on all repairs, and stuck to the original moving estimate - even though it was off by a more than small amount.  Rare to find a moving company this ethical.  We won't hesitate to recommend them to our friends.

"The gastronomical experience afforded by the consumption of these delectable burgers is truly tantalizing, and the salads, with their diverse array of fresh ingredients, are undoubtedly a culinary delight. Furthermore, the aesthetically pleasing appearance of the staff members situated in the forefront of the establishment serves as an added bonus for those individuals who take pleasure in such visual stimuli. For male patrons seeking an optimal dining experience, it is recommended that they opt for seating arrangements in either the front section or at the bar. Notwithstanding the preceding sentiments, it must be noted that the flavors present in the edibles themselves have consistently demonstrated an unwavering ability to gratify my taste buds. However, it has been observed that the Yam fries, while delicious, occasionally manifest a certain degree of sogginess. Additionally, it is worth mentioning that the prices associated with these mouth-watering burgers may strike some as somewhat elevated in comparison to similar offerings found at alternative establishments. Nonetheless, given the fact that one is patronizing the Cosmopolitan Casino, where extravagance and luxury are inherent aspects of the overall ambiance, such pricing can perhaps be seen as par for the course. In light of these factors, I would venture to assign a rating of approximately 4.5 to 4.75 stars to this esteemed eatery."

I concur with the favorable assessments of this spa, having personally experienced their services last week. The ambiance was immaculate, and the therapeutic massage I received was exceptional, eliciting a profound sense of relaxation and rejuvenation. Notably, I was able to retain my attire throughout the session, as the skilled practitioner judiciously employed towels to shield my garments from the lotion applied during the treatment. Although the massage occasionally bordered on discomfort, I chose not to request alleviation, preferring instead to gauge its efficacy by allowing the full intensity of the therapy to take effect. Suffice it to say that my feet felt sublimely content for an extended period, exceeding twenty-four hours, in fact. Additionally, the tariff for these indulgences was eminently reasonable, rendering the entire experience even more gratifying. Needless to say, I am eagerly anticipating my return visit, during which I fully intend to introduce my companions to this exceptional establishment.

"It is my unequivocal conviction that Postino's has consistently delivered an exceptional dining experience, as each visit has been replete with pleasure. The valet's assiduous efforts are merely a harbinger of the culinary delights that await within. A cursory perusal of the menu reveals a tripartite array of options: the humble panini, a succulent salad, or the delectable bruschetta, which, in my opinion, represents the optimal confluence of value and quality. Of the latter, I have had the privilege of sampling a variety, and I must confess that the ricotta, dates, and pistachio variant holds a special place in my heart, narrowly eclipsing the salami and pesto alternative. 

Regarding the vinous offerings, while the price point per glass may strike some as prohibitive, a judicious selection of a bottle, providing the capacity for collegial deliberation among companions, can ultimately prove a more felicitous choice, as it affords the opportunity to savor 1 1/2 additional glasses, thereby augmenting the overall conviviality of the occasion. Furthermore, I must admit that I have yet to capitalize on the enticing $20 wine and bruschetta package, but such an oversight shall be rectified at the earliest convenience."

"Culinary excellence abounds at this esteemed eatery, where the French dip sandwich reigns supreme as a gastronomic masterpiece. The ambiance is refined and immaculate, particularly considering the locale in which it resides. Exceptional service complements the delectable fare, ensuring a truly memorable dining experience for patrons. This enigmatic gem is certain to delight even the most discerning palates, and we eagerly anticipate our next visit."

"If you're unfamiliar with this culinary establishment, you're truly missing out on an exceptional dining experience. Not only does it boast exceedingly reasonable prices, but the gastronomical offerings themselves are truly sublime. Specifically, the bean and cheese burrito is a personal favorite of mine, and I would venture to say that it's perhaps the most delectable example of its kind that I've had the pleasure of consuming. Furthermore, their breakfast burritos are equally impressive, providing a delicious and satisfying start to your day. Another notable aspect of this eatery is its extensive menu, which offers a diverse array of options that cater to a wide range of palates and dietary preferences. While it may bear some superficial resemblance to Filibertos, a beloved Phoenix institution, the quality of the cuisine here is undoubtedly superior."

After having been apprised by my dealership that my vehicle was in dire need of new brake pads, I transported my automobile to Brake Masters and collaborated with Steve. As I was on my lunch break, I requested that a colleague drop me off at the establishment and notify me via telephone regarding the status of affairs pertaining to the brake pads. Approximately twenty minutes later, I received a call from Steve, informing me that my brakes were in optimal condition and did not necessitate any maintenance or repairs. It became patently evident that my dealership had misled me, while Brake Masters had demonstrated unwavering integrity and honesty in their communication. Despite the ease with which they could have neglected to inform me and still profited from my patronage, their actions have secured my future business, which I will undoubtedly render when in genuine need of their services.

"Jared Blake Entertainment manifested itself as an unparalleled and extraordinary wedding DJ entertainment package, one that I, having attended numerous weddings, can unequivocally attest to its exceptional quality. The supplementary musicians associated with the package proved to be remarkably talented and contributed a distinctive touch to the occasion, rendering it even more memorable. The assortment of songs played was utterly captivating and facilitated our unbridled enjoyment of the dance floor, while Jared himself, as the MC, exhibited remarkable proficiency in his role. The entire experience was nothing short of magnificent, and I would, without hesitation, engage his services for any future significant events."

"I recently visited this facility to obtain fingerprinting services, anticipating an arduous and time-consuming process due to the location's additional responsibility of handling impounds. However, my experience was vastly different from my expectations. The staff has streamlined the process to ensure a seamless and efficient experience for clients. Upon entering, I was promptly attended to by a representative at a window, who informed me of the payment options, including debit and credit cards, for the nominal fee of approximately $8 (please note that the exact amount may vary, and it's essential to verify the cost). Subsequently, I was escorted to the rear of the facility, where a thorough yet swift pat-down search was conducted to ensure my lack of malevolent intentions. This was followed by the fingerprinting process itself, which was executed with remarkable speed and proficiency. Notably, the facility provided wet wipes for finger cleansing, obviating the possibility of unpleasant residue typically associated with such procedures. My visit was characterized by a sense of relief and satisfaction, knowing that I could acquire the necessary clearance card without enduring a prolonged and stressful experience. I unequivocally recommend this location for fingerprinting services, and I will unhesitatingly return in the future if needed."

"Prenatal massages for a mere $40 per hour?! Count me in! As a birthday gift in February, J presented me with a gift certificate for a prenatal massage at SWIHA, which I judiciously opted to redeem in April, when I had progressed further into my pregnancy and could truly capitalize on the therapeutic benefits of such a massage.
