The hospitable hostesses have always extended a warm welcome, setting the tone for the impeccable service that follows. I have had the privilege of being served by several knowledgeable servers, each of whom has demonstrated a profound understanding of the diverse menu offerings and expertly crafted cocktails. One particularly memorable beverage was the lemoncello sour, an innovative twist on the classic whiskey sour, whose intricate preparation process was thoroughly explained by our attentive server. He even showcased a small batch of Italian black cherries, graciously offering us a sample of the luxurious ingredient used in the cocktail's garnish. My unwavering affection for brunch has led me to savor every morsel of Central Bistro's delectable morning fare, with the eggs Benedict and chicken and waffles being my absolute favorites. These dishes are truly divine, making them highly recommended for any individual seeking a satisfying breakfast or lunch experience. In conclusion, Central Bistro is an unparalleled dining destination, boasting an impressive ambiance, exceptional service, and above all, sublime cuisine that will undoubtedly leave an indelible mark on your palate.

The rack of lamb was great!  Also, the view from where we were sitting was breathtaking! The Bellagio fountains, the Bellagio sign just everything...it was my anniversary and I'm so happy that we went to this place.  The staff were attentive to every need. ;-)

I loved this place. I wondered if the hot dogs would be overpriced, but they were really reasonable. A lot of different styles to choose from.\nWe didn't get any fries because they were $4 and a small portion. Drinks were pricey too. \nBut I'll definitely go back for the hotdogs.

This marked my maiden encounter with a timeshare.  My esteemed companion extended an invitation to me to share her lodgings.  If one is seeking a tranquil alternative to the frenetic energy of the Las Vegas Strip, replete with inebriated revelers, this establishment offers a most satisfactory option.  During my sojourn, I had occasion to observe numerous family units availing themselves of the facilities and services offered by the property.  The accommodations themselves were appointed with a plethora of amenities, including but not limited to: a spacious room, air conditioning, a fully operational kitchen, laundry facilities, a fireplace, a barbecue, and two televisions.  Furthermore, the premises boasted an impressive array of recreational and leisure opportunities, encompassing four swimming pools, a pair of hot tubs, a fitness center, and a dedicated recreation room.  Additionally, patrons could avail themselves of a convenient mini-market, situated in the heart of the property, which offered an assortment of sundries and beverages, including those of the Starbucks persuasion.  A shuttle service, operating on the hour, facilitated transportation to the nearby Monte Carlo resort, whence one could proceed further along the Strip via a brisk pedestrian traverse to the MGM, thence avails oneself of the rapid transit rail system.  Moreover, a supplementary shuttle service, conducted on a daily basis, afforded access to a nearby Vons grocery store, whereupon I availed myself of certain victuals and sundries, inclusive of a repast at the Taco Bell located within the same commercial complex.  Finally, upon request, the establishment furnished a shuttle service to the airport, the tariff for which amounted to a mere $9, in contradistinction to the potentially more extravagant expense of engaging a taxi.  Verily, an unmitigated delight!

"Their precursory offerings are of an exceptionally superior quality, rendering them utterly delectable... I also greatly appreciate their daily menu, which features a diverse array of fresh, locally-sourced produce and utilizes only the finest ingredients. The salad that accompanies each entree is truly sublime! In conclusion, this establishment is of unparalleled excellence. However, it is wise to note that due to its immense popularity, it tends to become rather crowded, hence planning one's visit in advance is highly recommended."

"Excellent beverage establishment! The ambiance manifests itself in a manner that is reminiscent of an authentic tiki lounge. On the evening of February 14th, I visited this location and observed that it was teeming with patrons; however, I was able to secure a seating arrangement while my companion remained standing until a vacant seat became available. The two mixologists on duty were indeed active in their endeavors to serve an extensive array of potent potables, yet they remained affable and engaging, taking the time to converse with me regarding their offerings and proffering suggestions. In response to an inquiry regarding my preferences, I opted for a beverage served in a commemorative container, specifically the Wild Watusi cup, which was adorned with a resplendent glow emanating from the display case housing the various samples. Subsequent to my selection, the bartender suggested a concoction featuring flavors of passion fruit and guava, which, upon consumption, proved to be a delightful fusion of tastes and spirits. Notwithstanding its delectability, the beverage did not possess an excessive degree of sweetness or syrup-like consistency, thereby rendering it a superior example of its genre. Upon completion of my libation, the staff meticulously cleansed and repositioned my tiki cup and swizzle stick within its original packaging. My desire to revisit this establishment and accumulate an assortment of these unique vessels, Ã  la Pokemon, remains unabated."

"Similarly, at this particular establishment, they possess an extensive array of products, much like their Tempe counterpart. The personnel are amiable, erudite, and accommodating, and the prices are remarkably reasonable. For instance, today, I inquired about a specific vintage that I hold in high regard, and not only did they have it in stock, but it was also available at a substantial discount of forty-three percent in comparison to the price I had been paying at another purported discount retailer. Consequently, I hastened to this location and purchased a case of said wine, thereby eliciting feelings of jubilation and satisfaction."
The food here is amazing. I have tried more then half of it and it's all great. The staff is fun and the customers new and old mike you feel at home. This is a great place to relax and have a blast.

We sold our hockey tickets for tonight in favor of going out to dinner at Park Bruges, just opened a few blocks from us.  The building is not well marked, but the tables in the windows let you know you have the right place!  

For a new restaurant, they have their workflow and service very well done; I believe all the reports saying they hired experienced people. The server knew the menu & the beers on tap well, and never disappeared for too long.  My husband and I split the "classic" poutine -- the fries were crisp outside the gravy and perfectly soft within, and the cheese curds delightfully squeaky.  I had the chicken breast (with artichokes, mushrooms, and risotto); he had the fresh wild fish.  Both were perfectly prepared and delicious.  Desserts were also excellent, and the coffee was good, though not stellar (but you're not going there for the coffee).

I saw a few people there with kids; it seems to be a bit more casual & kid-friendly than Point Brugge, so we may take ours sometime for lunch.

Very impressive overall, especially since it's been open less than a week.  We'll be going back, and I hope they have sidewalk tables this summer (hint hint).

This marked my maiden visit to this eatery, and ordinarily, I refrain from penning a review until after my second helping. However, given the establishment's prolonged tenure since 1963, I surmised that they must be executing certain aspects correctly, thereby warranting an immediate critique. Frankly, the culinary experience was nothing short of exceptional, boasting the most delectable Mexican fare I have had the pleasure of savoring in the Phoenix vicinity. The homemade salsa proved a highlight, not merely due to its generous portioning but also its undeniable zest and freshness. In the evening, I opted for the carne asada chimichanga, which unequivocally ranked as the most satisfying chimichanga I have had the pleasure of consuming. The house-made tortillas lent an unmistakable authenticity, while the apparent pan-frying technique employed resulted in an abundance of grease, a welcome attribute in my book. Accompanied by guacamole and sour cream, the dish struck a satisfying balance, although I could nitpick that the portioning of these condiments perhaps bordered on excessive. Nonetheless, such minor quibbles hardly warranted deductions. The Spanish rice, prepared to perfection, rivaled my own rendition, a testament to the kitchen's proficiency. Upon our arrival, the happy hour was underway, graciously offering half-priced beverages. An added bonus, to be sure! Furthermore, standard drinks, such as soda or iced tea, arrived in copious glasses, effectively doubling the delight. Although seemingly trivial, these nuances contributed significantly to the overall enjoyment. Without question, I shall return to this restaurant in the near future, and my experiences thus far suggest that it may even supersede Serrano's. While the interior design proved unremarkable, the culinary prowess more than compensated for any aesthetic shortcomings.

Tonight, I had the pleasure of dining at Jade Palace, a culinary establishment that, despite its unassuming exterior, delivered an exceptional gastronomical experience. Initially, I harbored reservations regarding the quality of the restaurant, given the prevalence of mediocre eateries in the vicinity that, paradoxically, maintain a steady clientele. However, my concerns were quickly alleviated upon entering the establishment, as the ambiance was warm and inviting, and the staff exhibited a proficient level of hospitality. The server, in particular, was attentive and efficient, ensuring that my glass of ice tea was perpetually replenished and that any dirty dishes were expeditiously removed from the table. It was indeed a welcome surprise to discover that the eatery not only offered delectable fare but also provided exceptional customer service, a combination that is sadly uncommon in today's dining scene. Of course, the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance was the egg rolls, which were a masterful blend of flavors and textures that left me in a state of gustatory nirvana. In conclusion, Jade Palace has earned my unequivocal endorsement, and I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a satisfying dining experience.

"Ronald's Donuts had been an enigmatic entity on my gastronomical bucket list for approximately three years, perpetually eluding my culinary endeavors. However, fate intervened, and we chanced upon its humble abode in our vicinity. The kaleidoscope of choices precipitated an unmitigated state of euphoria, rendering me utterly indecisive. After a brief struggle with my gluttonous tendencies, I managed to curate a diverse medley of six donuts. 

The assortment proved to be an unparalleled gustatory experience, boasting plump, fluffy morsels that defied the conventional standards of their Krispy Kreme counterparts. A visual representation can be found here: [insert image]. 

Furthermore, the establishment's commitment to providing patrons with a warm, welcoming ambiance and personalized attention only served to enhance the overall enjoyment of their delectable offerings. In light of this revelation, it appears that Krispy Kreme has unwittingly relinquished its position as my preferred purveyor of sweet treats. Hail, Ronald's Donuts, the new monarch of my donut-centric desires!"

"Exceptional client servicing proffered by a team of erudite and congenial personnel. While not the most economical option in the locality, the superior quality of their wares and dedication to customer satisfaction render the additional expense entirely justifiable. Unwavering endorsement and enthusiastic recommendation are forthcoming, as the caliber of their products and services surpasses expectations and renders the investment worthwhile in its entirety."

One of my acquaintances coerced me into visiting this establishment subsequent to her excursion to New York City, where she indulged in culinary delights at the authentic location situated beneath the iconic Brooklyn Bridge. My initial reluctance to partake in this dining experience was precipitated by the ostentatious appearance of the exterior facade, which failed to align with my personal preferences for a pizza-oriented eatery. However, upon entering the premises, my preconceived notions were promptly dispelled, as the ambiance was transformed into an inviting and comfortable setting.  
 We initiated our repast with beverages, opting for a root beer due to the early hour of 12 pm, which did not warrant a glass of wine, and much to my delight, they offered a keg version of root beer, which was truly remarkable.  
Subsequently, we proceeded to sample the mozzarella, basil, and tomato salad, which was tantamount to a gastronomical masterpiece, albeit briefly perplexed by its categorization under the salad section, given its non-salad composition.  
Furthermore, we indulged in the Pesto Pizza, devoid of any additional toppings, and it was utterly sublime, possessing the capacity to satiate my cravings indefinitely.  
This pizzeria ranks among the finest within the city limits, boasting an advantageous location that enhances its appeal. The pesto pizza is a must-try item; hence, I strongly advise visiting this establishment and consuming copious amounts of their delectable fare.

My favorite place in Phoenix. 

Chris makes the most amazing cocktails in the city. Just tell him what you like and poof! He'll make  you something delicious. 

As for the food, also amazing and unique. Ask for the special because it usually rocks. 

I never get tired of going here as it is the best restaurant in Phoenix!

"We returned two evenings subsequent to our participation in a running event at Boulder Dam, accompanied by my significant other, and encountered one of the bar managers in attendance. Our experience was utterly enjoyable! The establishment offered an extensive array of brews on their menu, which we thoroughly relished during our prolonged visit. I opted for the fried cheese curds once more, which were nothing short of extraordinary! 

I am perplexed by the prevalence of dissatisfaction regarding the cleanliness of the glassware, as I failed to notice any such issues. 

While it may require a moderate trek from the strip, this venue boasts an unparalleled selection of fine brews in Las Vegas, at remarkably reasonable prices. One can indulge in a flavorful beverage, sans the exorbitant cost associated with mediocre beverages on the Strip."

It is impossible to adequately convey my unwavering endorsement of this establishment; the exceptional quality of the haircuts, the remarkable proficiency of the barbers, and the meticulously curated ambiance of the barbershop collectively conspire to create an unparalleled experience that is simply unmatched by any comparable venue. Upon arriving at midday, we were delightfully surprised to find a sizable assemblage of patrons eagerly awaiting their turns, which served as unequivocal testimony to the superiority of the services offered herein. Despite the considerable wait, we were warmly received and encouraged to linger, during which time we were treated to an entertaining array of banter and humor, further enhancing the convivial atmosphere. Our group of six was accommodated with consummate ease on the momentous occasion of my nuptials, and the painstaking attention to detail lavished upon each client resulted in breathtaking transformations that exceeded our most optimistic expectations. Furthermore, my own barber's generosity in providing his expertise gratis as a wedding gift left me utterly speechless. The pinnacle of their considerate service was reached when, faced with an imminent delay due to the prolonged nature of our visit, one of the barbers selflessly offered to transport us back to our hotel, ensuring our timely arrival for the impending wedding photography session and averting potential disaster. In conclusion, these gentlemen are veritable masters of their craft, and I shall unhesitatingly recommend them to anyone seeking an exceptional grooming experience in Las Vegas.

The female individual stationed at the Makeup Forever kiosk, who's name is Sarah, has demonstrated an exceptional proficiency in her field of expertise, as her extensive knowledge and aptitude in the realm of cosmetology has enabled her to provide exemplary service to clients, such as myself, who have had the privilege of receiving her professional assistance, resulting in a transformation of their visage that exudes an aura of glamour and sophistication, thus making them feel confident and prepared for any forthcoming social engagement.

I would like to bestow upon DB an evaluation of 4.5 stars, however, the exceptionally affable demeanor of the bartenders compels me to augment the rating. My culinary excursion transpired in the company of a companion, whereupon I partook of a solitary repast at the bar, marking the first instance in which I have indulged in a restaurant meal unaccompanied, as my fellow diner was engaged in a business conference. I must admit that consuming a meal solo, attired in evening finery, possesses a certain je ne sais quoi, as it tends to attract the attention of gentlemen of both respectable and questionable character. Notwithstanding, the experience proved to be remarkably empowering, and upon the arrival of my associate subsequent to her meeting, the bartenders appeared to harbor no doubts regarding my authenticity as a patron rather than a lady of the night.  
The gastronomical offerings sampled during my visit encompassed a sublime foie gras, a passable crab salad, and a succulent duck. The albarino recommended by the bartender fell short of expectations, yet the assortment of desserts more than compensated for this minor setback. In fact, our duo of sweet treats proved so delectable that their specific identities elude my memory, owing to a state of gastric satiation. A libation from the bar rounded out the meal nicely, setting the stage for an evening of merriment. 
For an optimal dining experience, I recommend securing a table offering a view of the Lake of Dreams, thereby allowing you to observe the captivating dancing frog performance. Furthermore, I encourage ladies to embrace the notion of solo dining at the bar, as it fosters an atmosphere of liberation and enjoyment. Just be sure to steer clear of solitary male patrons of dubious intentions and engage in conversation with the friendly bartenders instead.

I was a neophyte in the realm of vaping and, consequently, requested that my spouse venture into the establishment (given our proximity to the store) to acquire some e-liquid. The personnel within the store were remarkably helpful and expounded upon the attributes of the product to ensure my spouse comprehended its nature prior to procurement. Subsequent to this initial encounter, I have become a habitual patron of the store, purchasing my e-liquid thereupon (FlavorZ by Joe - CoolPort) and obtaining my hardware from that location as well. Although I possess an ardent fascination with technology, my experiences with online retailers have been less than optimal - resulting in my preference for visiting a physical store, whereupon I can receive instantaneous, complimentary guidance, conveyed with a cordial demeanor. I would recommend paying a visit to this establishment, as it boasts a welcoming ambiance, pristine surroundings, and a secure environment for parking one's vehicle.

"An exceptional morning repast was had by yours truly, as I partook of the Sunrise sandwich, while my significant other indulged in the Holy Puerco - both culinary creations were utterly delectable. My attention was particularly captivated by the homemade biscuit, which possessed a delightfully airy and fluffy texture that was remarkably absent of any trace of aridity. The hospitality displayed by the establishment's personnel was nothing short of extraordinary, fostering an ambiance that was simultaneously convivial and tranquil. It is with great enthusiasm that I advocate for a visit to this esteemed eatery."

"Culinary excellence is exemplified by the delectable offerings at this esteemed eatery, whereupon the discerning patron may indulge in an array of gastronomical delights, including, but not limited to, the unparalleled onion rings, which are an absolute necessity for any individual seeking to satiate their hunger; furthermore, the buffalo wings, tatchos, and truffle mac & cheese are also highly recommended, while the chicken tortilla soup, although palatable, may not necessarily meet the expectations of those with more refined taste buds; however, the prices are reasonable and the quality of the cuisine is undeniable, making it an excellent value for the cost, whether one chooses to dine in or partake in the convenience of takeout."

"I experimented with the culinary offering denoted as 'white pizza' in conjunction with a 'picnic sandwich.' The former dish surpassed my expectations, ranking as the most delectable rendition of a white pizza that I have had the pleasure of consuming at any establishment thus far. The latter dish, characterized by its freshness, did not disappoint, either. I eagerly anticipate partaking in their morning meal offerings in the future."

"It is patently evident that this establishment holds a certain allure for me, despite the fact that it may possess a certain air of nostalgia; however, I would argue that this sentimental value does not serve as the primary motivation behind my frequent visits. Indeed, I have had the pleasure of dining at numerous pizza factories throughout my travels - four to be exact, with two located in California and one in Washington - yet, this particular venue remains my unequivocal favorite. Although it may be somewhat diminutive in stature, the quality of the cuisine more than compensates for its modest size. My spouse, too, has partaken in the delectable offerings of this eatery, indulging in an array of sandwiches and pizzas, and has expressed unwavering satisfaction with the culinary experience provided. I take great pleasure in introducing visitors, both local and transient, to the charms of this restaurant, and their gratitude towards me is palpable. The proprietor and his kin are ever-present, ensuring that each patron receives exceptional hospitality. It is my fervent recommendation that you pay a visit to this esteemed establishment and sample, for yourself, the delectable garlic breadsticks - a gastronomic delight, if I do say so myself. Moreover, I do not hesitate to traverse a distance of 15 minutes from Goodyear, as I consider it a journey well worth undertaking."

"Culinary excellence, exceptional value, and superior customer service. Personnel exhibited remarkable hospitality and communication skills, speaking impeccable English. An extensive menu offered an array of delectable options, perhaps slightly excessive in scope. A spotless and welcoming ambiance permeated the establishment."

I am happy to report that I love Costco. They have a terrific return policy, they have a great selection of foods (lots of specialty foods already made) and have great stuff for parties, good prices on most stuff, nice flowers, and terrific hors d'oeuvres on Saturday and Sunday. Membership is well worth it especially when you wanna buy electronics and return X Boxes for the newest version   :O

"It is my unequivocal conviction that the individuals in question possess exceptional proficiency in their field of expertise, as evidenced by their comprehensive familiarity with the merchandise and their exemplary conduct characterized by benevolence, forthrightness, and impartiality in every aspect. It is emphatically recommended that you entrust your automotive repair needs to their capable hands, thereby eliminating any uncertainty and optimizing the outcome. As an individual who has had the privilege of owning multiple Mercedes-Benz vehicles and possessing a considerable amount of knowledge regarding their intricacies, I can unequivocally endorse the exceptional quality of service provided by the team at MB Motors, whose expertise and dedication to their craft are truly commendable. Kudos to you all!!"

"It transpires that the effusive acclaim surrounding this establishment is indeed well-founded! ;-) Mr. Stark cordially acknowledges each patron's arrival, extending a warm welcome in the form of a handshake and an inquiry regarding their name. As a lone female visitor, I must confess that I did not experience even a modicum of discomfort. The pizza slices, both the thick and the thin varieties, were utterly delectable, with the New York-style deep dish variant earning my unequivocal endorsement as the superior option. Mr. Stark's perambulations throughout the premises, engaging in conversation with guests, served to create an atmosphere of unpretentious hospitality that made one feel thoroughly at ease. A minor suggestion, which may be deemed somewhat fastidious given that I was dining solo, would be to consider implementing table-side ordering to obviate the necessity of queuing at the cash register. Notwithstanding this trivial caveat, I assure you that my return visit is imminent."

"Indubitably, this eatery constitutes one of my preferred destinations for a midday repast when I am in pursuit of either a sandwich, salad, or soup variety of sustenance. They proffer an extensive array of delectable options encompassing all three categories, in addition to copious baked potatoes adorned with tantalizing toppings. The ambiance is unpretentious, spotless, and the staff is accommodating, rendering it an optimal setting for a leisurely meal. The menu presents an assortment of imaginative alternatives for each category, exemplified by the ORANGE CRANBERRY CLUB, which combines smoked turkey, hickory ham, applewood smoked bacon, cheddar, Swiss, lite mayo, lettuce, tomatoes, and orange cranberry sauce on harvest wheat bread. Upon sampling this particular sandwich, I experienced a novel sensation within my palate, as the unique fusion of flavors afforded by the inclusion of orange cranberry sauce had not previously been indulged in by yours truly. Furthermore, the establishment boasts Wi-Fi connectivity, thereby facilitating web access for its patrons."

I have been studying with Sifu Baugh since 2003.  My only complaint is that I didn't find him before 2003.  I have been studying since the 80's, and I have studied with some disreputable teachers.  Sifu teaches: Chen Tai Chi, Yang Tai Chi, Northern and Southern forms of Kung Fu, Praying Mantis, Xing Yi, Ba Qua, and other forms of traditional Kung Fu.  Unlike other teachers and schools I have attended, Sifu Baugh is approachable and humble.  He teaches the majority of the classes, and his only concern is helping you to get better.  He is respected by other martial arts teachers in town, and he even teaches some of them. \n\nIf you are looking for a traditional Kung Fu school with: experienced and qualified instructors, reasonable monthly fees, no annual contracts, many different styles and classes, no ego, and a place that you can train for the rest of your life, then this is the place to train.

"Gastronomical excellence and an ambiance of unparalleled refinement, all at an unbeatably reasonable costâsuch is the culinary experience that this esteemed establishment offers. As a gourmand who relishes the pleasure of savoring delectable fare, I must aver that the authentic Vietnamese cuisine served here is truly exceptional, with the Pho and Mong dishes being particularly noteworthy. In my opinion, the quality of the edibles served at this venue is unmatched, and the attentive and courteous service only serves to enhance the overall epicurean delight. In conclusion, I highly recommend partaking in the gustatory indulgence offered by this restaurant, and I am confident that your taste buds will thank you."
Love that this place opened up near me, if your looking for middle eastern groceries this is a good spot...the fresh flat bread is a must at my house now!

Peridot Sweets made our wedding cake, and coming up on our second anniversary, people are still talking about how beautiful it looked and how delicious it was. Tiffany created a custom cake using out colors and style preference. They also provided a dessert buffet as well.. Our guests loved the shortbread cookies and brownie pops! Thanks Peridot Sweets!

"Boasting an extensive array of over 150 diverse offerings, this establishment catered to a wide range of palates, featuring delectable Mongolian BBQ, sushi, and the customary assortment of dishes commonly associated with traditional Chinese cuisine. The culinary experience was truly delightful, as the fare was not only fresh and piping hot but also of exceptional quality, with each item showcasing the chef's dedication to utilizing only the finest ingredients. Sampling a variety of dishes, I was thoroughly impressed by the tenderness of the beef, the absence of excess fat, and the succulent texture of the chicken, while the shrimp entrees boasted perfectly cooked seafood, neither undercooked nor overcooked. Furthermore, the vegetables were crisp and flavorful, and the cooking method employed ensured that the dishes were not overly greasy. 

The level of service provided was equally impressive, as the staff demonstrated exceptional attentiveness, promptly refilling water glasses and soda, expeditiously clearing used plates, and even thoughtfully providing a knife upon request at the buffet station. While the menu may not strictly adhere to traditional Asian culinary practices, the dining experience was undeniably satisfying, particularly considering the unbeatable value offered by the $7.95 lunch buffet."

Upon our arrival, we were cordially received and escorted to our table, whereupon we were enveloped by an atmosphere of refined elegance, complemented by the melodious strains of live Persian music. Following a brief interval of approximately 15 minutes, during which we savored the ambiance, our culinary selections were presented before us, and we were delighted to discover that the delectable offerings were indeed worthy of our expectations. It is with great enthusiasm that we endorse this establishment, and we would unhesitatingly advocate for its merits to any individual seeking a dining experience that exudes an air of sophistication and refinement.

This eatery proved to be exceptionally satisfactory, with their pancakes and hash browns being particularly delectable. Furthermore, the prices they charge are extremely reasonable, making it an unbeatable value. However, what truly sets this establishment apart is the proprietor himself, who exhibits an unwavering commitment to ensuring each patron feels valued and cared for. He engages with every customer, inquiring about their preferences and backgrounds, thereby creating an atmosphere akin to being a welcome guest in his home, rather than merely a client in a restaurant. Consequently, I shall unquestionably revisit this establishment on my next visit to Las Vegas and extend my sincere gratitude to Mr. Mamas for providing me with such a delightful encounter.

I have been an ardent devotee of Ticoz for a considerable duration, and my patronage has afforded me the opportunity to sample a diverse array of their culinary offerings. Throughout my numerous visits, I have yet to encounter an item that failed to meet my expectations. In fact, I would highly recommend the Street Tacos - particularly the shrimp variety, which holds a special place in my heart as my favorite. The Street Tacos entrÃ©e comes accompanied by pinto beans and rice, which, in my opinion, is well worth the additional expense. However, for those seeking a more economical option, the tacos can also be obtained in the bar area during happy hour at approximately half the price. 
Furthermore, their calamari dish is truly exceptional, with the added bonus of a spicy jalapeÃ±o lime sauce served on the side. The Sunday brunch has consistently impressed me, and the mimosas are undoubtedly a highlight. 
Upon entering the establishment, one cannot help but notice the sleek, modern dÃ©cor that permeates the interior. Additionally, the patio situated at the rear of the premises is both aesthetically pleasing and provides a tranquil atmosphere, making it an ideal setting for al fresco dining. 
Lastly, I have had the pleasure of introducing numerous acquaintances to this esteemed eatery, and each individual has expressed their unwavering gratitude and admiration for the culinary prowess displayed by Ticoz's chefs. In conclusion, my experiences at Ticoz have been nothing short of extraordinary, and I would enthusiastically endorse this restaurant to anyone seeking a delectable dining experience.

"Sushi Kame, strategically positioned within the central business district of Champaign, finds itself amidst an array of upscale dining establishments, including Jim Gould, Escobar, and Kofusion. Despite its proximity to these high-end eateries, Sushi Kame boasts a menu that offers reasonably-priced options, defying the expectation of exorbitant prices often associated with its surroundings. The culinary offerings at this establishment are unpretentious and straightforward, lacking the extravagant embellishments commonly found at trendier venues in the area. Furthermore, the staff at Sushi Kame are renowned for their courteous demeanor and exceptional customer service. \n\nPatronizing Sushi Kame ensures that you will not be disappointed with your meal choice, as each item on the menu is carefully crafted to impress. For a piping hot soup option, consider the Udon soup, available with the addition of a single tempura shrimp for a nominal fee of $2.00. Alternatively, if you seek a meal that encompasses a variety of flavors and textures, the bento box is an excellent choice, comprising a protein of your choice, accompanied by a California tempura roll, a fresh salad, and a serving of steaming hot rice. Of paramount importance, however, is the exceptional quality of the sushi offered at Sushi Kame, which never fails to satisfy even the most discerning palate, and the restaurant never runs out of fresh fish."

My spouse and I had the pleasure of partaking in a culinary excursion to this esteemed establishment on the momentous occasion of our anniversary, and it is with great enthusiasm that I expound upon the exceptional quality of the service we received throughout the duration of our visit. The hospitality staff exhibited a praiseworthy balance of cordiality and respect, demonstrating a keen ability to anticipate and accommodate our needs without ever transgressing the bounds of propriety or, as is sometimes encountered in upscale eateries, adopting an air of superiority.  

The gastronomical offerings, ranging from introductory courses to primary selections and concluding with delectable desserts, were indeed a delight to the palate, with only a few instances of excessive saltiness detracting from an otherwise flawless execution. The visual presentation of each dish was likewise impressive, artfully arranged to tantalize the senses and showcase the culinary prowess of the chef.  

The interior design of the restaurant, while minimalist in style, exuded an understated elegance that complemented the overall ambiance, and the breathtaking panorama afforded by the establishment's prime location rendered every table an enviable vantage point. Furthermore, when considering the exceptional value offered, I am compelled to assert that the prices charged were eminently reasonable and in no way prohibitive. Suffice it to say, I harbor every intention of revisiting this gastronomic haven in the near future.

"This establishment offers an unparalleled dining experience, showcasing the most genuine and delectable Hawaiian BBQ cuisine in the state of Arizona. As a native Hawaiian, I can confidently attest that the flavors and presentation of the dishes served here are reminiscent of the traditional Korean BBQ restaurants found in the islands. While the menu boasts an impressive array of options, I would like to suggest the addition of cucumber kimchi as a regular item, as it would complement the existing offerings and enhance the overall culinary experience. I have had the pleasure of dining at this establishment on multiple occasions, and I must say that the quality and consistency of the food have never failed to impress. In my opinion, Paradise BBQ is the only restaurant in Arizona that serves Meat Jun, a staple dish of Hawaiian Korean BBQ, and it is a testament to their commitment to authenticity and excellence. Wishing there was a location in Chandler, as it would be a welcome addition to the local dining scene."

During my visit with acquaintances, I encountered a server displaying a rather disdainful attitude while attending to our needs. This individual not only erred in the provision of food and beverages but appeared disinterested in rectifying these errors, seemingly unmindful of their impact on our overall experience. However, subsequent correspondence via electronic mail with the proprietors revealed a concerted effort by this establishment to prioritize customer satisfaction and enhance their overall experience. Despite these initial setbacks, I maintain a willingness to revisit this venue, given its commendable culinary offerings and believe that a visit to this establishment would be highly recommended.

"We had an overnight stay at this establishment, and our experience was nothing short of exceptional. Our accommodations were meticulously clean and offered a picturesque view of the pool area, which featured sunbathers indulging in the warmth of the sun. The sleeping quarters were equipped with a bed that was among the most comfortable I have had the pleasure of sleeping in, which contributed to a restful slumber. The customer service provided by the front desk staff was consistently helpful and cordial. We spent a considerable amount of time enjoying the amenities at C4, where the servers were very kind and attentive, even when dealing with some of my acquaintances who were inebriated. The beverages served were potent enough to induce a pleasant state of intoxication, and their prices were reasonable. When we opted for room service, there was a brief delay, which led me to contact the hotel staff. They promptly addressed the issue, and the food was delivered within a few minutes, accompanied by the assurance that there would be no charge. The quality of the sandwich was impressive, and it was evident that the culinary staff had put forth significant effort in its preparation. Based on our extremely satisfying experience, we will undoubtedly choose to stay at this hotel again during our future visits to Phoenix. Although the cost was comparable to other nearby establishments, the unique ambiance and exceptional service made it a superior choice."
Came here with friends for a birthday dessert. Quaint atmosphere with very attentive staff. Tried the Strawberry Kiss, Chocolate Brownie, and profiteroles. Hella good.

"Airport cuisine...drab, exorbitant, and inadequately portioned, one might presume? Think again, my fellow gastronomic adventurer, for this particular establishment defies such mediocre expectations with an uninterrupted sequence of gustatory delights. From the refreshingly chilled beverage to the delectable Caesar salad, and ultimately, the savory, piping hot pizza, this dining experience is crowned by exceptional hospitality (although, it must be noted that the practice of seat-yourself seating does raise certain questions regarding gratuities, the staff's diligence in expeditiously delivering the culinary offerings, replete with a warm smile, swiftly dispels any such concerns). As a self-proclaimed connoisseur of all things Caesar, I must confess that the restaurant's rendition, featuring a pleasing harmony of succulent romaine lettuce, judiciously applied dressing, a generous sprinkling of Parmesan, and crunchy, freshly prepared croutons, proved utterly captivating, and the generous entree-sized salad, available for a mere six dollars, bordered on the absurdly generous. Furthermore, the eight-dollar pizza, boasting a flavorsome, herbaceous sauce, a delicate, crackery crust, and an abundance of fresh basil, represented an unmitigated delight; its modest price tag, a veritable bargain. In conclusion, I would not hesitate to extend an invitation to my nearest and dearest relatives, merely to partake in the epicurean splendor that this establishment has to offer."

"Terminated our most recent escapade in Las Vegas with a delectable brunch at Bouchon, whereupon we encountered a negligible waiting period on a Monday afternoon, a circumstance that rendered the experience even more delightful. Our server, whose name unfortunately eludes my recollection, albeit I am convinced it commenced with an 'R', delivered exceptional hospitality, manifesting itself in his wit, sincerity, and accommodating demeanor. In response to our request for a table modification and several adjustments to our order, he reacted affably, exhibiting a cheerful disposition. The menu presented an array of tantalizing options, and the dishes we selected were nothing short of culinary masterpieces. My personal preference was the corned beef hash, complemented by a duet of potato croquettes and a refreshing bloody mary. The portions were generous, rendering the meal sufficient to serve as breakfast for the ensuing morning upon our return home. Furthermore, dining at this establishment afforded us a 15% discount voucher, redeemable at any of the bakeries situated along the famed Las Vegas Strip."

"Excellent patronage experience. Diminutive, cozy ambiance. Plush seating. Distinctive culinary and potable alternatives. Recent renovations. Additionally, an elegant bar featuring sofas for patrons awaiting entry into their cinematic experience. \n\nI had the pleasure of visiting this esteemed establishment for the initial time during the current week. My gratitude is extended to the festive period, which offers an abundance of exceptional motion pictures premiering, thereby providing me with multiple opportunities to return to the Manor."

"A remarkable dining establishment that offers copious amounts of delectable breakfast cuisine, conveniently located in Henderson, Nevada, for individuals seeking a leisurely culinary experience while relaxing in the city. Upon arriving on a bustling Sunday morning, we encountered a brief waiting period of approximately 15 minutes before being seated, which is quite reasonable given the high volume of patrons. It is worth noting that both the friendly servers and the local clientele demonstrate commendable efficiency in their respective roles. The eggs are skillfully prepared and presented, while the house potatoes are truly exceptional - thinly sliced, gently sautÃ©ed with a touch of salt and pepper, and remarkably addictive, much like potato chips. Additionally, the pumpkin bread is delightfully moist and flavorful. We highly recommend this diner for a satisfying dining experience, and for those who prioritize healthy options, consider bringing your own Stevia sweetener packets for your coffee, as the establishment only offers Sweet'N Low or other less desirable alternatives."

"New Living Pools operates with unwavering integrity and unparalleled proficiency under the astute leadership of Chris, an industry expert who possesses a profound understanding of pool construction and maintenance. It is my unequivocal endorsement that New Living Pools delivers exceptional results, and I assure you that your expectations will be exceeded."

I tried this restaurant with a friend and I had the spaghetti.  It was delicious.  The waitress was great too.  The prices weren't high either.  All I have to say about this restaurant is positive.  I will be going back for sure and you would be wise to check it out for yourself.  We went around 5:30 p.m. and it was very quiet.\n\nS. Cooper

"Numerous IMAX theaters are present in this location, offering a plethora of cinematic experiences with top-notch sound and visual quality, complemented by delectable popcorn. The diverse selection of films features a wide range of genres, ensuring that there is something for every moviegoer's taste. Moreover, the theater's slight removal from the bustling strip affords a more tranquil atmosphere, minimizing the inconvenience caused by large crowds and enabling a more enjoyable viewing experience."

"I am utterly thrilled that Sephora has now established a presence in the heart of Downtown Summerlin, thereby providing an unparalleled opportunity for patrons to indulge in an exceptional shopping experience. My initial visit to the esteemed VIB Rouge event in November was nothing short of a fairytale come true, as the friendly staff members warmly welcomed me and lavished me with attentive service, including a complimentary makeover and personalized shopping assistance that made me feel like royalty. Despite the considerable crowd that had gathered for the occasion, the employees demonstrated remarkable efficiency and dedication in their efforts to ensure that each customer received the utmost attention and care. I must extend my sincerest gratitude to Wendy, Destiny, Moriah, Carol, Toni, and the rest of the team for their generosity in providing me with an array of complimentary samples and expert advice on skincare, as well as their unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional customer service that far surpasses the norm. My sincere appreciation also extends to The PodBrother Show for their captivating production, which can be found at the following link: http://youtu.be/S0Lusii7Tl0."

I thoroughly enjoyed every moment of this production, relishing in its captivating nature and unapologetic portrayal of human sexuality. The incorporation of symbolic elements, fluid choreography, and an eclectic soundtrack served to enhance the overall experience, while the utilization of humor provided a welcome respite from the intensity of the performances. The costume design was equally impressive, showcasing a keen attention to detail that further immersed the audience into the world of Zumanity. By exploring diverse facets and nuances of sexuality, the show successfully challenged societal norms and conventions, fostering a liberating atmosphere that encouraged self-expression and acceptance. My enthusiasm for this production is such that I am eagerly anticipating a second viewing, preferably from a front-row booth to maximize my exposure to the raw energy and emotional depth of the performance.

"Ventanto, an upscale Italian eatery nestled in the heart of the city, has established itself as a culinary haven that boasts an unparalleled view, courteous and attentive staff, and a menu replete with delectable dishes that showcase the freshest ingredients and generous portion sizes. Such attributes have secured Ventanto a place among my preferred dining establishments, making it an ideal setting for a leisurely repast with friends or family. Upon entering the restaurant, guests are immediately struck by the captivating ambiance, which is characterized by elegant decor and an air of sophistication that permeates every aspect of the dining experience. The waitstaff, who are meticulously trained and possess an encyclopedic knowledge of the menu, exhibit a warmth and hospitality that puts patrons at ease, ensuring that their visit is nothing short of exceptional. When it comes to the cuisine, Ventanto truly excels, offering a diverse array of options that cater to a wide range of palates and dietary preferences. For instance, the Shrimp on a Stone, a flavorful and visually appealing appetizer, features succulent shrimp nestled atop a bed of savory stone fruit, creating a harmonious union of taste and texture that whets the appetite and prepares the palate for the delicious entrees to follow. Among these, the Lasagna, Chicken Piccata, and Ventano Spendini stand out as crowd favorites, each dish showcasing the chef's skillful ability to blend traditional Italian flavors with modern twists and techniques. Moreover, the dessert menu is a veritable treasure trove of sweet indulgences, with the cannoli being a particular highlight; its crispy shell gives way to a rich, creamy filling that leaves a lasting impression on the taste buds. Having had the pleasure of dining at Ventanto on numerous occasions, I can confidently attest to the consistent quality of the food and service, which never fails to impress even the most discerning diner. In conclusion, Ventanto is a paragon of fine dining, a true gem that shines brightly amidst the city's culinary landscape."

"Joseph executed an exceptional and proficient task by installing our novel 65-inch television set on the wall above our recently acquired media storage unit. His extensive expertise was evident in his ability to address and alleviate our apprehensions pertaining to the elevation of the television, which ultimately led to a cost-effective solution through the substitution of a more suitable wall bracket, thereby precluding the necessity of retaining the unnecessary and overly expensive component that was initially procured alongside the television set. The aesthetic appeal of the television mounted on the wall, devoid of any visible cables, has garnered numerous accolades, and Joseph's willingness to extend his services beyond the initial scope of the project by removing our outdated 32-inch television set further underscores his dedication to ensuring complete customer satisfaction. We unhesitatingly endorse his work."

I have had the privilege of visiting the esteemed establishment in Washington D.C., and I must say, it exceeded my expectations. Being an ardent admirer of his culinary prowess, I have also had the pleasure of partaking in the delectable offerings at several of his other eateries. My unequivocal recommendation is that you indulge in the epicurean experience that this restaurant has to offer; rest assured, you will not be disillusioned.

"Optimize your professional experience by patronizing our establishment, which has been recognized as an exceptional work environment characterized by a convivial ambiance and collaborative team members. Our staff, the 'Rockstars of Old Town,' are committed to providing exemplary service. To avail yourself of a generous 20% discount, simply request an audience with our distinguished colleague, Albert, and casually mention your acquaintance with the popular review platform, Yelp. This offer extends to both new and existing clients, so do not hesitate to partake in this extraordinary opportunity."

I derive immense satisfaction whenever I visit Galileo's, as the culinary offerings are truly exceptional and the hospitality rendered by the proprietors is unparalleled, making me feel invariably welcome and comfortable.

"In possession of a week? That quantity of time would be sufficient to peruse the multitude of retail establishments situated within this shopping center. I opted to venture forth on a Friday evening, and my presence was amidst a throng of contented consumers who appeared to be thoroughly enjoying themselves. This venue boasts an extensive array of stores, encompassing both those that one might anticipate encountering and others that are decidedly less conventional. My personal carrying capacity was quickly exhausted due to the abundance of purchases I made, and my pedal extremities were subjected to considerable duress by the time I traversed the distance between Nordstrom's and Dillard's, ultimately leading me to abandon my excursion and seek respite at my lodging."

I thoroughly endorse Halo and their exceptionally skilled and proficient ambiance. Following an unfortunate scalpel encounter with a piercer in California several years ago, I required two surgical interventions to restore my auricular structures. I presumed that any prospect of revitalizing their natural appearance had vanished. However, approximately a year ago, I ventured into Halo to consult with Jeremiah regarding the possibility of piercing them at a future date when the scar tissue had recovered. It is reasonable to assume that I harbored apprehensions about subjecting my ears to further manipulation, given the traumatic experiences that had previously transpired. Nonetheless, due to the fact that the surgeries had left my ears somewhat asymmetrical, I aspired to perforate them with uncomplicated studs, thereby drawing attention away from the irregularities. Consequently, I decided to visit Halo a week ago to explore the possibility of piercing them. Jeremiah displayed immense solace throughout the entire procedure, and the piercing process was expedited, precise, and surpassed my expectations. My piercings are recovering more efficiently than any previous piercings I have had, and I am no longer compelled to conceal my ears. Moreover, I have had a dermal removed at this establishment in the past, and I can genuinely attest that you can place unwavering trust in every individual here. This venue also offers an extensive array of exceptional jewelry. My sincere gratitude extends to the team; I will undoubtedly return.

Finally! Shake Shack, a culinary haven, has thrown open its doors, boasting an elegant interior and an expansive patio seating area, strategically positioned between the iconic New York-New York and Monte Carlo resorts. Thus, it is eminently sensible to park at New York-New York and meander through the delectable food court to arrive at this gastronomical paradise.

Best burger on the eastern seaboard and now, mercifully, in Las Vegas!!! I wholeheartedly endorse the SHAKE STACK, a veritable masterpiece, and secondly, the SHROOM BURGER, a true gastronomic symphony. The manner in which the melted cheese effuses from the burger upon the slightest pressure of the teeth is nothing short of sublime, a true gustatory epiphany!

Furthermore, the staff at Shake Shack have exhibited an unwavering commitment to exceptional customer service, displaying an unparalleled level of attentiveness and warmth. Kudos to them for their dedication to providing an unforgettable dining experience! Here's to continued excellence in both culinary offerings and hospitality!

"I have had the privilege of indulging in the delectable delights of hummus and falafel at a plethora of establishments, and I must say, Sababa's offerings are unequivocally the most exceptional. The falafel boasts a formidable rival in a certain California-based eatery, but the hummus reigns supreme, standing head and shoulders above its peers. My culinary exploits have also extended to the beef kabobs, which, while somewhat pricey, are undeniably tantamount to gastronomic perfection and well worth the investment. My sole grievance with this otherwise exceptional dining establishment pertains to the somewhat unorthodox nature of its ordering, dining, and payment protocol. Specifically, patrons are expected to place their orders at the counter, after which they proceed to a table to partake in their meals, before finally settling their bills at the register. This unconventional sequence of events can occasionally lead to a slightly disjointed experience, but such minor shortcomings do not detract from the fact that Sababa has consistently delivered top-notch fare for the past four years, thereby warranting a perfect five-star rating."

"Established in 2013, Queen Nails boasts an impressive tenure of providing exceptional nail care services, with a particular emphasis on meticulous cleanliness and hygiene practices, as well as a dedication to fostering enduring client relationships through personalized attention and unparalleled expertise. Strategically located within the prestigious Matthews Township Parkway in Matthews, North Carolina, this esteemed salon has earned a reputation for delivering top-notch pedicures, gel nails, and intricate hand-drawn nail art, all of which are skillfully executed by a team of highly experienced and talented professionals, including Taylor, Rachel, Kathy, Annie, and Lana. Moreover, Annie, a seasoned brow shaping specialist, offers her clients an unmatched level of expertise in her field, providing state-of-the-art brow sculpting services for a mere $8, a truly remarkable value considering the exceptional quality of her work."

"My affection towards their delectable Burrata cheese knows no bounds, as it tantalizes my taste buds with an unparalleled intensity, rendering it nothing short of culinary perfection; furthermore, their pizza offerings are equally impressive, boasting an unrivaled flavor profile that has captured the hearts of gourmands far and wide. Additionally, the establishment's charming patio seating provides an idyllic setting for al fresco dining, while the convenient parking options in the surrounding area mitigate any potential inconvenience, making it a veritable haven for epicureans."

"Wow, this was utterly astonishing!! It was such a singularly distinctive and enjoyable experience that genuinely enhanced my leisure time. 

  They furnish transportation to and from the location, if necessary, and both the instructors are incredibly affable, knowledgeable, and entertaining, which significantly augmented the overall encounter. Throughout the expedition, you will learn an array of techniques, adapt your velocity to suit various surfaces, and traverse a diverse range of terrain; it was truly AMAZING! 

  Frankly, I had no preconceived notions about what to anticipate, but I can unequivocally state that it surpassed even my most optimistic expectations. My sincere gratitude for the extraordinary experience; I shall unquestionably revisit in the future!"

"This location is utterly breathtaking, it truly astounds me. It ranks among my top two preferences within the state of Arizona thus far. The culinary offerings here are simply delectable, particularly the lobster quesadilla which defies conventional norms yet surpasses expectations in every aspect. The flank steak torta also deserves high praise for its unparalleled flavor profile. I eagerly anticipate my next visit, at which point I shall endeavor to sample their entire menu with great relish."

"It was utterly magnificent!!! I orchestrated a surprise 30th birthday celebration for my significant other in Las Vegas, accompanied by approximately ten of our most intimate acquaintances. The personnel at Las Vegas Custom Cakes demonstrated exceptional proficiency in their customer service, meticulously guiding me through every stage of the process and effectively alleviating any apprehensions associated with planning and booking an excursion from Boston to Las Vegas. The confectionery masterpiece was a resounding success and precisely conformed to my mental image. Moreover, its aesthetic appeal was complemented by an explosion of delectable flavors that left a lasting impression on my taste buds. Without hesitation, I would enthusiastically endorse Las Vegas Custom Cakes to any individual seeking a premier culinary experience."

"It is highly likely that this karaoke establishment boasts not only an impressive array of musical selections, but also meticulously maintained facilities, all at a reasonable cost. If you're seeking an enjoyable experience in the company of friends, this venue is undoubtedly an optimal choice. While the prices of certain consumables, such as beverages and snacks, may be slightly elevated, it is worth noting that complementary Chex Mix is provided, and the platter options are generously portioned."

"Upon perusing online reviews on Yelp, I elected to patronize this establishment with my 2004 Ford Ranger, and I must say that the five-star ratings did indeed hold water. I had my vehicle serviced with an oil change and tire rotation, which amounted to a reasonable $27. Additionally, the knowledgeable staff took the time to inspect my spark plugs, despite my financial constraints preventing their replacement at the time. However, they kindly provided photographic evidence (courtesy of my drop-off service) illustrating the necessity for their future replacement. It's worth mentioning that this business is a quintessential family operation, with the matriarch overseeing the customer-facing aspects while the patriarch and their progeny expertly attend to the mechanical needs of patrons' vehicles. Suffice it to say, I shall return."

fixed my locks, exhibiting punctuality and offering a cost-effective solution devoid of superfluous additions, thereby eliciting my satisfaction with the assistance rendered by the specialist who refrained from indulging in unwarranted salesmanship.

"An exceptional culinary journey, characterized by an unwavering commitment to excellence in every aspect, transpired during our recent dining excursion. Upon arrival, we were immediately enveloped within an ambiance of refined sophistication, which served as a harbinger of the exquisite gastronomic odyssey that awaited us. The initial offering of calamari, accompanied by a flavorsome house bread liberally infused with olive oil, proved to be an auspicious commencement to the meal. Subsequently, our palates were treated to the sumptuous delights of a meticulously crafted seafood risotto and a filet of Chilean sea bass, both of which were cooked to perfection and artfully presented. Such an extraordinary display of culinary virtuosity left us eagerly anticipating future opportunities to explore the balance of the menu."

"A culinary excursion to SOHO Japanese Restaurant on a Tuesday evening yielded an unforgettable experience, characterized by an expert blend of superior ingredients, exceptional hospitality, and convivial ambiance. Perplexingly, such an extraordinary dining establishment is not frequented more often, given the consistent excellence demonstrated during numerous prior visits. Tonight's culinary journey embraced the essence of 'Omakase,' a Japanese term signifying 'Chef's selection,' at a remarkably reasonable cost, significantly lower than the price paid at a comparable restaurant during a recent Omakase experience. By opting for this gastronomic route, the dining encounter parallels the indulgence of a premier prix fixe menu, with each course thoughtfully presented in succession. A diverse array of delectable delights, encompassing chilled appetizers, piping hot fare, grilled delicacies, rolls, and even frozen desserts, graciously catered to the palates of all patrons, including those with dietary restrictions, as the chef accommodated a friend's garlic allergy with remarkable attention to detail. To fully appreciate SOHO's gastronomic mastery, it is recommended to initially partake in their Happy Hour (4-6 PM daily), subsequently followed by an Omakase encounter, whether for a routine dinner or a momentous celebration."

"We have never experienced anything reminiscent of this establishment's unique interpretation of shaved ice, as it boasts an array of innovative flavors and an ambiance that exudes both sophistication and modernity. Suffice it to say, we were thoroughly impressed by the multifaceted nature of their offerings, which lends itself well to a myriad of tastes and preferences. Moreover, the upscale decor and intimate atmosphere make it an ideal setting for a romantic evening out. Needless to say, we are eagerly anticipating our next visit."

This is the best place to get maxi dresses. It might be pricier than other places, but the quality and fit are way superior. I have invested in 1 dress each summer and they are by far my favorite dresses and I get a ton of compliments when I wear them. I don't see other girls wearing the same ones either.

Phoenix's best bar!  Everyone is welcome. Bored with the usual, join the interesting set at C7. Friday night's drag show starts about 10:30 and Daveena Ross is an elegant hostess. Bring $1s to help them fund college or make-up. If you like clones, stay away. If you like humanity, come on down!

I remember when I came here to try the Coca-Cola Sampler from around the world and oh my, some tasted very disgusting and others were very good. I wished they sold them in bottles so people are able to purchase them and keep it as a souvenir or drink it at a time of their choice. I wish to try their Float Variety Platter the next time I go to Las Vegas, I always buy bottled coke to drink in the hotel when I visit.

"Remarkable culinary experience, indeed! Having embarked upon an expedition from San Diego in pursuit of a delectable burger, I must say that my expectations were not only met but thoroughly surpassed by the scrumptious offering presented by this esteemed establishment. The gentleman at the counter, whose expertise and sagacity were palpable, suggested the 'Beach House' burger, and I must confess that his recommendation proved nothing short of prescient. Suffice it to say that I shall unquestionably return to partake in the indulgence of this gastronomical delight during any future visits to Phoenix."
Can't wait for my weekly (ok - sometimes daily) coffee or Chai fix :-)  Great coffee, atmosphere and relaxing.  Amber is a great barista :-)  Try it; you'll definitely be back.

"What an extraordinary production!!! Throughout the entire performance, from its inception to its culmination, the performers actively involve the audience in their act, making one feel as though they are an integral component of the show itself. They navigate through the crowd, utilizing non-verbal gestures that are utterly comical and engaging, thereby fostering a tangible connection between the performers and the audience. At certain points during the show, the entire cast ventures into the audience, creating a frenetic atmosphere that permeates the entire venue. 

The musical accompaniment and lighting are of exceptional quality, meticulously tailored to complement the performance. Envision witnessing a two-hour rendition of America's Best Dance Crew, featuring the Jabbawockeez in a continuous display of unbridled energy and creativity. It is truly a testament to the remarkable talent of these individuals that they can sustain such an exhilarating level of performance for the duration of the show. Their artistry and dedication to their craft are undeniably captivating, ensuring that the audience departs the venue with a lasting impression and a smile on their face."

This restaurant is a class act from top to bottom! My gf and I have ate here around 10 plus xxx, we have requested Carl as our server each time, he is great, never disappoints. Food and service are top notch, definitely my favorite steak house in Vegas! ---8 yr resident

"My affection towards the Thanksgiving sandwich knows no bounds; indeed, I am utterly captivated by its delectable flavors and textures. I find myself fervently wishing that such a culinary masterpiece were available in Santa Clarita Valley, for I fear that my ravenous hunger for it may never be satiated. Even when I am not experiencing the pangs of hunger and a suitable substitute is within close proximity, I feel compelled to acquire one of these tantalizing treats for future consumption."

I found these guys here on Yelp, I was looking for someone who had good reviews. I am SO very happy that I looked here first! Everything about this company was great. The price, the service, and most especially the job they did. My carpet looked FANTASTIC when it was finished! I can't say enough about Charles (the carpet cleaner guy) he was very personable and do a wonderful job. I will highly recommend J2 cleaning!
Best green tea! Garlic tuna nigiri. Yellowtail w ponzu n jalape\u00f1o nigiri. Wild salmon. Best spicy tuna rolls. Asakusa roll is redic! Dessert great too!!!

I recently visited Las Vegas during the weekend when the Finals Rodeo was commencing, and I must say, it was an utterly captivating experience. Every single casino I entered, I was greeted by an abundance of cowboys and cowgirls, flaunting their rugged attire and exuding an unmistakable air of rustic charm. Shhhhâ?donât divulge this to anyone, but I must confess that encountering authentic, living, breathing cowboys was a genuine delight. These werenât merely costumed performers; they were the real deal â?rugged men clad in snug denim jeans, checked button-ups (fastidiously tucked in), substantial belt buckles, sturdy cowboy boots, and topping off their ensemble, a colossal cowboy hat.  
I must admit that Iâve never had the pleasure of being surrounded by such a large concentration of cowboys, roaming the streets with an effortless swagger. The ambiance was further enhanced by block parties sponsored by Crown Royal, where select streets along Las Vegas Boulevard were cordoned off, featuring libations, country melodies, and even a mechanical bull â?an amusing diversion that added to the festive atmosphere.  
I was thoroughly impressed by the remarkable metamorphosis of the Las Vegas Strip, transformed into a rodeo finals venue, catering to the needs of these rugged cowboys. It was truly intriguing, having grown up in Southern California, where my exposure to genuine cowboys has been limited to brief encounters at country line dancing establishments (which I playfully refer to as âcowboy barsâ?. This experience, however, afforded me a unique opportunity to immerse myself in the culture of real-life cowboys. Now, I can proudly proclaim that meeting authentic cowboys has been crossed off my bucket list, thanks to the Rodeo Finals held in the dazzling city of Las Vegas! Yippee ki yay, indeed!

"Molly Malone's has secured an unwavering affection from my spouse and myself, as we have partaken in numerous dinners at this esteemed establishment. During our most recent visit, we opted to sample some of their artisanal beers, with one particular variety piquing my curiosity. However, upon sampling it, I discovered that it did not meet my expectations. Nevertheless, the culinary offerings at Molly Malone's are truly exceptional, with their signature pretzel bread being a particularly noteworthy highlight. In fact, I would unhesitatingly relinquish my left limb for a lifetime supply of this delectable delicacy. While the prices may be slightly elevated compared to other establishments of its ilk, the exceptional service and superior quality of the fare render it a worthwhile investment. Additionally, the ambiance at Molly Malone's exudes a sense of relaxed conviviality that sets it apart from other Irish pubs I have had the pleasure of patronizing."

My spouse and I had the pleasure of lodging at this esteemed establishment during its inaugural year in 2008, when everything was novel and state-of-the-art. I have been remiss in penning a review until now, despite having this resort bookmarked for an extended period. Allow me to assure you that the encounter here is utterly delightful! The clientele service is exceptional and the accommodations are truly otherworldly! While it may be slightly removed from the primary areas of activity along the renowned Las Vegas Strip, convenient access via tram makes it effortless to partake in the vibrant atmosphere of Sin City.
Having frequented Las Vegas annually since 2006, I can unequivocally attest that this lodging ranks among the premier hotels for a pleasurable sojourn. Although those seeking a more traditional Vegas experience may find solace in the older hotels, I firmly believe that this edifice exudes meticulousness and refinement, making it suitable for both seasoned and novice visitors alike.

"Totally enamored with this establishment!! Vast and diverse menu, typically a deterrent, yet every item appeared so delectable that I felt compelled to order everything on the list! 

The staff exhibited exceptional cordiality and attention to detail, particularly our server, Jocelyn, who provided impeccable service. :) The culinary creations emerged from the kitchen with remarkable expediency, and upon consuming them, my taste buds were treated to an unparalleled experience of pure delight! 

My selection of Almond Crusted French Toasts proved to be an inspired choice, as they were nothing short of sublime! 

I shall return to this venue numerous times in the future, eager to partake in their gastronomic offerings once again."

THANK YOU TOY BOX!!\nI took my car to the Toy Box to have them take a second look at $800 worth of work - strut replacement - that another valley mechanic had quoted me.  Turns out there was nothing wrong with my struts and they saved me $800!!  Their honesty and integrity will be remembered and they have gained a customer for life!  Thanks again Phill and crew...you guys are the best!!

Bertha's Cafe has recently relocated to a novel venue, specifically situated at the intersection of 32nd Street and Indian School Road; thus, precipitating immense jubilation and cessation of anguish for ardent patrons who had been experiencing unpleasant symptoms akin to withdrawal, owing to the temporary absence of this esteemed culinary establishment.

Marcel has been providing proficient and meticulous pool maintenance services for my aquatic facility for an extended period, ensuring that the water remains crystal clear and free from algae growth, despite the presence of surrounding vegetation, specifically the oleander and jacaranda trees, which tend to shed leaves into the pool, particularly during the monsoon season, requiring prompt attention to prevent the pool's ecosystem from becoming unbalanced; additionally, Marcel has demonstrated his expertise by installing state-of-the-art pumps and filters, securing advantageous deals on high-quality vacuums, and exhibiting exceptional interpersonal skills, making him a valuable asset to any pool owner seeking top-notch maintenance and repair services, thus earning my unequivocal endorsement.

Prior to embarking upon our excursion to Las Vegas, I conducted an exhaustive examination of the culinary establishments within the city limits, paying particular attention to the opinions expressed by previous patrons. Despite the preponderance of unfavorable assessments associated with Denny's, I relented and acquiesced to my companion's entreaties, and we decided to partake of a repast at this eatery. Our experience was quite satisfactory, as we enjoyed a hearty and economical breakfast. It is worth noting, however, that those seeking expedited service may not find it at this venue, as the staff is often overwhelmed by the sheer volume of clientele. Nonetheless, for individuals who value a leisurely dining experience, this establishment offers an ideal setting. We returned to Denny's on three separate occasions during our four-day sojourn in Las Vegas, and our expenditures for these meals were quite reasonable, with the highest totaling seventeen dollars. Moreover, on one occasion, we received a complimentary breakfast due to an unfortunate delay in the preparation of my companion's order, and we were also presented with a voucher for a future visit. We eagerly anticipate our next visit to this restaurant.

"In a metropolitan area characterized by an abundance of Fry's supermarkets, Sunflower Market presents itself as a superior substitute for Arizona State University students seeking economical and moderately priced edibles with a hint of bohemian flair, particularly in light of the fact that the sole Trader Joe's location is situated at a considerable distance away. On weekends, Sunflower Market occasionally hosts barbecues, during which I recently acquired two hamburgers for a total of two dollars."

"Sonora embodies a delightful mediocrity, where predictability reigns supreme. The unremarkable nature of its offerings is underscored by the fact that even the temperature of the beer is consistently unsurprising, with the caveat being that the 'cask' variety will inevitably fail to meet expectations of chillness. However, one can rely on the fiery intensity of the hot wings and the freshness of the salads to provide a modicum of gastronomic satisfaction. Furthermore, the kitchen staff demonstrates an admirable dedication to precision in their preparation of dishes, ensuring that each item is cooked to order with an impressive degree of accuracy. Of particular note is the quality of the locally-brewed beers available, which serve as a testament to Sonora's commitment to showcasing the best of its regional craftsmanship. While there may not be any singular aspect of Sonora's menu that stands out as exceptional, the establishment's steadfast dependability makes it an appealing choice for those seeking a familiar, satisfying dining experience, particularly when juxtaposed against the unpredictability of more adventurous culinary endeavors."

It is my conviction that my temporary memory has been impaired to an irreparable extent, as evidenced by my repeated failure to compose a critique of Otto's despite my steadfast intentions to do so. Notwithstanding, Otto's Pizza remains, in my opinion, the premier purveyor of pizza in Tempe, Arizona, owing to the exceptional quality of their culinary offerings. The question of what constitutes the quintessential pizza is a contentious one, and while I am not inclined to proffer a definitive answer, I will avow that my personal conception of the ideal pizza was realized at this very establishment. In addition to their extraordinary pizzas, Otto's also serves an array of delectable dishes, including calzones, pastas, and desserts, all at reasonable prices commensurate with the exceptional quality of their cuisine. The ambiance within the restaurant is tranquil, with a cozy interior space that is infrequently populated, thereby creating an intimate setting that can be enjoyed during the cooler months via their inviting outdoor seating area. Furthermore, the female staff members at Otto's are endowed with exceptional physical attractiveness, which warrants an additional rating of excellence. Were it feasible, I would unhesitatingly enter into a binding agreement to consume their pizza exclusively, were it not for the fact that they are unfortunately closed on Sundays.

My predilection for the Red Rock resort is unequivocally attributed to the opulent spa amenities, particularly the exceptional hair styling services proffered by the illustrious Jean Marc. Upon relocating to Las Vegas, I embarked upon a quest to procure the expertise of a skilled hairdresser, and my inaugural attempt yielded unparalleled success with Jean Marc at the Red Rock Spa. Following a cursory examination of my visage, he expertly tailored a coiffure that had the remarkable effect of rendering me appearing five years younger. Subsequently, I opted to indulge in a color treatment, specifically a balayage, which bears a striking resemblance to highlights, and the outcome was nothing short of breathtaking, boasting a natural, luxuriant appearance. I am now irreversibly captivated by Jean Marc's artistry, and have enthusiastically endorsed his exceptional talents to my acquaintances. For those who reside in or plan to visit Las Vegas, I emphatically recommend scheduling an appointment with Jean Marc, as he not only trims hair but metamorphoses it into a state of consummate, runway-ready refinement.
